tika-s0501t:1043_17: Iti imehi chahi dhammehi pariggahitaṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ āneñjappattaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:1043_18: Evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatattā catutthajjhānacittaṃ channaṃ abhiññāñāṇānañca manomayiddhivipassanāñāṇānañca adhigamūpāyo hoti,
tika-s0501t:1043_19: tasmā so paññāvimuttiparicayo catutthajjhāne daṭṭhabboyevāti saṅkhepattho.
tika-s0501t:1043_20: Vitthārato pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tattha upekkhāsatipārisuddhibhāvenā”tiādinā vā “aparo nayo”tiādinā vā vuttoyevāti amhehi na vutto.
tika-s0501t:1044_4: te rāgādiaṅgaṇādayo katamāya pakkhā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha aṅgaṇā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1044_5: Tatthāti tesu rāgādiaṅgaṇādīsu aṅgaṇā ca rāgādiaṅgaṇā ca upakkilesā abhijjhādiupakkilesā ca santi,
tika-s0501t:1044_8: Yā iñjanā phandanā yā ca cittassa aṭṭhiti anavaṭṭhānaṃ atthi,
tika-s0501t:1044_9: ayaṃ iñjanā aṭṭhiti diṭṭhipakkho iñjanāya ca aṭṭhitiyā ca micchābhinivesahetubhāvatoti pavicayo kātabbo.
tika-s0501t:1045_0: “Kiṃ pana catutthajjhānacittaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatattāyeva channaṃ abhiññāñāṇānañca manomayiddhivipassanāñāṇānañca
tika-s0501t:1045_3: dukkhindriyaṃ domanassindriyaṃ sukhindriyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ iti cattārindriyāni catutthajjhāne nirujjhanti,
tika-s0501t:1045_5: tasmāpi catutthajjhānacittaṃ vuttappakārānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ ñāṇānaṃ adhigamūpāyo hoti,
tika-s0501t:1045_7: kathaṃ catutthajjhānamattalābhino ciṇṇavasībhāvo siyā”ti vattabbattā so catutthajjhānalābhī catutthajjhāneyeva
tika-s0501t:1045_8: aṭṭhatvā arūpasamāpattiyopi evaṃ katvā nibbatteti bhāveti,
tika-s0501t:1045_9: tasmā ciṇṇavasībhāvo hotīti dassetuṃ “so uparimaṃ samāpatti”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1046_0: So rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānalābhī yogāvacaro rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānasamāpattito uparimaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ santato santatarato manasi karoti.
tika-s0501t:1046_1: Yathāvuttaṃ uparimaṃ samāpattiṃ santato manasi karoto tassa catutthajjhānalābhino yogāvacarassa catutthajjhāne
tika-s0501t:1046_2: saññā saññāpadhānā samāpatti oḷārikā viya hutvā saṇṭhahati,
tika-s0501t:1046_3: paṭighasaññā ca ukkaṇṭhā anabhirati hutvā saṇṭhahati,
tika-s0501t:1046_4: so yathāvuttena vidhinā manasi karonto yogāvacaro sabbaso niravasesato rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1046_5: atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā “ākāsaṃ ananta”nti manasi katvā pavattamānaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ
tika-s0501t:1046_9: Evaṃ rūpāvacarajjhāne ādīnavadassī hutvā tā rūpasaññānānattasaññāyo ārammaṇe samatikkamati,
tika-s0501t:1046_10: assa yogāvacarassa paṭighasaññā ca abbhatthaṃ gacchati.
tika-s0501t:1046_12: santavuttinā arūpāvacarasamādhinā samāhitassa yogāvacarassa obhāso rūpāvacarajjhānobhāso antaradhāyati.
tika-s0501t:1046_13: Rūpānaṃ kasiṇarūpānaṃ jhānacakkhunā dassanañca antaradhāyatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1047_1: samāhitassa obhāso ca rūpānaṃ dassanañca antaradhāyati,
tika-s0501t:1047_5: so duvidhopi samādhi anabhijjhābyāpādavīriyārambhehi tīhi upakārakaṅgehi ca passaddhisatīhi dvīhi parikkhāraṅgehi
tika-s0501t:1047_6: ca avikkhittena ekena sabhāvaṅgena ca chahi aṅgehi samannāgatoti paccavekkhitabbo punappunaṃ cintetabbo
tika-s0501t:1047_8: “Kathaṃ kattha paccavekkhitabbo”ti pucchitabbattā “anabhijjhāsahagataṃ me mānasaṃ sabbaloke”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1048_1: “Paññāvimuttī”ti vuttassa arahattaphalassa samādhissa samathavipassanāsaṅkhātā pubbabhāgapaṭipadā samādhimukhena ācariyena vibhattā,
tika-s0501t:1048_2: “tāya paṭipadāya labhitabbo arahattaphalasamādhi kittakena veditabbo”ti pucchitabbattā “so samādhi pañcavidhena veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1049_0: “Kathaṃ pañcavidhañāṇadassanaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ bhavatī”ti vattabbattā “ayaṃ samādhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1049_1: Ayaṃ arahattaphalasamādhi appitappitakkhaṇe phalasamāpattisukhattā paccuppannasukho hoti,
tika-s0501t:1049_2: iti paccavekkhantassa assa arahato paccattameva ñāṇadassanaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ bhavati.
tika-s0501t:1049_3: Ayaṃ arahattaphalasamādhi āyatiṃ samāpajjitabbassa arahattaphalasamādhissa upanissayapaccayattā āyatiṃ sukhavipāko hoti,
tika-s0501t:1049_8: Ayaṃ arahattaphalasamādhi akāpurisehi sammāsambuddhapaccekabuddhasāvakabuddhehi sevitabbattā akāpurisasevito hoti,
tika-s0501t:1049_10: Ayaṃ arahattaphalasamādhi aṅgasantakilesadarathasantattā santo ceva divasampi samāpajjantassa atittikaraṇato
tika-s0501t:1049_11: paṇīto ca paṭippassaddhakilesena arahatā puggalena laddhattā paṭippassaddhiladdho ca arahattamaggasamādhisaṅkhātena
tika-s0501t:1049_12: ekodibhāvena adhigatattā ekodibhāvādhigato ca sasaṅkhārena sapayogena adhigatattā,
tika-s0501t:1049_16: iti paccavekkhantassa assa arahato paccattameva ñāṇadassanaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ bhavatīti pañcavidhena ñāṇadassanena
tika-s0501t:1050_1: kittakā vipassanā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha yo ca samādhi paccuppannasukho”tiādi vuttaṃ. Samatho,
tika-s0501t:1050_5: “tassa arahattaphalasamādhissa pubbabhāgapaṭipadāyaṃ vutto samādhi kittakena veditabbo”ti pucchitabbattā “so samādhi pañcavidhena veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1050_16: kittakā vipassanā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha yo ca pītipharaṇo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1051_4: Imehi dasahi ārammaṇehi kasiṇehipi samādhi vicinitvā veditabboti.
tika-s0501t:1051_7: Kasiṇanti ca kasiṇamaṇḍalampi parikammampi paṭibhāganimittampi tasmiṃ paṭibhāganimitte uppannajjhānampi vuccati,
tika-s0501t:1052_1: udāhu aññopi yojetabbo”ti vattabbattā satipaṭṭhānādipubbabhāgapaṭipadābhedena anekabhedabhinno niravaseso
tika-s0501t:1052_2: ariyamaggopi vicayitvā yojetabboti dassetuṃ “evaṃ sabbo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1052_3: Tattha evanti mayā vuttanayena vuttanayānusārena sabbo niravaseso satipaṭṭhānādipubbabhāgapaṭipadābhedena anekabhedabhinno ariyo maggo yojetabbo. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0501t:1052_4: Yena yena anabhijjhādiākārena paccuppannasukhatādiākārena samādhi mayā vutto,
tika-s0501t:1052_5: tena tena anabhijjhādiākārena paccuppannasukhatādiākārena yo yo ariyamaggo samathena yojetuṃ sambhavati,
tika-s0501t:1052_6: so so ariyamaggo samathena vicayitvā yojayitabbo.
tika-s0501t:1052_7: Yo yo ariyamaggo vipassanāya yojetuṃ sambhavati,
tika-s0501t:1052_8: so so ariyamaggo vipassanāya yojayitvā yojayitabboti attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0501t:1053_1: te samathādhiṭṭhānā vipassanādhammā katamehi dhammehi saṅgahitā”ti pucchitabbattā “te tīhi dhammehi saṅgahitā
tika-s0501t:1053_3: te samathādhiṭṭhānā vipassanādhammā “aniccatāya paññāya dukkhatāya paññāya anattatāya paññāyā”ti tīhi anupassanādhammehi saṅgahitā gaṇhitāti attho.
tika-s0501t:1053_4: Aniccatādinā sahacaraṇato anupassanāpaññāpi “aniccatā dukkhatā anattatā”ti vuccati.
tika-s0501t:1054_0: “Yo yogī puggalo samathādhiṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāvayamāno hoti,
tika-s0501t:1054_1: so yogī puggalo kiṃ bhāvayatī”ti pucchitabbattā “so samathavipassanaṃ bhāvayamāno”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1055_0: Samathavipassanādīni bhāvayamāno puggalo rāgacarito dosacarito mohacaritoti tividho,
tika-s0501t:1055_1: “tattha katamo puggalo katamena katamena vimokkhamukhena niyyāti,
tika-s0501t:1055_11: katamaṃ katamaṃ vijaṭento niyyātī”ti pucchitabbattā “rāgacarito puggalo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1055_12: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “idāni yesaṃ puggalānaṃ yattha sikkhantānaṃ visesato niyyānamukhāni,
tika-s0501t:1055_14: tehi saddhiṃ tāni dassetuṃ ‘rāgacarito’tiādi vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1056_0: “Kasmā tīṇi vimokkhamukhāni bhāvayanto tayo khandhe bhāvayatī”ti vattabbattā “tattha suññatavimokkhamukha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1056_5: Iti tīhi vimokkhamukhehi tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ saṅgahitattā tīṇi vimokkhamukhāni bhāvayanto so yogī puggalo
tika-s0501t:1056_6: tayo khandhe bhāvayatiyevāti paññāpadhānādibhāvo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto.
tika-s0501t:1056_7: Tayo khandhe bhāvayanto ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvayati.
tika-s0501t:1056_8: “Kasmā bhāvayatī”ti vattabbattā kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha yā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1057_2: “kathaṃ samathavipassanābhāvo jānitabbo”ti vattabbattā tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ samathavipassanābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha sīlakkhandho cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1057_4: tassa yogino puggalassa bhavaṅgāni katamaṃ bhāvanaṃ gacchantī”ti pucchitabbattā “yo samathavipassanaṃ bhāveti,
tika-s0501t:1057_6: Kāyo ca cittañca dve bhavaṅgāni upapattibhavassa aṅgāni bhāvanaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ gacchanti.
tika-s0501t:1057_7: Sīlañca samādhi ca dve padāni dve pādā bhavanirodhagāminī paṭipadā bhāvanaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ gacchanti.
tika-s0501t:1058_6: sammāvāyāmo ca dve dhammā bhāvanaṃ gacchanti kāyasamācārasīlattā.
tika-s0501t:1058_7: Sīle vācāsaṃvaraājīvasaṃvaravasena pavatte sīle bhāviyamāne sati sammāvācā ca sammāājīvo ca dve dhammā bhāvanaṃ gacchanti vācādisaṃvarasīlattā.
tika-s0501t:1058_8: Citte cittasaṃvaravasena pavatte citte bhāviyamāne sati sammāsati ca sammāsamādhi ca dve dhammā bhāvanaṃ gacchanti cittasaṃvarasīlattā.
tika-s0501t:1058_9: Paññāya bhāviyamānāya sati sammādiṭṭhi ca sammāsaṅkappo ca dve dhammā bhāvanaṃ gacchanti samānattā,
tika-s0501t:1058_11: Sammāsaṅkappena hi punappunaṃ saṅkappantassa paññā vaḍḍhatīti.
tika-s0501t:1059_0: “Sammākammanto ca sammāvāyāmo ca dve dhammā kāyavaseneva vibhattā vicetabbā kiṃ,
tika-s0501t:1059_1: udāhu cittavasena vibhattā vicetabbā ki”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha yo ca sammākammanto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1059_3: taṃsahito yo ca sammāvāyāmo siyā kāyiko,
tika-s0501t:1059_5: taṃsahito yo ca sammāvāyāmo siyā cetasiko,
tika-s0501t:1059_6: tattha tesu kāyikacetasikabhūtesu sammākammantasammāvāyāmesu yo sammākammantasammāvāyāmo kāyasaṅgaho,
tika-s0501t:1059_8: kāyasaṃvare vā bhāvite sati bhāvanaṃ gacchati.
tika-s0501t:1059_10: so sammākammantasammāvāyāmo citte cittasaṃvare bhāvite sati bhāvanaṃ gacchatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1060_0: “Samathavipassanaṃ bhāvayanto so yogī puggalo kittakaṃ adhigamaṃ gacchatī”ti vicayitabbattā “so samathavipassanaṃ bhāvayanto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1060_3: “Kena katamo adhigamo hotī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha samathenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1061_1: “Arakkhitena cittenā”tiādisuttattho veneyyānaṃ arahattaphalavimuttimukhena ācariyena vicayito vibhatto,
tika-s0501t:1061_3: “desakassa dasabalasamannāgatassa dasa balāni kathaṃ vicayitabbānī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha yo desayati,
tika-s0501t:1062_0: “Iti mahāthero ‘tasmā rakkhitacittassā’ti gāthāya vasena arahattaphalavimuttimukhena vicayahārasampātaṃ niddisanto,
tika-s0501t:1062_1: desanākusalatāya anekehi suttappadesehi tassā pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya bhāvanāvisesānaṃ bhāvanānisaṃsānañca
tika-s0501t:1062_3: idāni dasannaṃ tathāgatabalānampi vasena taṃ dassetuṃ ‘tattha yo desayatī’tiādimāhā”ti –
tika-s0501t:1063_1: Tattha tatthāti tesu samathavipassanaṃ bhāvayantesu sāsitabbasāsakesu.
tika-s0501t:1063_2: Dasabalasamannāgato yo desako satthā “arakkhitena cittenā”tiādidhammaṃ deseti,
tika-s0501t:1063_4: tassa desakassa satthuno dasa balāni vicayitabbānīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1064_1: Tesu dasasu tathāgatabalesu ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ nāma,
tika-s0501t:1064_2: “taṃ balaṃ kathaṃ vicayitabba”nti pucchitabbattā “so tathā ovadito”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1064_5: “Etaṃ ṭhānaṃ na vijjatī”ti jānanaṃ aṭṭhānañāṇaṃ nāma,
tika-s0501t:1064_6: “etaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti jānanaṃ ṭhānañāṇaṃ nāmāti ṭhānāṭṭhānānaṃ jānanañāṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabbanti adhippāyo veditabbo. (1)
tika-s0501t:1065_1: Ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ ācariyena vicayitaṃ vibhattaṃ amhehi ca ñātaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1065_2: “kathaṃ sabbatthagāminipaṭipadāñāṇaṃ dutiyatathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabba”nti pucchitabbattā “iti ṭhānāṭṭhānatā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1065_4: ayaṃ paṭipadā imasmiṃ bhave gāminī”ti sabbattha gāminiyā paṭipadāya jānanañāṇaṃ sabbatthagāminipaṭipadāñāṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:1065_5: nāmāti sabbatthagāminipaṭipadāñāṇaṃ dutiyaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabbanti adhippāyo. (2)
tika-s0501t:1066_3: “kathaṃ anekadhātunānādhātuñāṇaṃ tatiyaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabba”nti pucchitabbattā “iti sabbatthagāminī paṭipadā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1066_4: “Ayaṃ dhātu ca ayaṃ dhātu ca anekadhātu nāma,
tika-s0501t:1066_5: ayaṃ dhātu ca ayaṃ dhātu ca nānādhātu nāmā”ti anekadhātunānādhātūnaṃ jānanañāṇaṃ anekadhātunānādhātuñāṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:1067_1: Anekadhātunānādhātuñāṇaṃ tatiyaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ ācariyena vicayitaṃ vibhattaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1067_3: “kathaṃ sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikatāñāṇaṃ catutthaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabba”nti pucchitabbattā “iti anekadhātunānādhātukassa lokassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1067_5: ime sattā evaṃ adhimuttā”ti sattānaṃ adhimuccanānaṃ jānanañāṇaṃ sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikatāñāṇaṃ nāmāti
tika-s0501t:1068_0: Sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikatāñāṇaṃ catutthaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ ācariyena vibhattaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1068_2: “kathaṃ vipākavemattatāñāṇaṃ pañcamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabba”nti pucchitabbattā “iti te yathādhimuttā cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1068_6: imassa sukkakammassa ayaṃ vipāko”ti evamādīhi vipākānaṃ nānattajānanañāṇaṃ vipākavemattatāñāṇaṃ nāmāti
tika-s0501t:1069_3: “kathaṃ jhānānaṃ saṃkilesavodānavuṭṭhānañāṇaṃ chaṭṭhaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabba”nti pucchitabbattā “iti tathā samādinnāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1069_4: “Evaṃ samādinnānaṃ kammānaṃ jhānānaṃ vimokkhānaṃ samādhīnaṃ samāpattīnaṃ ayaṃ saṃkileso,
tika-s0501t:1069_9: evaṃ vuṭṭhahatī”ti jhānānaṃ saṃkilesavodānavuṭṭhānānaṃ anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ jhānānaṃ saṃkilesavodānavuṭṭhānañāṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:1069_10: nāmāti jhānānaṃ saṃkilesavodānavuṭṭhānañāṇaṃ chaṭṭhaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabbanti. (5)
tika-s0501t:1070_1: Jhānānaṃ saṃkilesañāṇaṃ chaṭṭhaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ ācariyena vicayitaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1070_2: “kathaṃ indriyaparopariyattavemattatāñāṇaṃ sattamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabba”nti pucchitabbattā “iti tasseva samādhissā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1070_4: evaṃ akampiyaṭṭhena balānī”ti jānanena saha “ayaṃ mudindriyo,
tika-s0501t:1071_3: kathaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ navamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabba”nti pucchitabbattā “iti tattha yaṃ anekavihita”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1071_5: vā sākārassa sauddesassa anekavihitapubbenivāsassa taṃtaṃbhavassa asesato jānanañāṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ
tika-s0501t:1072_1: jānanañāṇaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ nāmāti dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ navamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabbanti. (8- 9)
tika-s0501t:1073_1: “kathaṃ sabbāsavakkhayañāṇaṃ dasamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabba”nti pucchitabbattā “iti tattha ya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1073_3: idaṃ kilesamāranihanaṃ ñāṇaṃ sabbāsavakkhayañāṇaṃ nāmāti sabbāsavakkhayañāṇaṃ dasamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabbanti ayaṃ saṅkhepattho.
tika-s0501t:1073_4: Vitthārato pana pāḷito ca aṭṭhakathāto ca yatipotānampi pākaṭo bhaveyyāti maññitvā na dassito.(10)
tika-s0501t:1074_0: “Ettakova vicayahārasampāto paripuṇṇo”ti vattabbattā “niyutto vicayo hārasampāto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1074_2: te te suttappadesatthā yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena vicayahārasampātena vicayitabbā,
tika-s0501t:1074_3: so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto vicayahārasampāto niyutto yathārahaṃ nīharitvā yujjitabboti attho gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t:1079_1: Yena yena vicayahārasampātena suttappadesatthā ācariyena vicayitabbā,
tika-s0501t:1079_6: “evaṃ nānānayehi vicayahārasampātaṃ vitthāretvā idāni yuttihārasampātādīni dassetuṃ ‘tattha katamo yuttihārasampāto’tiādi āraddha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1079_7: Tatthāti tesu desanāhārasampātādīsu soḷasasu hārasampātesu katamo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso yuttihārasampāto nāmāti pucchati,
tika-s0501t:1079_8: pucchitvā yasmiṃ suttappadese vuttānaṃ atthānaṃ yuttibhāvo vicāretabbo,
tika-s0501t:1083_1: Tassaṃ gāthāyaṃ tasmā arakkhitacittassa māravasānugatattā satisaṃvaraindriyasaṃvarādivasena bhikkhu rakkhitacitto assa bhaveyya,
tika-s0501t:1083_2: tasmā kāmavitakkādimicchāsaṅkappagocarassa māravasānugatattā nekkhammasaṅkappādivasena bhikkhu sammāsaṅkappagocaro assa bhaveyya,
tika-s0501t:1083_3: tasmā micchādiṭṭhihatacittassa māravasānugatattā yonisomanasikārena bhikkhu udayabbayaṃ ñatvāna sammādiṭṭhipurekkhāro assa bhaveyya,
tika-s0501t:1083_4: tasmā thinamiddhena hatacittassa māravasānugatattā vīriyavasena bhikkhu thinamiddhābhibhū assa bhaveyya,
tika-s0501t:1083_5: tādiso bhikkhu sabbā duggatiyo jahe jahissatīti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0501t:1084_0: “Tassaṃ gāthāyaṃ kathaṃ yuttibhāvo vicāretabbo”ti vattabbattā “tasmā rakkhitacittassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1084_1: Rakkhitacittassa sammāsaṅkappagocaro bhavissatīti attho yujjati eva,
tika-s0501t:1084_3: Micchāsaṅkappānampi jahitattā sammādiṭṭhipurekkhāro hutvā viharanto udayabbayaṃ paṭivijjhissatīti attho
tika-s0501t:1084_5: Udayabbayaṃ paṭivijjhanto sabbā duggatiyo jahissatīti attho yujjati udayabbayānupassanānukkamena ariyamaggasambhavato.
tika-s0501t:1084_6: Sabbā duggatiyo jahanto sabbāni duggativinipātabhayāni samatikkamissatīti attho yujjati sabbesaṃ duggativinipātabhayānaṃ anuppajjanato.
tika-s0501t:1085_1: Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena yuttihārasampātena suttappadesatthānaṃ yuttibhāvo vicāretabbo,
tika-s0501t:1085_2: so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto yuttihārasampāto niyutto yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yujjitabboti attho gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t:1090_1: Yena yena yuttihārasampātena suttappadesatthānaṃ yuttibhāvo ācariyena vibhāvito,
tika-s0501t:1090_4: “katamo padaṭṭhānahārasampāto”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo padaṭṭhāno hārasampāto”ti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1091_0: Pucchitvā yasmiṃ suttappadese vuttāni padaṭṭhānāni nīharitāni,
tika-s0501t:1091_4: “Katame gāthātthā katamesaṃ dhammānaṃ padaṭṭhānānī”ti pucchitabbattā “tasmā rakkhitacittassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1091_5: “Tasmā rakkhitacittassā”ti suttappadesassa atthabhūtā indriyesu guttadvāratā tiṇṇaṃ sucaritānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ nāma sucaritapāripūriyā āsannakāraṇattā.
tika-s0501t:1091_6: “Sammāsaṅkappagocaro”ti suttappadesassa atthabhūtā nekkhammasaṅkappādayo sammāsaṅkappā samathassa padaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1091_9: ca vipassanāya padaṭṭhānaṃ nāma aniccānupassanādīnaṃ visesakāraṇattā.
tika-s0501t:1091_10: “Ñatvāna udayabbaya”nti suttappadesassa atthabhūtā udayabbayānupassanāpaññā dassanabhūmiyā padaṭṭhānaṃ nāma paṭhamamaggādhigamassa āsannakāraṇattā.
tika-s0501t:1091_11: “Thinamiddhābhibhū bhikkhū”ti suttappadesassa atthabhūtaṃ thinamiddhābhibhavanaṃ vīriyassa padaṭṭhānaṃ nāma āsannakāraṇattā.
tika-s0501t:1091_12: “Sabbā duggatiyo jahe”ti suttappadesassa atthabhūtā pahātabbajahanabhāvanāya ariyamaggabhāvanāya padaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1092_0: “Ettakova padaṭṭhānahārasampāto paripuṇṇo”ti vattabbattā “niyutto padaṭṭhāno hārasampāto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1092_1: Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena padaṭṭhānahārasampātabhūtena suttappadesatthāni padaṭṭhānāni nīharitāni,
tika-s0501t:1092_2: so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto padaṭṭhānahārasampāto niyutto yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yujjitabboti attho gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t:1097_1: Yena yena padaṭṭhānahārasampātena suttappadesatthāni padaṭṭhānāni ācariyena niddhāritāni,
tika-s0501t:1097_4: “katamo lakkhaṇahārasampāto”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo lakkhaṇo hārasampāto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1097_5: Tattha tesu desanāhārasampātādīsu soḷasasu hārasampātesu katamo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso lakkhaṇahārasampāto nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1098_0: “Katamehi suttatthehi samānalakkhaṇā katame dhammā gahitā”ti pucchitabbattā “tasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1098_2: sammāsaṅkappagocaro”ti suttappadesena vuttaṃ idaṃ rakkhaṇaṃ satindriyaṃ gahitaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1098_3: satindriye gahite saddhādipañcindriyāni gahitāni bhavanti indriyaṭṭhena samānalakkhaṇattā.
tika-s0501t:1098_5: sammādiṭṭhiyā gahitāya ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo gahito bhavati.
tika-s0501t:1098_8: Sammādiṭṭhihetuto sammāsaṅkappo hi yasmā pabhavati, tasmā,
tika-s0501t:1098_9: sammāsaṅkappato sammāvācā hi yasmā pabhavati, tasmā,
tika-s0501t:1098_10: sammāvācāto sammākammanto hi yasmā pabhavati, tasmā,
tika-s0501t:1098_11: sammākammantato sammāājīvo hi yasmā pabhavati, tasmā,
tika-s0501t:1098_12: sammāājīvato sammāvāyāmo hi yasmā pabhavati, tasmā,
tika-s0501t:1098_14: sammāsatito sammāsamādhi hi yasmā pabhavati, tasmā,
tika-s0501t:1098_15: sammāsamādhito sammāvimutti hi yasmā pabhavati, tasmā,
tika-s0501t:1098_16: sammāvimuttito sammāvimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ hi yasmā pabhavati, tasmā,
tika-s0501t:1099_0: “Ettakova lakkhaṇahārasampāto paripuṇṇo”ti vattabbattā “niyutto lakkhaṇo hārasampāto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1099_1: Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena lakkhaṇahārasampātena suttappadesatthā samānalakkhaṇena gahitā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t:1099_2: so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto lakkhaṇahārasampāto niyutto yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yujjitabboti attho gahitoti.
tika-s0501t:1104_1: Yena yena lakkhaṇahārasampātena suttappadesatthā samānalakkhaṇena gahitā,
tika-s0501t:1104_3: “katamo catubyūhahārasampāto”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo catubyūho hārasampāto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1104_4: Tattha tesu desanāhārasampātādīsu soḷasasu hārasampātesu katamo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso catubyūhahārasampāto nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1105_0: “Katamasmiṃ sutte katame nirutyādhippāyanidānapubbāparānusandhayo niddhāritā”ti pucchitabbattā “tasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1105_1: “Tasmā rakkhitacittassā”ti suttappadese “rakkhīyate rakkhita”nti niruttiṃ “paripālīyatī”ti iminā pariyāyena dasseti,
tika-s0501t:1105_21: Esā vuttappakārā paññatti nirutti nāmāti nīharitā.
tika-s0501t:1106_0: Idha suttappadese bhagavato ko adhippāyoti ce puccheyya,
tika-s0501t:1106_1: ye sappurisā sabbāhi duggatīhi parimuccitukāmā bhavissanti,
tika-s0501t:1106_2: te sappurisā dhammacārino rakkhitacittā bhavissantīti ayaṃ adhippāyo.
tika-s0501t:1107_1: kokāliko sāriputtamoggallānesu theresu cittaṃ arakkhitvā padosayitvā mahāpadumaniraye yasmā upapanno,
tika-s0501t:1107_2: yasmā bhagavā ca satiārakkhena samannāgato sabbā duggatiyo jahati,
tika-s0501t:1107_3: tasmā ca sabbā duggatiyo jahitukāmo bhikkhu sappuriso rakkhitacitto assa bhaveyyāti nidānaṃ nīharitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1108_1: suttamhi “satiyā cittaṃ rakkhitabba”nti yaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1108_3: sabbā duggatiyo jahe”ti suttappadeso anusandhi saṃsandati sametīti pubbaparānusandhi niddhāritabboti.
tika-s0501t:1109_0: “Ettakova catubyūhahārasampāto paripuṇṇo”ti vattabbattā “niyutto catubyūho hārasampāto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1109_1: Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena catubyūhahārasampātena nirutyādhippāyanidānapubbāparānusandhi niddhāritabbo,
tika-s0501t:1109_2: so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto catubyūhahārasampāto niyutto yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yujjitabboti attho gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t:1114_3: “katamo āvaṭṭahārasampāto”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo āvaṭṭo hārasampāto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1114_4: Tattha katamo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso āvaṭṭahārasampāto nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1115_2: avihiṃsāsaṅkappasaṅkhātasammāsaṅkappabahulo mettādivasena adhigatāya cittekaggatāya cittaṃ ṭhapento saṃkilesato rakkhitacitto nāma hoti,
tika-s0501t:1115_4: sammāsaṅkappagocaro”ti iminā rakkhitacitte vutte sati yā ekaggatā āvaṭṭetabbā,
tika-s0501t:1115_6: “Sammādiṭṭhipurekkhāro”ti iminā sammādiṭṭhipurekkhāre vutte sati yā paññā āvaṭṭetabbā,
tika-s0501t:1115_8: “Ñatvāna udayabbaya”nti iminā udayabbayañāṇasamannāgate vutte sati yā dukkhaparijānanā āvaṭṭetabbā,
tika-s0501t:1115_10: “Thinamiddhābhibhū bhikkhū”ti iminā puggalādhiṭṭhānena yaṃ thinamiddhābhibhavanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1115_12: “Sammā duggatiyo jahe”ti iminā yo sabbaduggatijahanasaṅkhāto anuppādo vutto,
tika-s0501t:1115_17: samathavipassanāhi maggasaccaṃ āvaṭṭetabbanti imāni cattāri saccāni āvaṭṭetabbānīti.
tika-s0501t:1116_0: “Ettakova āvaṭṭo hārasampāto paripuṇṇo”ti vattabbattā “niyutto āvaṭṭo hārasampāto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1116_1: Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena āvaṭṭahārasampātena samathādayo āvaṭṭetabbā,
tika-s0501t:1116_2: so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto āvaṭṭahārasampāto niyutto yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yujjitabboti attho gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t:1121_4: Tattha katamo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso vibhattihārasampāto nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1122_0: “Katame suttatthā kattha vibhattā”ti pucchitabbattā “tasmā rakkhitacittassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1122_3: tissaṃ gāthāyaṃ vutto kusalapakkho dhammo kusalapakkhena dhammena satisaṃvaro dhammo niddisitabbo vibhajitabbo,
tika-s0501t:1123_2: manodvārasaṃvaro”ti chabbidhena kusalapakkhena dhammena niddisitabbo vibhajitabbo.
tika-s0501t:1123_3: “Sammāsaṅkappo”ti padena vutto kusalapakkho sammāsaṅkappo dhammo “nekkhammasaṅkappo abyāpāda-
tika-s0501t:1123_4: saṅkappo avihiṃsāsaṅkappo”ti tividhena kusalapakkhena dhammena vibhajitabbo.
tika-s0501t:1123_12: idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu ñāṇa”nti aṭṭhavidhena kusalapakkhena dhammena vibhajitabbā.
tika-s0501t:1123_13: “Ñatvāna udayabbaya”nti padena vuttaṃ kusalapakkhaudayabbayañāṇaṃ dhammajātaṃ paññāsavidhena udayabbayañāṇena kusalapakkhena vibhajitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1125_5: “Micchādiṭṭhihatenā”ti padena gahito micchāsaṅkappo “kāmavitakko byāpādavitakko vihiṃsāvitakko”ti tividhena vibhajitabbo.
tika-s0501t:1125_6: “Micchādiṭṭhī”ti padena vuttā micchādiṭṭhi “dukkhe aññāṇaṃ…pe…idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇa”nti aṭṭhavidhena vibhajitabbā,
tika-s0501t:1126_1: Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena vibhattihārasampātena suttappadesatthā vibhattā,
tika-s0501t:1126_2: so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto vibhattihārasampāto niyuttoti yathāraha niddhāretvā yujjitabboti attho gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t:1131_3: “katamo parivattanahārasampāto”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo parivattano hārasampāto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1132_4: tāya samathavipassanāya bhāvitāya akusalānaṃ nirodho phalaṃ payojanaṃ hoti,
tika-s0501t:1132_8: Paṭipakkhena pana samathavipassanāya abhāvitāya akusalānaṃ anirodho,
tika-s0501t:1133_0: “Ettakova parivattanahārasampāto paripuṇṇo”ti vattabbattā “niyutto parivattano hārasampāto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1133_1: Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena parivattanahārasampātena suttappadesatthā parivattetabbā,
tika-s0501t:1133_2: so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto parivattanahārasampāto niyutto yathārahaṃ nīharitvā yujjitabboti attho gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t:1138_3: “katamo vevacano hārasampāto”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo vevacano hārasampāto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1139_1: suttapadānaṃ vā katamāni vevacanānī”ti pucchitabbattā “tasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1139_9: “Sammāsaṅkappagocaro”ti ettha sammāsaṅkappassa “nekkhammasaṅkappo abyāpādasaṅkappo avihiṃsāsaṅkappo”ti yaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1139_12: “Sammādiṭṭhipurekkhāro”ti ettha sammādiṭṭhipadassa “sammādiṭṭhi nāma paññāsatthaṃ paññākhaggo paññāratanaṃ
tika-s0501t:1139_17: cittassa akallatā akammaññatā onāho pariyonāho antosaṅkoco”ti yaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1139_19: “Kāyassa akallatā akammaññatā kāyālasiyaṃ soppaṃ supanā suppitatta”nti yaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1139_23: “Duggati apāyo vinipāto vaṭṭadukkhaṃ saṃsāro”tiādikaṃ yaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1140_0: “Ettakova vevacanahārasampāto paripuṇṇo”ti vattabbattā “niyutto vevacano hārasampāto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1140_1: Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena vevacanahārasampātena vevacanāni nīharitāni,
tika-s0501t:1140_2: so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto vevacanahārasampāto niyutto yathāsambhavaṃ nīharitvā yujjitabboti attho gahitoti.
tika-s0501t:1146_0: “Katamā suttappadesabhūtā paññatti katamesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññattī”ti pucchitabbattā “tasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1146_1: “Tasmā rakkhitacittassā”ti paññatti satiyā padaṭṭhānassa rakkhitabbassa cittassa paññāpanato satiyā padaṭṭhānapaññatti nāma.
tika-s0501t:1146_2: Satiyā hi rakkhitabbaṃ cittaṃ satiyā padaṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1146_4: “adhiṭṭhahitvā rakkhantiyā satiyā rakkhiyamānaṃ cittaṃ tassā adhiṭṭhānaṃ viya hotī”ti.
tika-s0501t:1146_5: “Sammāsaṅkappagocaro”ti paññatti samathassa bhāvanāya paññāpanato samathassa bhāvanāpaññatti nāma.
tika-s0501t:1146_7: ñatvāna udayabbaya”nti paññatti dassanabhūmiyā nikkhepassa paññāpanato nikkhepapaññatti nāma.
tika-s0501t:1146_8: “Thinamiddhābhibhū bhikkhū”ti samudayassa anavasesappahānassa paññāpanato anavasesappahānapaññatti nāma.
tika-s0501t:1146_9: “Sabbā duggatiyo jahe”ti paññatti maggassa ariyamaggassa bhāvanāya paññāpanato bhāvanāpaññatti nāma.
tika-s0501t:1147_1: Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena paññattihārasampātena paññattippabhedā niddhāritā,
tika-s0501t:1147_2: so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto paññattihārasampāto niyutto yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yujjitabboti attho gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t:1152_3: “katamo otaraṇo hārasampāto”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo otaraṇo hārasampāto”tiādimāha.
tika-s0501t:1153_0: “Tattha tissaṃ gāthāyaṃ katamāni indriyāni niddhāretvā katamehi niddhāritehi dhammehi otaratī”ti pucchitabbattā “tasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1153_4: sammādiṭṭhiyā gahitāya pañcindriyāni saddhādipañcindriyāni gahitāni bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1154_0: Tāniyeva saddhādipañcindriyāni vijjāya upakārattā vā padaṭṭhānattā vā vijjā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t:1154_1: vijjuppādā tādisāya vijjāya uppādā uppādahetuto avijjānirodho sambhavati,
tika-s0501t:1154_4: Ayaṃ otaraṇā paṭiccasamuppādena pañcindriyānaṃ otaraṇā nāma.
tika-s0501t:1155_0: Tāniyeva pañcindriyāni sīlakkhandhena samādhikkhandhena paññākkhandhena tīhi khandhehi saṅgahitāni bhavanti saddhāvīriyehi sīlasambhavato,
tika-s0501t:1155_2: Ayaṃ otaraṇā khandhehi pañcindriyānaṃ otaraṇā nāma.
tika-s0501t:1156_3: te anāsavā saṅkhārā dhammadhātusaṅgahitā bhavanti dhammadhātuyā antogadhattā.
tika-s0501t:1156_4: Ayaṃ otaraṇā dhātūhi pañcindriyānaṃ otaraṇā nāma.
tika-s0501t:1157_3: Ayaṃ otaraṇā āyatanehi dhammadhātuyā otaraṇā nāma.
tika-s0501t:1158_0: “Ettakova otaraṇo hārasampāto paripuṇṇo”ti vattabbattā “niyutto otaraṇo hārasampāto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1158_1: Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena otaraṇahārasampātena suttappadesatthā otaritabbā,
tika-s0501t:1158_2: so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto otaraṇo hārasampāto niyutto yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yujjitabboti attho gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t:1162_0: Ito paṭṭhāya “tattha katamo”tiādianusandhyattho ca pariyosāne “niyutto”tiādianusandhyattho ca vuttanayānusāreneva viññātabbo.
tika-s0501t:1162_1: Katthaci katthaci pāṭhe apākaṭaṃyeva yathābalaṃ kathayissāma.
tika-s0501t:1164_4: Yattha pañhe pana ārambho attho na suddho aparipuṇṇo koci vissajjetabbo avasiṭṭho,
tika-s0501t:1164_5: so pañho tāva vissajjito na bhavati.
tika-s0501t:1166_4: so sammāsaṅkappo vipassanāya parikkhāroti vibhajitvā yojetabbo.
tika-s0501t:1168_2: taṃ rakkhitacittaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sucaritānaṃ kammānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1168_3: Sammādiṭṭhiyā bhāvitāya ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvito bhavati ekato bhāvitabbattā,
tika-s0501t:1169_0: “Desanāhārasampātādiko hārasampāto yena soḷasappabhedabhāvena suttappadesatthe niddhāretvā yujjito,
tika-s0501t:1169_1: soḷasappabhedabhāvo kena amhehi saddahitabbo”ti vattabbattā “tenāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1170_1: Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena desanāhārasampātena suttappadesatthā niddhāritā,
tika-s0501t:1170_2: so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto desanāhārasampātādihārasampāto niyutto yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yujjitabboti attho gahetabbo,
tika-s0501t:1173_0: Paṇḍitehi pana aṭṭhakathāṭīkānusārena gambhīrattho vitthārato vibhajitvā gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t:1175_1: Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena desanāhārasampātādinā hārasampātena ekasuttappadesatthā niddhāretvā vibhattā,
tika-s0501t:1175_5: ekasuttavasena ca hāravicāraṃ dassetvā idāni nayavicāraṃ dassetuṃ ‘tattha katamaṃ nayasamuṭṭhāna’ntiādi āraddha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1175_6: “Tattha katamo nandiyāvaṭṭanayo”tiādiṃ anārabhitvā “tattha katamaṃ nayasamuṭṭhāna”ntiādiārambhane kāraṇaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttameva.
tika-s0501t:1175_7: Tattha tatthāti tesu hārādīsu yo atthanayo saṃvaṇṇanānayena niddiṭṭho,
tika-s0501t:1175_8: tasseva atthanayassa samuṭṭhānaṃ bhūmiṃ pucchati “katamaṃ nayasamuṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-s0501t:1176_1: tathāpi atthanayasaṃvaṇṇanānayānaṃ visesassa pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ puna kathayissāma.
tika-s0501t:1176_2: Taṇhāavijjāhi saṃkilesapakkhassa suttatthassa catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso
tika-s0501t:1176_3: ceva samathavipassanāhi vodānapakkhassa suttatthassa catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso
tika-s0501t:1176_5: Tīhi akusalamūlehi lobhādīhi saṃkilesapakkhassa suttatthassa catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso
tika-s0501t:1176_6: ceva tīhi kusalamūlehi alobhādīhi vodānapakkhassa suttatthassa catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇo
tika-s0501t:1176_8: Catūhi subhasaññādīhi vipallāsehi sakalasaṃkilesapakkhassa suttatthassa catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇo
tika-s0501t:1176_9: saṃvaṇṇanāviseso ceva catūhi asubhasaññādīhi avipallāsehi satipaṭṭhānehi,
tika-s0501t:1176_10: saddhindriyehi vā vodānapakkhassa suttatthassa catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso
tika-s0501t:1176_11: ca sīhavikkīḷito nayo nāmāti vuttā nayā saṃvaṇṇanānayā nāma.
tika-s0501t:1177_0: Nayā pana nānāsuttato niddhāritehi taṇhāavijjādīhi mūlapadehi catusaccayojanāya nayato anubujjhiyamāno dukkhādiattho.
tika-s0501t:1177_1: So hi maggañāṇaṃ nayati sampāpetīti “nayo”ti vutto,
tika-s0501t:1177_4: Tasmā catusaccayojanāya nayaggāhato nīyati anupucchīyatīti nayo, ko so?
tika-s0501t:1177_9: So hi maggañāṇaṃ nayati sampāpetīti nayo”ti.
tika-s0501t:1177_10: Samuṭṭhahanti nayā etenāti samuṭṭhānaṃ, kiṃ taṃ?
tika-s0501t:1177_14: Atha vā avijjātaṇhādīhi catusaccayojanā samuṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1177_18: Evaṃ atthe gayhamāne sati saṃvaṇṇanānayāpi gahitā honti,
tika-s0501t:1178_0: “Katamaṃ nandiyāvaṭṭanayasamuṭṭhāna”nti pucchitabbattā paṭhamaṃ nandiyāvaṭṭanayasamuṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ “pubbā koṭi na paññāyatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1178_1: Nandiyāvaṭṭanayasamuṭṭhānabhūtāya avijjāya ca taṇhāya ca pubbā koṭi “asukassa buddhassa bhagavato uppajjanakāle uppannā,
tika-s0501t:1178_2: asukassa cakkavattino uppajjanakāle uppannā”ti na paññāyati koṭiyā abhāvatoti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1178_4: katamā saṃyojana”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha avijjā nīvaraṇaṃ taṇhā saṃyojana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1178_10: taṇhāsaṃyojanā sattā kathaṃ vicaranti kathaṃ vuccantī”ti pucchitabbattā “avijjānīvaraṇā sattā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1178_12: Avijjāya saṃyuttā viya pavattā avijjāya abhinivisavatthūsu saṃyuttā viya pavattā sattā avijjāpakkhena
tika-s0501t:1178_13: vipallāsena niccādiabhinivesavatthubhūte rūpādiārammaṇe vicaranti vividhā caranti pavattanti,
tika-s0501t:1178_17: taṇhāya vā ārammaṇabhūte vatthukāme saṃyuttā viya pavattā sattā taṇhāpakkhena aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritena
tika-s0501t:1179_1: taṇhācaritā sattā kaṃ paṭipattiṃ anuyuttā viharantī”ti pucchitabbattā “diṭṭhicaritā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1179_2: Diṭṭhicaritā sattā ito sāsanato bahiddhā pabbajitā hontāpi “sukhena adhigantabbaṃ sukhaṃ natthi,
tika-s0501t:1179_3: dukkhena adhigantabbaṃ sukhaṃ pana atthī”ti manasi karontā attakilamathānuyogaṃ pañcātapādipaṭipattiṃ anuyuttā viharanti.
tika-s0501t:1179_4: Taṇhācaritā sattā ito sāsanato bahiddhā pabbajitā hontāpi “kāme paṭisevantā lokaṃ vaḍḍhāpentā bahuṃ puññaṃ
tika-s0501t:1179_5: vaḍḍhāpentī”ti manasi karontā kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogaṃ paṭipattiṃ anuyuttā viharanti.
tika-s0501t:1180_1: kasmā taṇhācaritā tathāvidhaṃ paṭipattiṃ anuyuttā viharantī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha kiṃ kāraṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1180_5: Ito sāsanato bahiddhā yesaṃ puggalānaṃ saccavavatthānaṃ natthi,
tika-s0501t:1180_7: samathavipassanākosallaṃ vā upasamasukhappatti vā kuto atthi,
tika-s0501t:1180_8: te puggalā upasamasukhassa anabhiññā viparītacetā hutvā evaṃ āhaṃsu “sukhena adhigantabbaṃ sukhaṃ natthi,
tika-s0501t:1180_10: Te evaṃsaññī evaṃdiṭṭhī dukkhena sukhaṃ patthayamānā hutvā attakilamathānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti.
tika-s0501t:1180_11: Ito sāsanato bahiddhā yesaṃ puggalānaṃ saccavavatthānaṃ natthi,
tika-s0501t:1180_13: samathavipassanākosallaṃ vā upasamasukhappatti vā kuto atthi,
tika-s0501t:1180_14: te puggalā upasamasukhassa anabhiññā viparītacetā hutvā evamāhaṃsu “yo kāme paṭisevati,
tika-s0501t:1180_18: Te evaṃsaññī evaṃdiṭṭhī kāmesu sukhasaññī hutvā kāmasukhallikānuyogaṃ anuyuttā ca viharantīti yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t:1181_0: “Tathā viharantā kiṃ vaḍḍhayantī”ti pucchitabbattā “te tadabhiññā santā rogameva vaḍḍhayantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1181_1: “Tathā vaḍḍhayantā rogādīnaṃ bhesajjaṃ samathavipassanaṃ vaḍḍhayanti ki”nti pucchitabbattā “te rogābhitunnā
tika-s0501t:1181_2: gaṇḍapaṭipīḷitā sallānuviddhā nirayatiracchānayonipetāsuresu ummujjanimujjāni karontā ugghātanigghātaṃ
tika-s0501t:1181_9: Attakilamathānuyogo ca kāmasukhallikānuyogo ca saṃkileso hoti,
tika-s0501t:1182_0: “Katamo katamaṃ sacca”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha saṃkileso dukkha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1182_1: Tatthāti tesu saṃkilesādīsu saṃkileso ekadesavasena dukkhaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:1182_2: Tadabhisaṅgoti tasmiṃ saṃkilese abhisaṅgo viya pavatto lokiyadhammo niravasesavasena dukkhasaccaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:1182_3: Atha vā tasmiṃ dukkhe abhisaṅgo viya pavattā taṇhā dukkhasamudayo samudayasaccaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:1183_2: “kathaṃ diṭṭhicaritataṇhācaritānaṃ sakkāyadassane pavattibhedavasena cattāri saccāni niddhāritānī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha diṭṭhicaritā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1183_3: Atha vā “diṭṭhicaritataṇhācaritānaṃ sakkāyadassane katamo pavattibhedo”ti pucchitabbattā imesaṃ sakkāyadassane
tika-s0501t:1183_4: ayaṃ pavattibhedoti vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “tattha diṭṭhicaritā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1183_9: viññāṇaṃ “attā”ti attato upagacchanti diṭṭhicaritānaṃ attābhinivesassa balavabhāvato,
tika-s0501t:1183_10: taṇhācaritā pana rūpaṃ vā “attā”ti rūpavantaṃ attānaṃ upagacchanti attani vā rūpaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1183_12: viññāṇasmiṃ vā “attā”ti attānaṃ upagacchanti taṇhācaritānaṃ attaniyābhinivesassa balavabhāvato.
tika-s0501t:1183_13: Pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu ekekaṃ nissāya catubbidhattā vīsativatthukā ayaṃ micchādiṭṭhi “sakkāyadiṭṭhī”ti vuccati.
tika-s0501t:1183_14: Evaṃ diṭṭhicaritataṇhācaritānaṃ sakkāyadassane pavattibhedo viññātabboti attho.
tika-s0501t:1184_1: Tassā sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā pajahanavasena lokuttarā sammādiṭṭhi paṭipakkho,
tika-s0501t:1184_2: tassā sammādiṭṭhiyā anvāyikā anuguṇabhāvena pavattanakā dhammā ca sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā pajahanavasena paṭipakkhā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1184_6: Ayaṃ sammādiṭṭhiādiko ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tassā sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā paṭipakkho hoti pahāyakattā.
tika-s0501t:1184_7: “Te sammādiṭṭhiyādayo dhammā khandhato kittakā hontī”ti pucchitabbattā “te tayo khandhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1184_9: katamo khandho vipassanā”ti pucchitabbattā “sīlakkhandho samādhikkhandho ca samatho,
tika-s0501t:1184_12: katamo katamaṃ sacca”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha sakkāyo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1185_1: kathaṃ antadvayamajjhimapaṭipadā niddhāritā”ti vattabbattā “tattha ye rūpaṃ attato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1185_2: Tatthāti tesu diṭṭhicaritataṇhācaritesu ye diṭṭhicaritā puggalā rūpaṃ “attā”ti attato upagacchanti…pe…
tika-s0501t:1185_8: attā paraṃ maraṇā na hotī”ti abhinivisanato “ucchedavādino”ti vuccanti.
tika-s0501t:1185_9: Ye taṇhācaritā puggalā rūpaṃ vā “attā”ti rūpavantaṃ attānaṃ upagacchanti…pe…
tika-s0501t:1185_13: Ime taṇhācaritā puggalā “rūpādīhi attā añño aññattā attā nicco sassato”ti abhinivisanato “sassatavādino”ti vuccanti.
tika-s0501t:1186_0: Tattha tesu ucchedavādīsassatavādīpuggalesu pavattā ucchedavādasassatavādā ubho antā antadvayapaṭipadā honti.
tika-s0501t:1186_1: Ayaṃ antadvayapaṭipadā saṃsārapavattanassa hetubhāvato saṃsārapavatti hoti,
tika-s0501t:1186_2: tassa antadvayassa paṭipajjanassa pajahanavasena majjhimapaṭipadāsaṅkhātova ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo paṭipakkho hoti pahāyakattā.
tika-s0501t:1186_3: Ayaṃ maggo saṃsāranivattanassa hetubhāvato saṃsāranivatti hoti.
tika-s0501t:1186_4: Tattha saṃsārapavattisaṃsāranivattīsu pavatti saṃsārapavatti dukkhaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1186_5: tadabhisaṅgo tasmiṃ dukkhe abhisaṅgo taṇhā samudayo samudayasaccaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1186_7: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā maggasaccaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1187_2: Tattha ucchedasassataariyamaggesu ucchedasassatadassanaṃ samāsato saṅkhepato vīsativatthukā sakkāyadiṭṭhi.
tika-s0501t:1187_4: sassatadassanaṃ ekekasmiṃ tidhā uppajjanato pannarasavidhanti vīsatividhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:1187_17: Tesaṃ ucchedasassatadassanānaṃ tecattālīsaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammā paṭipakkho maggo.
tika-s0501t:1187_19: “Aniccasaññā dukkhasaññā anattasaññā”ti tisso saññā ca “pahānasaññā virāgasaññā nirodhasaññā”ti tisso saññā cāti cha saññā ca “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā,
tika-s0501t:1187_25: aṭṭha maggaṅgānī”ti tecattālīsaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammā vipassanāvasena paṭipakkho maggo nāma.
tika-s0501t:1188_2: Dasa kasiṇāyatanāni samathavasena paṭipakkho maggo nāma.
tika-s0501t:1188_3: “Katamaṃ ñāṇaṃ katamassa dhammassa padālana”nti pucchitabbattā “dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1188_8: Aṭṭha samāpattiyo samāpajjitvā tejetvā tikkhaṃ vipassanāñāṇañca ariyamaggañāṇañcañāṇavajiraṃ nāma bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ ñāṇapadaṭṭhānattā.
tika-s0501t:1188_18: Attano ādhāraṃ puggalaṃ dukkhādīsu aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu mohetīti moho.
tika-s0501t:1188_19: Paṭhamaṃ jālaṃ jaṭaṃ lāyitvā jaṭāvasena lāti pavattatīti jālaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1188_25: sakaattabhāvādīsu ca saṃsibbanavasena pavattanato jālaṃ bhavataṇhā”ti.
tika-s0501t:1188_26: “Avijjātaṇhāhi attakilamathānuyogādīnaṃ kilesapakkhānaṃ niddhāraṇaṃ kataṃ kathaṃ kena saddahitabba”nti
tika-s0501t:1188_27: vattabbattā “tena vuccati ‘pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjāya ca bhavataṇhāya cā’ti” vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1189_2: sāsane diṭṭhicaritataṇhācaritānaṃ paṭipadādayo kathaṃ niddhāritabbā”ti vattabbattā “saṃkilesapakkhā suttatthā ācariyena dassitā,
tika-s0501t:1189_3: vodānapakkhasuttatthā kathaṃ dassitabbā”ti vattabbattā vā “tattha diṭṭhicarito asmiṃ sāsane”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1189_5: Diṭṭhicarito puggalo asmiṃ sāsane pabbajito hutvā catūsu paccayesu sallekhānusantatavutti bhavati. Kasmā?
tika-s0501t:1189_8: Taṇhācarito puggalo asmiṃ sāsane pabbajito hutvā sikkhānusantatavutti bhavati. Kasmā?
tika-s0501t:1189_11: Diṭṭhicarito puggalo sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamanto hutvā dhammānusārī puggalo bhavati. Kasmā?
tika-s0501t:1189_13: Taṇhācarito puggalo sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamanto hutvā saddhānusārī bhavati. Kasmā?
tika-s0501t:1189_18: khippābhiññāya ca niyyāti sukhena kilesehi vikkhambhituṃ samatthattā.
tika-s0501t:1189_22: khippābhiññāya ca niyyāti dukkhena kilesehi vikkhambhituṃ samatthattā.
tika-s0501t:1190_0: “Tathā kasmā niyyātī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1190_3: Tassa taṇhācaritassa kāmā sukhena apariccattā hi yasmā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t:1190_4: tasmā kāmānaṃ sukhena apariccattattā tathā niyyāti.
tika-s0501t:1190_5: So taṇhācarito kāmehi vatthukāmakilesakāmehi viveciyamāno dukkhena paṭinissarati,
tika-s0501t:1190_7: Yo pana ayaṃ puggalo diṭṭhicarito hoti,
tika-s0501t:1190_8: so ayaṃ diṭṭhicarito puggalo ādito ādimhiyeva kāmehi kilesakāmavatthukāmehi anatthiko bhavati.
tika-s0501t:1190_9: So diṭṭhicarito tato tehi kāmehi viveciyamāno khippañca sukhena paṭinissarati,
tika-s0501t:1191_1: diṭṭhicarito sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyātīti ekekāya paṭipadāya bhavitabba”nti vattabbattā
tika-s0501t:1191_2: “dukkhāpi paṭipadā duvidhā dandhābhiññā ca khippābhiññā ca,
tika-s0501t:1191_3: sukhāpi paṭipadā duvidhā dandhābhiññā ca khippābhiññā cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1191_4: “Evaṃ sati ekova dvīhi dvīhi paṭipadāhi niyyātīti āpajjatī”ti vattabbattā “sattāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1191_6: diṭṭhicaritā sattāpi duvidhā mudindriyāpi tikkhindriyāpīti yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t:1191_15: na niyyiṃsu niyyissantīti āpajjeyya vattamānavibhattiyā niddiṭṭhattā”ti vattabbattā “imā catasso”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1191_18: anāgatepi niyyissantīti attho gahetabbo yathā “pabbato tiṭṭhatī”ti.
tika-s0501t:1192_3: Ayaṃ vuccati nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa bhūmīti taṇhāavijjānaṃ vasena saṃkilesapakkhe dvidisā catusaccayojanāpi
tika-s0501t:1192_4: samathavipassanānaṃ vasena vodānapakkhe dvidisā catusaccayojanāpi dassitā.
tika-s0501t:1192_5: Ayaṃ catubbidhā catusaccayojanā nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa samuṭṭhānaṃ bhūmi samuṭṭhānabhāvatoti.
tika-s0501t:1192_6: “Tathāvidhāya catusaccayojanāya nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa samuṭṭhānabhūmibhāvo kena saddahitabbo”ti vattabbattā “tenāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1193_2: tassa nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa kattha katamā disā kittakena upaparikkhitabbā”ti vattabbattā “veyyākaraṇesu hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Hi-
tika-s0501t:1193_4: Ye disābhūtā āhārādayo dhammā veyyākaraṇesu “kusalākusalā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1193_5: te disābhūtā āhārādayo dhammā duvidhena “ime akusalā dhammā saṃkilesadhammā,
tika-s0501t:1193_6: ime kusalā vodānadhammā”ti duvidhena upaparikkhitabbā ālocitabbā.
tika-s0501t:1193_7: “Katamena duvidhenā”ti pucchitabbattā “lokavaṭṭānusārī ca lokavivaṭṭānusārī cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1193_11: “Saṃsārassa katamo hetū”ti pucchitabbattā “kammakilesā hetu saṃsārassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1193_14: udāhu cetasikañca phaladānasamatthāsamatthampi kammaṃ ki”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha kamma”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1193_16: “Taṃ kammaṃ kathaṃ kena pakārena daṭṭhabba”nti ce vadeyya,
tika-s0501t:1193_17: yathā yena upacayena kataṃ kammaṃ phaladānasamatthaṃ hoti,
tika-s0501t:1193_19: “Te kilesā katamehi dhammehi niddisitabbā”ti ce puccheyya,
tika-s0501t:1194_10: cattāri agatigamanānīti dasa vatthūnīti veditabbāni catunnaṃ kiccavasena ekattā.
tika-s0501t:1194_11: Ettha ca kilesānaṃ paccayo vatthukāmopi kilesopi kilesavatthu hoti purimānaṃ purimānaṃ kilesānaṃ pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kilesānaṃ paccayabhāvato.
tika-s0501t:1195_0: “Katamo katamo katamassa katamassa vatthū”ti pucchitabbattā “paṭhame āhāre”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1195_1: Ālambitabbe paṭhame kabaḷīkārāhāre paṭhamo “rūpaṃ subha”nti vipallāso ārammaṇakaraṇavasena pavattati.
tika-s0501t:1195_2: Ālambitabbe dutiye phassāhāre dutiyo “phassapaccayā vedanā sukhā”ti vipallāso pavattati.
tika-s0501t:1195_3: Ālambitabbe tatiye cittāhāre tatiyo “cittaṃ nicca”nti vipallāso pavattati,
tika-s0501t:1195_4: ālambitabbe catutthe manosañcetanāhāre “dhammo attā”ti vipallāso ārammaṇakaraṇavasena pavattati.
tika-s0501t:1195_5: Ālambitabbe paṭhame “rūpaṃ subha”nti vipallāso paṭhamaṃ kāmupādānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena pavattati.
tika-s0501t:1195_6: Sesesupi yathārahaṃ nayānusārena yojetvā attho veditabbo.
tika-s0501t:1196_1: “Tesu āhārādīsu katamo katamassa puggalassa upakkileso”ti vattabbattā “tattha yo cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1196_4: Taṇhācaritassa rūpavedanāsu tibbacchandarāgassa uppajjanato yo ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro,
tika-s0501t:1196_6: ime kabaḷīkārāhāraphassāhārā taṇhācaritassa puggalassa upakkilesā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1196_7: Diṭṭhicaritassa dhammacittesu balavaattaniccābhinivesassa uppajjanato yo ca manosañcetanāhāro,
tika-s0501t:1196_9: ime manosañcetanāhāraviññāṇāhārā diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa upakkilesā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1196_10: “Tattha yo ca asubhe subha”ntiādīsupi vuttanayānusārena attho gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t:1196_11: Purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ taṇhāpadhānattā ceva taṇhāsabhāvattā ca,
tika-s0501t:1196_12: pacchimānaṃ dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ diṭṭhipadhānattā ceva diṭṭhisabhāvattā cāti.
tika-s0501t:1197_1: “Katamasmiṃ paṭhamādike āhāre katamo paṭhamādiko vipallāso pavattatī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha kabaḷīkāre
tika-s0501t:1197_2: āhāre”tiādinā nāmavasena niyametvā pubbe vuttatthameva dasseti.
tika-s0501t:1197_3: “Katamasmiṃ vipallāse ṭhito katamaṃ upādiyatī”ti pucchitabbattā “paṭhame vipallāse ṭhito”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1197_4: Paṭhame vipallāse ṭhito puggalo kāme yena upādānena upādiyati,
tika-s0501t:1199_1: “Āhārādīsu katame katamā disā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha imā catasso disā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1199_2: Tattha tesu āhāracatukkādīsu dasasu catukkesu paṭhamo paṭhamo kabaḷīkārāhārādiko paṭhamā disā,
tika-s0501t:1199_5: catuttho catuttho manosañcetanāhārādiko catutthā disāti veditabbā.
tika-s0501t:1200_0: “Tāsu catūsu disāsu tesu kabaḷīkārāhārādīsu dhammesu katame dhammā katamassa upakkilesā”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t:1200_1: ime āhārādayo dhammā imassa puggalassa upakkilesāti vibhattāti dassetuṃ “tattha yo ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro…pe…
tika-s0501t:1200_4: “kabaḷīkārāhāro āhārotiādi āhārādīsu ye yassa puggalassa upakkilesā,
tika-s0501t:1200_9: “Byañjanameva nāna”nti etena ca saddatthassa nānattaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0501t:1201_0: “Kabaḷīkārāhārādīsu katame āhārādayo katamena vimokkhamukhena pariññaṃ pahānaṃ gacchantī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha yo ca kabaḷīkāro”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1202_1: Sabbeti sabbe āhārādayo dhammā lokavaṭṭānusārino bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1203_1: Saṃkilesapakkhe disābhūtā āhāracatukkādayo dasa catukkā dhammā ācariyena niddhāretvā dassitā,
tika-s0501t:1203_3: “vodānapakkhe katame disābhūtā dhammā”ti pucchitabbattā vodānapakkhe disābhūte dhamme dassetuṃ “catasso paṭipadā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1203_4: Cattāro vihārāti dibbavihārā brahmavihārā ariyavihārā āneñjavihārāti cattāro vihārā.
tika-s0501t:1203_8: catasso arūpasamāpattiyo āneñjavihārā cattāro acchariyā abbhutā dhammāti mānapahānaṃ ālayasamugghāto
tika-s0501t:1203_10: Cattāri adhiṭṭhānānīti saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ cāgādhiṭṭhānaṃ paññādhiṭṭhānaṃ upasamādhiṭṭhānanti cattāri adhiṭṭhānāni.
tika-s0501t:1203_11: Catasso samādhibhāvanāti chandasamādhibhāvanā vīriyasamādhibhāvanā cittasamādhibhāvanā vīmaṃsāsamādhibhāvanāti catasso samādhibhāvanā.
tika-s0501t:1203_12: Cattāro sukhabhāgiyāti indriyasaṃvaro tapo bojjhaṅgo sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggoti cattāro sukhabhāgiyā.
tika-s0501t:1204_0: “Catūsu catūsu paṭipadādīsu katamo paṭipadādiko paṭhamo satipaṭṭhānādiko bhavatī”ti pucchitabbattā “paṭhamā
tika-s0501t:1204_4: tasmā ‘paṭhamā paṭipadā paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhāna’ntiādiyojanā kātabbā”ti vattabbattā “paṭhamā paṭipadā bhāvitā
tika-s0501t:1204_7: Atha vā “bhāvitā bahulīkatā katame paṭipadādayo katame satipaṭṭhānādike pūrentī”ti pucchitabbattā “paṭhamā
tika-s0501t:1204_8: paṭipadā bhāvitā bahulīkatā paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ pūretī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1205_1: “Tesu dasasu paṭipadācatukkādīsu katame dhammā katamā disā,
tika-s0501t:1205_2: katame dhammā katamā disā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha imā catasso disā paṭhamā paṭipadā,
tika-s0501t:1205_5: Imā mayā vuccamānā paṭhamā paṭipadādayo disā catasso disā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1206_0: “Tesu catūsu disābhūtesu paṭipadācatukkādīsu katamo disābhūto attho katamassa puggalassa bhesajja”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha paṭhamā paṭipadā…pe…
tika-s0501t:1207_0: “Tesu dasasu paṭipadādicatukkesu dhammesu katamo katamo katamaṃ katamaṃ vimokkhamukha”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha dukkhā ca paṭipadā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1207_1: Attho pana ṭīkāyaṃ vitthārena vutto pākaṭo.
tika-s0501t:1207_2: Saṃkilesapakkhe disābhūtā āhāracatukkādayo dasa catukkā samatikkamitabbapahātabbabhāvena niddhāritā,
tika-s0501t:1207_3: vodānapakkhe pana disābhūtā paṭipadācatukkādayo dasa catukkā samatikkamapahāyakabhāvena niddhāritā.
tika-s0501t:1208_0: “Tesaṃ āhāracatukkādīnaṃ dasannaṃ catukkānaṃ samatikkamanapahānasaṅkhātaṃ yaṃ vikkīḷitañca tesaṃ paṭipadācatukkādīnaṃ
tika-s0501t:1208_1: dasannaṃ catukkānaṃ bhāvanāsaṅkhātaṃ yaṃ vikkīḷitañca sacchikiriyāsaṅkhātaṃ yaṃ vikkīḷitañca atthi,
tika-s0501t:1208_2: taṃ tividhaṃ vikkīḷitaṃ katamesaṃ puggalānaṃ vikkīḷitaṃ bhavatī”ti pucchitabbattā “tesaṃ vikkīḷita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1208_3: Atha vā “yathāvuttappakārehi vimokkhamukhehi ye buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakā vimucciṃsu,
tika-s0501t:1208_7: udāhu sabbesaṃ buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ vikkīḷitaṃ bhavati ki”nti vicāraṇāya sambhavato “tesaṃ vikkīḷita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1208_10: Yaṃ āhāracatukkādīnaṃ dasannaṃ catukkānaṃ saparasantāne samatikkamanapahānañca yā paṭipadācatukkādīnaṃ
tika-s0501t:1208_13: idaṃ sabbaṃ vikkīḷitaṃ nāma bhavatīti attho.
tika-s0501t:1209_0: “Sabbesaṃ āhāracatukkādīnaṃ dasannaṃ catukkānaṃ sabbe paṭipadācatukkādayo dasa catukkā paṭipakkhā honti kiṃ,
tika-s0501t:1209_1: udāhu yathākkamaṃ catukkānaṃ catukkā paṭipakkhā honti ki”nti vicāraṇāya sambhavato yathākkamaṃ catukkānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1209_2: catukkā paṭipakkhā honti pahātabbapahāyakabhāvenāti dassento “cattāro āhārā tesaṃ paṭipakkho catasso
tika-s0501t:1209_6: taṃ nesaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvaṃ dassento ‘cattāro āhārā tesaṃ paṭipakkho catasso paṭipadā’tiādimāhā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1209_7: Tattha saṃkilesapakkhe cattāro ye āhārā niddhāritā,
tika-s0501t:1209_8: tesaṃ catunnaṃ āhārānaṃ vodānapakkhe yā catasso paṭipadā niddhāritā,
tika-s0501t:1209_9: tā catasso paṭipadā paṭipakkho āhārānaṃ pahātabbattā,
tika-s0501t:1209_11: Satipi āhārānaṃ appahātabbabhāve vipassanārammaṇattā āhārapaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānavasena pahātabbabhāvo vuttoti evamādiyojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t:1210_0: Sīhāti sīhasadisā buddhā ca sīhasadisā paccekabuddhā ca sīhasadisā sāvakā cāti sīhasadisā visuṃ visuṃ yojetabbā.
tika-s0501t:1210_4: rāgo ca doso ca moho ca rāgadosamohā,
tika-s0501t:1210_9: tesaṃ sīhānaṃ sāvakānaṃ bhāvanā vodānapakkhe bhāvitabbānaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ bhāvanā vaḍḍhanā ca,
tika-s0501t:1210_10: sacchikiriyā vodānapakkheyeva sacchikātabbānaṃ phalanibbānānaṃ sacchikiriyā ca,
tika-s0501t:1210_11: byantīkiriyā saṃkilesapakkhe pahātabbānaṃ pahānasaṅkhātā byantīkiriyā ca vikkīḷitaṃ nāma bhavati.
tika-s0501t:1211_0: Indriyādhiṭṭhānanti saddhindriyādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ pavattanaṃ bhāvanā,
tika-s0501t:1211_4: Indriyāni saddhindriyādīni saddhammagocaro saddhammassa vodānapakkhassa gocaro pavattanahetūti adhippetāni.
tika-s0501t:1211_5: Vipariyāsā vipallāsā kilesagocaro saṃkilesapakkhassa gocaro pavattihetūti adhippetā.
tika-s0501t:1212_0: “Cattāro āhārātiādinā saṃkilesapakkhe āhāracatukkādīnaṃ dasannaṃ catukkānaṃ taṇhācaritādīnaṃ catunnaṃ
tika-s0501t:1212_1: puggalānaṃ upakkilesavibhāvanāmukhena yā niddhāraṇā ācariyena katā,
tika-s0501t:1212_2: ‘catasso paṭipadā’tiādinā ca vodānapakkhe paṭipadācatukkādīnaṃ dasannaṃ catukkānaṃ taṇhācaritādīnaṃ catunnaṃ
tika-s0501t:1212_3: puggalānaṃ vodānavibhāvanāmukhena yā niddhāraṇā ācariyena katā,
tika-s0501t:1212_4: sā ayaṃ niddhāraṇā katamassa nayassa samuṭṭhānaṃ bhūmīti vuccatī”ti pucchitabbattā “ayaṃ vuccati sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa bhūmī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1212_5: Tattha ayanti yā ayaṃ vuttanayena dvippakārā niddhāraṇā katā,
tika-s0501t:1212_6: sā ayaṃ dvippakārā niddhāraṇā sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa bhūmi pavattiṭṭhānaṃ samuṭṭhānanti nayasamuṭṭhānakosallehi
tika-s0501t:1213_0: “Vuttappakārāya niddhāritāya nayassa bhūmibhāvo kasmā viññāyatī”ti vattabbattā “tenāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1213_2: kusalāti cā”ti yaṃ vacanaṃ ācariyo āha,
tika-s0501t:1214_2: “katamā tipukkhalanayabhūmī”ti pucchitabbattā tipukkhalanayabhūmiṃ vibhāvetukāmo “tattha ye dukkhāya paṭipadāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0501t:1214_5: kasmā pana “tattha ye dukkhāya paṭipadāyā”tiādivacanaṃ vattabbanti? Saccaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1214_7: tasmā ugghaṭitaññuādipuggalattayaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “tattha ye dukkhāya paṭipadāyā”tiādivacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1214_8: Evamapi “tattha yo sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyāti,
tika-s0501t:1214_10: kasmā pana “tattha ye dukkhāya paṭipadāyā”tiādivacanaṃ vattabbanti? Saccaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1214_11: ugghaṭitaññuādipuggalattayaṃ pana sīhavikkīḷitanayato tipukkhalanayassa niggacchanato nikkhamanato sīhavikkīḷitanayabhūmivibhāvanāyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1214_13: sīhavikkīḷitanayabhūmivibhāvanāyaṃ paṭipadāvibhāgato vibhāvitaṃ puggalacatukkaṃ paṭhamaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “tattha ye dukkhāya paṭipadāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1214_16: Yeti ye dandhaudattā diṭṭhicaritapuggalā yathākkamaṃ sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya ca sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya ca niyyanti,
tika-s0501t:1214_17: iti niyyakā dve puggalā ca niddhāritā.
tika-s0501t:1214_18: “Tesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ katamo saṃkileso”ti pucchitabbattā “tesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ ayaṃ saṃkileso”ti
tika-s0501t:1214_19: vissajjetuṃ “tesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ ayaṃ saṃkileso”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1214_22: iti ayaṃ dasavidho āhāracatukkādicatukko tesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ saṃkileso hoti.
tika-s0501t:1214_23: Tesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ saṃkileso ācariyena niddhārito,
tika-s0501t:1214_24: “katamaṃ vodāna”nti pucchitabbattā “tesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ idaṃ vodāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1214_27: iti idaṃ dasavidhaṃ paṭipadācatukkādicatukkabhūtaṃ dhammajātaṃ tesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ vodānaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:1215_3: katamo puggalo neyyo”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha ye”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1215_5: kasmā pana puna “tattha ye’tiādinā cattāro puggalā niddhāritā”ti ce vadeyya?
tika-s0501t:1215_7: pacchā pana ugghaṭitaññuādīnaṃ avayavānaṃ samūhabhāvena niddhāritāti visesattho gahetabbo.
tika-s0501t:1215_9: ime dve puggalāti ettha yojanattho heṭṭhā vuttasadisova.
tika-s0501t:1215_13: Puna yoti udattova taṇhācarito ca mando diṭṭhicarito ca.
tika-s0501t:1215_14: Sādhāraṇāyāti dukkhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya ca sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya ca.
tika-s0501t:1216_1: tesu tīsu puggalesu katamassa katamassa katamaṃ katamaṃ bhagavā upadisatī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1216_3: kathaṃ desanābhedena puggalabhedo vibhāvito”ti vattabbattā desanābhedenapi puggalabhedaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “tattha bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1217_0: Visuṃ visuṃ paṭipadābhedena cattāro hutvā visuṃ ca sampiṇḍitā ca paṭipadābhedena ceva desanābhedena ca
tika-s0501t:1217_1: tayo hontīti vibhāvetuṃ “tattha ye”tiādiṃ puna vatvā “iti kho cattāri hutvā tīṇi bhavantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1218_0: “Tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ katamo saṃkileso”ti pucchitabbattā “tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ ayaṃ saṃkileso”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1218_2: sīlavipatti diṭṭhivipatti ācāravipattī”ti niddhāritānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ iti ayaṃ samūho saṃkileso hoti.
tika-s0501t:1218_4: kathaṃ vodānaṃ niddhāritabba”nti vattabbattā “tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ idaṃ vodāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1218_6: tīṇi vimokkhamukhāni suññataṃ animittaṃ appaṇihita”nti niddhāritānaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ samūhabhūtaṃ iti idaṃ dhammajātaṃ vodānaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:1219_0: “Vuttappakārena cattāro hutvā tayo puggalā bhavantīti ācariyena vibhāvitā,
tika-s0501t:1219_1: tayo hutvā kittakā puggalā bhavantī”ti vattabbabhāvato “iti kho cattāri hutvā tīṇi bhavanti,
tika-s0501t:1219_2: tīṇi hutvā dve bhavanti taṇhācarito ca diṭṭhicarito cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1219_3: Itīti heṭṭhā vuttappakārena cattāri cattāro hutvā tīṇi tayo bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1219_4: Tīṇi tayo hutvā taṇhācarito ca diṭṭhicarito cāti dve puggalā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1220_0: “Tesaṃ dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ katamo saṃkileso”ti vattabbabhāvato “tesaṃ dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ ayaṃ saṃkileso”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1220_1: Tattha ayaṃ saṃkilesoti “taṇhā ca avijjā ca…pe…
tika-s0501t:1220_2: sassatadiṭṭhi ca ucchedadiṭṭhi cā”ti niddhāritānaṃ akusaladhammānaṃ iti ayaṃ samūho saṃkileso hoti.
tika-s0501t:1221_1: kathaṃ vodāna”nti vattabbabhāvato “tesaṃ dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ idaṃ vodāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1221_4: anupādisesā ca nibbānadhātū”ti niddhāritānaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ samūhabhūtaṃ iti idaṃ dhammajātaṃ vodānaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:1222_0: “Tīṇi akusalamūlānī”tiādinā saṃkilesapakkhe akusalamūlatikādīnaṃ dvinnaṃ dvādasannaṃ tikānaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1222_1: tiṇṇaṃ ugghaṭitaññuādipuggalānaṃ saṃkilesavibhāvanāmukhena yā niddhāraṇā katā,
tika-s0501t:1222_2: “tīṇi kusalamūlānī”tiādinā vodānapakkhe kusalamūlatikādīnaṃ dvinnaṃ dvādasannaṃ tikānaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1222_3: tiṇṇaṃ ugghaṭitaññuādipuggalānaṃ vodānavibhāvanāmukhena yā niddhāraṇā katā,
tika-s0501t:1222_5: aṅkusassa ca nayassa bhūmi samuṭṭhānaṃ pavattihetu nāmāti yojetvā “taṇhā ca avijjā cā”tiādinā saṃkilesapakkhe
tika-s0501t:1222_7: dvinnaṃ taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicaritānaṃ puggalānaṃ vodānavibhāvanāmukhena yā niddhāraṇā katā,
tika-s0501t:1222_8: “samatho ca vipassanā cā”tiādinā vodānapakkhe samathavipassanādukādīnaṃ ekūnavīsatidukānaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1222_9: dvinnaṃ taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicaritānaṃ puggalānaṃ vodānavibhāvanāmukhena yā niddhāraṇā katā,
tika-s0501t:1222_10: ayaṃ vuttappakārā nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa bhūmītipi nīharitvā yojetabbā.
tika-s0501t:1222_15: Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ante ‘taṇhā ca avijjā cā’tiādinā samathassa nayassa bhūmi dassitā.
tika-s0501t:1223_0: “Kasmā pana ayaṃ vuttappakārāya niddhāraṇāya tipukkhalassa ca nayassa,
tika-s0501t:1223_1: aṅkusassa ca nayassa bhūmibhāvo viññāyatī”ti vattabbabhāvato “tenāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1223_2: Tena yathāvuttassa niddhāraṇāya bhūmibhāvena ācariyo “yo akusale…pe…
tika-s0501t:1224_2: Yena yena nayasamuṭṭhānena saṃkilesapakkhe vā akusalā dhammā niddhāritā,
tika-s0501t:1224_4: taṃ taṃ nayasamuṭṭhānaṃ niyuttaṃ yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yujjitabbanti attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0501t:1225_3: cattāro puggalāti puggalā tikoṭṭhāsā bhavanti, catudisā, chadisā,
tika-s0501t:1225_10: Cattāro puggalāti dukkhāpaṭipadādandhābhiññādibhedena bhinnā mudindriyo taṇhācarito puggalo,
tika-s0501t:1225_13: tikkhindriyo diṭṭhicarito puggaloti cattāro puggalā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1225_15: vodānapakkhe dve dve disāti catudisā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1225_17: vodānapakkhe tisso tisso disāti chadisā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1225_19: vodānapakkhe catasso catasso disāti aṭṭhadisā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1225_22: Tayo ugghaṭitaññuvipañcitaññuneyyapuggale ca chadisā ca nissāya tipukkhalanayasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhavati.
tika-s0501t:1225_24: puggale ca aṭṭhadisā ca nissāya sīhavikkīḷitanayasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhavati.
tika-s0501t:1225_25: Ekekasmiṃ nayasamuṭṭhāne vibhajite disālocanaaṅkusanayasamuṭṭhānānipi vibhajitāni bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1226_1: “Taṇhā ca avijjā ca ahirikañca anottappañca assati ca asampajaññañca ayonisomanasikāro ca kosajjañca
tika-s0501t:1226_2: dovacassañca ahaṃkāro ca mamaṃkāro ca assaddhā ca pamādo ca asaddhammassavanañca asaṃvaro ca abhijjhā
tika-s0501t:1226_3: ca byāpādo ca nīvaraṇañca saṃyojanañca kodho ca upanāho ca makkho ca paḷāso ca issā ca maccherañca māyā
tika-s0501t:1226_4: ca sāṭheyyañca sassatadiṭṭhi ca ucchedadiṭṭhi cā”ti dukadukavasena desito ayaṃ disābhūto akusaladhammasamūho
tika-s0501t:1226_5: dvinnaṃ taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicaritānaṃ puggalānaṃ saṃkileso hotīti saṃkilesapakkhe saṃkilesasāmaññabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1226_6: yojetvā “imesu pannarasasu dukadukavasena desitesu disābhūtesu akusaladhammesu katamo akusaladhammo katamassa
tika-s0501t:1226_7: puggalassa disā”ti manasāva disādhammabhāvena oloketvā “ayaṃ ayaṃ paṭhamo paṭhamo akusaladhammo taṇhācaritassa
tika-s0501t:1226_9: ayaṃ ayaṃ dutiyo dutiyo akusaladhammo diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa saṃkilesapakkhe dutiyā disā nāmā”ti
tika-s0501t:1226_10: visuṃ visuṃ yojetvā samudayasaccadukkhasaccāni yathārahaṃ nīharitvā vibhajitabbadhammasabhāvo ca yena
tika-s0501t:1226_13: tassa olokanā ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassitā,
tika-s0501t:1226_15: tathā oloketvā disāvisesabhūtassa dhammavisesassa puggalānaṃ nayanañca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena nayati,
tika-s0501t:1227_14: apaḷāso ca issāpahānañca macchariyappahānañca vijjā ca,
tika-s0501t:1227_18: anupādisesā ca nibbānadhātū”ti tikadukavasena desitaṃ idaṃ disābhūtaṃ kusalasamūhadhammajātaṃ dvinnaṃ
tika-s0501t:1227_19: taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicaritānaṃ puggalānaṃ vodānaṃ hotīti vodānapakkhe vodānasāmaññabhāvena yojetvā “imesu
tika-s0501t:1227_20: ekūnavīsatiyā dukadukavasena vā desitesu disābhūtesu dhammesu katamo katamo kusaladhammo katamassa katamassa
tika-s0501t:1227_21: puggalassa disā”ti manasāva disādhammabhāvena oloketvā “ayaṃ paṭhamo paṭhamo kusaladhammo taṇhācaritassa
tika-s0501t:1227_23: ayaṃ dutiyo dutiyo kusaladhammo diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa vodānapakkhe dutiyā disā nāmā”ti visuṃ visuṃ
tika-s0501t:1227_24: yojetvā maggasaccanirodhasaccāni yathārahaṃ nīharitvā vibhajitabbadhammabhāvo ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassito,
tika-s0501t:1227_26: tassa olokanā ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassitā,
tika-s0501t:1227_28: tathā oloketvā disāvisesabhūtassa dhammavisesassa puggalānaṃ nayanañca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena nayati,
tika-s0501t:1228_42: ācāravipattī”ti tikavasena desito ayaṃ disābhūto akusaladhammasamūho tiṇṇaṃ ugghaṭitaññuvipañcitaññuneyyapuggalānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1228_43: saṃkileso hotīti saṃkilesapakkhe saṃkilesasāmaññabhāvena yojetvā “imesu dvādasasu tikatikavasena desitesu
tika-s0501t:1228_44: disābhūtesu akusaladhammesu katamo katamo akusalo dhammo katamassa katamassa puggalassa disā”ti manasāva
tika-s0501t:1228_45: disādhammabhāvena oloketvā “ayaṃ ayaṃ paṭhamo paṭhamo akusaladhammo ugghaṭitaññupuggalassa saṃkilesapakkhe
tika-s0501t:1228_47: Ayaṃ ayaṃ dutiyo dutiyo akusaladhammo vipañcitaññupuggalassa saṃkilesapakkhe dutiyā disā nāma.
tika-s0501t:1228_48: Ayaṃ ayaṃ tatiyo tatiyo akusaladhammo neyyassa puggalassa saṃkilesapakkhe tatiyā disā nāmā”ti visuṃ visuṃ
tika-s0501t:1228_49: yojetvā samudayasaccadukkhasaccāni yathārahaṃ nīharitvā vibhajitabbadhammasabhāvo ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassito.
tika-s0501t:1228_51: Tassa olokanā ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassitā,
tika-s0501t:1228_52: so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso ca disālocananayasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhavati tathā oloketvā disāvisesabhūtassa dhammavisesassa
tika-s0501t:1229_46: appaṇihita”nti tikatikavasena desitaṃ idaṃ disābhūtaṃ kusalasamūhadhammajātaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ugghaṭitaññuvipañcitaññuneyyapuggalānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1229_47: vodānaṃ hotīti vodānapakkhe vodānasāmaññabhāvena yojetvā “imesu dvīsu dvādasasu tikatikavasena desitesu
tika-s0501t:1229_48: disābhūtesu kusaladhammesu katamo katamo kusaladhammo katamassa katamassa puggalassa disā”ti manasāva
tika-s0501t:1229_49: disādhammabhāvena oloketvā “ayaṃ ayaṃ paṭhamo paṭhamo kusaladhammo ugghaṭitaññupuggalassa vodānapakkhe
tika-s0501t:1229_51: Ayaṃ ayaṃ dutiyo dutiyo kusalo dhammo vipañcitaññupuggalassa vodānapakkhe dutiyā disā nāma.
tika-s0501t:1229_52: Ayaṃ ayaṃ tatiyo tatiyo kusaladhammo neyyapuggalassa vodānapakkhe tatiyā disā nāmā”ti visuṃ visuṃ disābhāvena
tika-s0501t:1229_53: yojetvā maggasaccanirodhasaccāni yathārahaṃ nīharitvā vibhajitabbadhammasabhāvo ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassito.
tika-s0501t:1229_55: Tassa olokanā ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassitā,
tika-s0501t:1229_57: Tathā oloketvā disāvisesabhūtassa dhammassa puggalānaṃ nayanañca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena nayati,
tika-s0501t:1230_10: cattāri agatigamanānī”ti catukkacatukkavasena desito ayaṃ disābhūto catukko catukko akusaladhammo “dukkhāya
tika-s0501t:1230_11: paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyakassa mudindriyassa taṇhācaritassa ca dukkhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya
tika-s0501t:1230_12: niyyakassa tikkhindriyassa taṇhācaritassa ca sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyakassa mudindriyassa
tika-s0501t:1230_13: diṭṭhicaritassa ca sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyakassa tikkhindriyassa diṭṭhicaritassa cā”ti
tika-s0501t:1230_14: catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ saṃkilesoti saṃkilesapakkhe saṃkilesasāmaññabhāvena yojetvā “imesu catukkacatukkavasena
tika-s0501t:1230_15: desitesu dasasu catukkesu dhammesu katamo katamo akusaladhammo katamassa katamassa puggalassa disā”ti
tika-s0501t:1230_16: manasāva saṃkilesapakkhe disādhammabhāvena oloketvā “ayaṃ ayaṃ paṭhamo paṭhamo akusaladhammo dukkhāya
tika-s0501t:1230_17: paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyakassa mudindriyassa taṇhācaritassa puggalassa paṭhamā disā nāma.
tika-s0501t:1230_18: Ayaṃ ayaṃ dutiyo dutiyo akusaladhammo dukkhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyakassa tikkhindriyassa taṇhācaritassa puggalassa dutiyā disā nāma.
tika-s0501t:1230_19: Ayaṃ ayaṃ tatiyo tatiyo akusaladhammo sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyakassa mudindriyassa diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa tatiyā disā nāma.
tika-s0501t:1230_20: Ayaṃ ayaṃ catuttho catuttho akusaladhammo sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyakassa tikkhindriyassa
tika-s0501t:1230_21: diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa catutthā disā nāmā”ti visuṃ visuṃ disābhāvena yojetvā,
tika-s0501t:1230_25: Tassa olokanā ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassitā,
tika-s0501t:1230_27: Tathā oloketvā disāvisesabhūtassa dhammassa puggalānaṃ nayanañca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena nayati,
tika-s0501t:1231_9: catasso appamāṇā”ti catukkacatukkavasena desitaṃ idaṃ disābhūtaṃ kusalasamūhadhammajātaṃ “dukkhāya paṭipadāya
tika-s0501t:1231_10: dandhābhiññāya niyyakassa mudindriyassa taṇhācaritassa ca dukkhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyakassa
tika-s0501t:1231_11: tikkhindriyassa taṇhācaritassa ca sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyakassa mudindriyassa diṭṭhicaritassa
tika-s0501t:1231_12: sa sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyakassa tikkhindriyassa diṭṭhicaritassa cā”ti catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1231_13: vodānaṃ hotīti vodānapakkhe vodānasāmaññabhāvena yojetvā “imesu catukkacatukkavasena desitesu dasasu
tika-s0501t:1231_14: catukkesu kusaladhammesu katamo katamo kusaladhammo katamassa katamassa puggalassa disā”ti manasāva disādhammabhāvena oloketvā,
tika-s0501t:1231_15: “ayaṃ ayaṃ paṭhamo paṭhamo kusaladhammo dukkhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyakassa mudindriyassa taṇhācaritassa puggalassa paṭhamā disā nāma.
tika-s0501t:1231_16: Ayaṃ ayaṃ dutiyo dutiyo kusaladhammo dukkhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyakassa tikkhindriyassa taṇhācaritassa puggalassa dutiyā disā nāma.
tika-s0501t:1231_17: Ayaṃ ayaṃ tatiyo tatiyo kusaladhammo sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyakassa mudindriyassa diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa tatiyā disā nāma.
tika-s0501t:1231_18: Ayaṃ ayaṃ catuttho catuttho kusaladhammo sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyakassa tikkhindriyassa
tika-s0501t:1231_19: diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa catutthā disā nāmā”ti visuṃ visuṃ disābhāvena yojetvā,
tika-s0501t:1231_23: Tassa olokanā ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassitā.
tika-s0501t:1231_25: Tathā oloketvā disāvisesassa dhammassa puggalānaṃ nayanañca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena nayati,
tika-s0501t:1231_26: so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso ca aṅkusanayasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhavatīti nayakkamena saṅkhepato nayasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhavatīti viññātabbanti.
tika-s0501t:1234_0: Paṇḍitehi pana aṭṭhakathāṭīkānusārena gambhīrattho vitthārato vibhajitvā gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t:1236_1: “Tattha katamaṃ nayasamuṭṭhāna”ntiādinā ācariyena sabbathā nayasamuṭṭhānaṃ ṭhapitaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1236_4: kuhiṃ amhehi daṭṭhabbā”ti vattabbabhāvato “tattha aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā kuhiṃ daṭṭhabbā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1236_5: Tatthāti tesu soḷasahārapañcanayaaṭṭhārasamūlapadesu aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā kena padena ācariyena vibhattā,
tika-s0501t:1236_8: tumhehi ca vitthārato sāsanapaṭṭhāne daṭṭhabbāti vissajjeti.
tika-s0501t:1236_9: Vibhattāyeva hi aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā daṭṭhabbā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1237_0: “Evaṃ sabbathā nayasamuṭṭhānaṃ vibhajitvā idāni sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ vibhajanto yasmā saṅgahavārādīsu mūlapadeheva
tika-s0501t:1237_3: evaṃ paṭṭhānatopi mūlapadāni niddhāretabbānīti dassanatthaṃ ‘aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā kuhiṃ daṭṭhabbā?
tika-s0501t:1238_1: Sāsanapaṭṭhāne aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā daṭṭhabbāti ācariyena vuttā,
tika-s0501t:1238_2: “katamaṃ taṃ sāsanapaṭṭhāna”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1238_3: Tatthāti tesu aṭṭhārasamūlapadasāsanapaṭṭhānesu katamaṃ taṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānanti idāni mayā niddhāriyamānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1238_4: bhagavatā desitaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyādisuttaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ nāmāti vissajjeti.
tika-s0501t:1238_6: Paṭṭhānanti tassa pariyattisāsanassa saṃkilesabhāgiyatādīhi pakārehi ṭhānaṃ pavattanaṃ paṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1238_10: Atha vā sāsananti adhisīlaadhicittaadhipaññāsikkhattayaṃ sāsanaṃ nāma,
tika-s0501t:1238_11: taṃ sikkhattayaṃ patiṭṭhahati etena saṃkilesādināti paṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1240_2: tesu saṃkilesādīsu saṃkileso kittako”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha saṃkileso tividho taṇhāsaṃkileso diṭṭhisaṃkileso duccaritasaṃkileso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1240_4: “Tividhe tasmiṃ saṃkilese taṇhāsaṃkileso katamena kusalena visujjhatī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha taṇhāsaṃkileso samathena visujjhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1240_6: “So samatho khandhesu katamo khandho”ti pucchitabbattā “so samatho samādhikkhandho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1240_7: “Diṭṭhisaṃkileso kena visujjhatī”ti pucchitabbattā “diṭṭhisaṃkileso vipassanāya visujjhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1240_8: “Sā vipassanā katamo khandho”ti vattabbattā “sā vipassanā paññākkhandho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1240_9: “Duccaritasaṃkileso kena visujjhatī”ti vattabbattā “duccaritasaṃkileso sucaritena visujjhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1240_10: “Taṃ sucaritaṃ katamo khandho”ti vattabbattā “taṃ sucaritaṃ sīlakkhandho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1240_11: “Tasmiṃ sīle ṭhitassa puggalassa kiṃ bhavatī”ti vattabbattā “tassa sīle patiṭṭhitassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1240_12: Sīle sucaritasaṅkhāte sīlakkhandhe patiṭṭhitassa tassa sīlavantassa puggalassa bhavesu kāmabhavarūpārūpabhavesu āsatti bhavapatthanā yadi uppajjati,
tika-s0501t:1240_14: Evaṃ sati assa sīle patiṭṭhitassa ayaṃ āsatti bhavapatthanā samathavipassanābhāvanāmayapuññakiriyavatthu ca bhavati, ca-
tika-s0501t:1240_15: saddena dānamayasīlamayapuññakiriyavatthu ca bhavatīti attho saṅgahito.
tika-s0501t:1241_1: tāni suttāni kittakānī”ti vattabbattā “imāni cattāri suttānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1241_16: bhāgiyananibbedhabhāgiyanaasekkhabhāgiyasuttāni katāni missitāni aṭṭha suttāni bhavantīti soḷasa suttāni bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1241_17: Tesu soḷasasuttesu cattāri ekakāni suttāni ca cattāri dukāni suttāni ca dve tikāni ca pāḷiyaṃ āgatāni,
tika-s0501t:1241_18: dve dukāni suttāni ca dve tikāni ca dve catukkāni suttāni ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatāni.
tika-s0501t:1242_1: evaṃ sati suttageyyādinavavidhaṃ sakalaṃ pariyattisāsanaṃ paṭṭhānanayena avibhattaṃ bhaveyyā”ti vattabbattā “imehi soḷasahi suttehī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1242_2: Paṭṭhānanayena vibhattehi soḷasahi imehi suttehi navavidhaṃ sakalaṃ pariyattisuttaṃ paṭṭhānanayena vibhattaṃyeva hutvā bhinnaṃ bhavati.
tika-s0501t:1243_1: “Tesu soḷasasu saṃkilesabhāgiyādīsu suttesu katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ sutta”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ sutta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1243_2: Tatthāti tesu soḷasasu saṃkilesabhāgiyādīsu suttesu katamaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1247_0: Idaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāge vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1247_1: Ye sattā kāmandhā kāmena andhā jālasañchannā taṇhāchadanena chāditā,
tika-s0501t:1247_4: yathā taṃ kumināmukhe ye macchā gahitā,
tika-s0501t:1247_8: evaṃ te satte jarāmaraṇaṃ anvetīti yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t:1247_9: Atha vā khīrapako vaccho mātaraṃ anveti iva,
tika-s0501t:1247_10: kumināmukhe gahitā macchā jarāmaraṇaṃ anventi iva ca,
tika-s0501t:1247_11: evaṃ ye sattā kāmandhā pamattabandhanāya bandhitabbā,
tika-s0501t:1250_0: “Chandā dosā bhayā mohā, yo dhammaṃ ativattati;
tika-s0501t:1253_1: Chandā chandahetunā dosā dosahetunā bhayā bhayahetunā mohā mohahetunā yo rājādiko yo vinayadharādiko
tika-s0501t:1253_2: vā dhammaṃ sappurisadhammaṃ ativattati atikkamitvā vattati,
tika-s0501t:1253_3: tassa rājādino vā tassa vinayadharādino vā yaso kitti ca parivāro ca bhogo ca nihīyati.
tika-s0501t:1254_1: cakkaṃva vahato padanti idaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ sutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1255_0: “Middhī yadā hoti mahagghaso ca, niddāyitā samparivattasāyī;
tika-s0501t:1257_0: Idaṃ suttampi saṃkilesabhāge visaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1257_1: Nivāpapuṭṭho mahāvarāho gāmasūkaro niddāyitā supanasīlo samparivattasāyī hoti iva,
tika-s0501t:1257_2: evaṃ yo mando satto yadā mahagghaso hoti,
tika-s0501t:1257_3: so mando satto middhī thinamiddhābhibhūto hutvā niddāyitā muduphassasayane muduhatthehi parāmasito samparivattasāyī punappunaṃ gabbhaṃ upetīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1259_0: Evaṃ atidhonacārinaṃ, sāni kammāni nayanti duggati”nti. –
tika-s0501t:1260_1: Ayasā ayato samuṭṭhitaṃ jātamalaṃ tatuṭṭhāya tato ayato uṭṭhahitvā tameva ayaṃ khādati iva,
tika-s0501t:1260_2: evaṃ atidhonacārinaṃ atikkamitvā dhonacāripuggalaṃ sāni sayaṃ katāni akusalakammāni duggatiṃ nayantīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1261_0: “Coro yathā sandhimukhe gahīto, sakammunā haññati bajjhate ca;
tika-s0501t:1262_0: Evaṃ ayaṃ pecca pajā parattha, sakammunā haññati bajjhate cā”ti. –
tika-s0501t:1263_1: Sandhimukhe rājapurisādīhi gahito coro sakammunā attanā katena corakammena haññati ca bajjhate ca yathā,
tika-s0501t:1263_2: evaṃ ayaṃ pāpakārinī pajā parattha paraloke pecca sakammunā sayaṃ katena akusalakammunā satthādīhi haññati ca addubandhanādīhi bajjhate cāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1265_0: Attano sukhamesāno, pecca so na labhate sukha”nti. –
tika-s0501t:1266_1: Attano sukhaṃ esāno esamāno yo satto aññāni sukhakāmāni bhūtāni daṇḍena vihiṃsati,
tika-s0501t:1266_2: so hiṃsako satto paraloke pecca sukhaṃ na labhatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1268_0: Sabbā tā jimhaṃ gacchanti, nette jimhaṃ gate sati.
tika-s0501t:1270_0: So ce adhammaṃ carati, pageva itarā pajā;
tika-s0501t:1271_0: Sabbaṃ raṭṭhaṃ dukkhaṃ seti, rājā ce hoti adhammiko”ti. –
tika-s0501t:1272_1: Nadiṃ taramānānaṃ gunnaṃ puṅgavo jimhaṃ ce gacchati,
tika-s0501t:1272_2: evaṃ nette jimhaṃ gate sati sabbā tā gāviyo jimhaṃ gacchanti yathā,
tika-s0501t:1272_5: evaṃ raññe adhammaṃ carante sati itarā pajā pageva paṭhamameva adhammaṃ carati.
tika-s0501t:1272_7: evaṃ raññe adhammike sati sabbaṃ raṭṭhaṃ dukkhaṃ setīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1273_0: “Sukiccharūpā vatime manussā, karonti pāpaṃ upadhīsu rattā;
tika-s0501t:1274_0: Gacchanti te bahujanasannivāsaṃ, nirayaṃ avīciṃ kaṭukaṃ bhayānaka”nti. –
tika-s0501t:1275_1: Ye manussā upadhīsu kāmaguṇūpadhīsu rattā rāgābhibhūtā hutvā pāpaṃ akusalakammaṃ karonti,
tika-s0501t:1275_2: ime pāpakammakarā manussā sukiccharūpā vata suṭṭhu kicchāpannarūpā vata bhavanti,
tika-s0501t:1275_3: te pāpakammakarā manussā kaṭukaṃ bhayānakaṃ bahujanasannivāsaṃ nirayaṃ avīciṃ gacchantīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1276_0: “Phalaṃ ve kadaliṃ hanti, phalaṃ veḷuṃ phalaṃ naḷaṃ;
tika-s0501t:1277_0: Sakkāro kāpurisaṃ hanti, gabbho assatariṃ yathā”ti. –
tika-s0501t:1278_1: Phalaṃ kadaliyā phalaṃ kadaliṃ ve ekantena hanti yathā,
tika-s0501t:1278_2: phalaṃ veḷuṃ ve ekantena hanti yathā,
tika-s0501t:1278_3: phalaṃ naḷaṃ ve ekantena hanti yathā,
tika-s0501t:1278_4: gabbho assatariṃ mātaraṃ ve ekantena hanti yathā,
tika-s0501t:1278_5: evaṃ sakkāro kāpurisaṃ ve ekantena hantīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1281_1: Sukhette sundare khettepi khittaṃ pūtibījaṃ na ruhati iva,
tika-s0501t:1281_2: evaṃ yo bhikkhu lābhasakkāragāravo kodhaṃ kujjhanalakkhaṇaṃ kodhaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1281_3: makkhaṃ paraguṇasīlamakkhanalakkhaṇaṃ makkhañca garuṃ katvā carati,
tika-s0501t:1281_4: so caranto bhikkhu saddhammasmiṃ na ruhatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1282_2: ekaccaṃ puggalaṃ paduṭṭhacittaṃ evaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi…pe…
tika-s0501t:1282_3: iti me suta”nti idaṃ suttampi saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1282_5: loke vā ahaṃ ekaccaṃ puggalaṃ paduṭṭhacittaṃ mama cetasā tassa ceto cittaṃ paricca paricchinditvā buddhacakkhunā evaṃ pajānāmi.
tika-s0501t:1282_8: yañca maggaṃ samāruḷho ayaṃ puggalo yathā yāya duppaṭipadāya yena dummaggena iriyati pavattati,
tika-s0501t:1282_9: tāya duppaṭipadāya tena dummaggena imamhi imasmiṃ samaye duppaṭipajjanakāle ayaṃ duppaṭipannaṃ paṭipanno dummaggasamāruḷho puggalo ce kālaṃ kareyya,
tika-s0501t:1282_10: evaṃ sati ābhataṃ vatthu nikkhittaṃ yathā,
tika-s0501t:1282_13: Bhikkhave assa puggalassa cittaṃ paduṭṭhaṃ padositaṃ hi yasmā hoti,
tika-s0501t:1282_16: loke vā cetopadosahetu ca pana ekacce sattā puggalā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ upapajjantīti pajānāmīti.
tika-s0501t:1282_19: nirayaṃ so upapajjatī”ti gāthāvacanaṃ iti evaṃ vuccati.
tika-s0501t:1283_1: loke vā paduṭṭhacittaṃ ekaccaṃ puggalaṃ ñatvāna bhikkhūnaṃ santike etamatthaṃ byākāsi.
tika-s0501t:1283_2: Imamhi imasmiṃ samaye ayaṃ puggalo ce kālaṃ kayirātha,
tika-s0501t:1283_3: evaṃ sati paduṭṭhacittasamaṅgī hi nirayasmiṃ upapajjeyya,
tika-s0501t:1283_4: puggalassa cittaṃ padūsitaṃ hi yasmā hoti,
tika-s0501t:1283_6: cetopadosahetu sattā duggatiṃ gacchanti ābhataṃ vatthuṃ nikkhipeyya yathā,
tika-s0501t:1283_7: evamevaṃ tathāvidho duppañño so padosacitto puggalo kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā nirayaṃ upapajjatīti ayampi attho bhagavatā vutto,
tika-s0501t:1285_0: Mākattha pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, āvi vā yadi vā raho.
tika-s0501t:1286_0: “Sace ca pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, karissatha karotha vā;
tika-s0501t:1287_0: Na vo dukkhā pamutyatthi, upeccapi palāyata”nti. –
tika-s0501t:1288_3: vo tumhehi dukkhaṃ tathā aṭṭhavidhaṃ dukkhaṃ sace appiyaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1288_4: evaṃ sati āvi vā yadi raho vā pāpakaṃ kammaṃ mākattha mā akattha.
tika-s0501t:1288_5: Sappurisā tumhe āvi vā yadi raho vā pāpakaṃ kammaṃ sace karissatha vā sace karotha vā,
tika-s0501t:1288_6: evaṃ sati upeccapi sañciccāpi palāyataṃ palāyantānaṃ vo tumhākaṃ dukkhā aṭṭhavidhā dukkhato pamutti muccanaṃ natthevāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1290_0: Mameti bālā maññanti, taṃ kathaṃ nu bhavissati.
tika-s0501t:1292_0: Matā saggaṃ na gacchanti, nanu ettāvatā hatā”ti. –
tika-s0501t:1293_1: Ye bālā adhammena ca musāvādena ca dhanaṃ saviññāṇāviññāṇaṃ sabbaṃ labhitabbaṃ dhanaṃ laddhā ubhayaṃ dhanaṃ “mama dhana”nti maññanti,
tika-s0501t:1293_2: tesaṃ bālānaṃ taṃ ubhayaṃ dhanaṃ kathaṃ kena nu pakārena bhavissati,
tika-s0501t:1293_4: Antarāyā rājantarāyādayo antarāyā tesaṃ bālānaṃ bhavissanti.
tika-s0501t:1293_6: assa adhammavohārādikassa taṃ sambhataṃ dhanaṃ vinassati.
tika-s0501t:1293_7: Matā marantā te bālā saggaṃ sugatiṃ na gacchanti.
tika-s0501t:1293_8: Sugati hi sobhanehi bhogehi aggoti “saggo”ti adhippetā.
tika-s0501t:1293_9: Ettāvatā ettakena diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikānaṃ attahitānaṃ hāyanena te bālā hatā vinaṭṭhā bhavanti nanūti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1295_0: Kathaṃ vivaṭṭate dhammā, kathaṃ saggaṃ na gacchati”.
tika-s0501t:1297_0: Lobhā vivaṭṭate dhammā, lobhā saggaṃ na gacchatī”ti. –
tika-s0501t:1298_0: Idaṃ suttampi saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Yojanattho pākaṭo.
tika-s0501t:1300_0: Karontā pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, yaṃ hoti kaṭukapphalaṃ.
