tika-s0501t:1301_0: “Na taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ sādhu, yaṃ katvā anutappati;
tika-s0501t:1303_1: Dummedhā nippaññā bālā amittena pāpakaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ iva,
tika-s0501t:1303_2: evaṃ attanā kaṭukapphalaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ hoti,
tika-s0501t:1303_3: taṃ pāpakaṃ kataṃ kammaṃ karontā caranti.
tika-s0501t:1303_4: Yaṃ kammaṃ katvā karonto pacchā anutappati,
tika-s0501t:1303_6: Yassa kammassa vipākaṃ rodaṃ rudanto assumukho paṭisevati,
tika-s0501t:1303_7: taṃ kataṃ kammaṃ na sādhūti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1304_1: avītarāgo”ti idaṃ suttampi saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1306_0: Appameyyaṃ pamāyinaṃ, nivutaṃ taṃ maññe akissava”nti. –
tika-s0501t:1307_1: Idha sāsane appameyyaṃ appameyyaguṇaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ puggalaṃ “ayaṃ khīṇāsavo puggalo ettakasīlo ettakasamādhi
tika-s0501t:1307_3: Appameyyaṃ khīṇāsavapuggalaṃ pamāyinaṃ pamāyantaṃ taṃ puthujjanaṃ ayaṃ nivutaṃ avakujjapaññaṃ akissavaṃ apaññanti maññe maññāmīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1309_0: Yāya chindati attānaṃ, bālo dubbhāsitaṃ bhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1310_0: “Na hi satthaṃ sunisitaṃ, visaṃ halāhalaṃ iva;
tika-s0501t:1311_0: Evaṃ viraddhaṃ pāteti, vācā dubbhāsitā yathā”ti. –
tika-s0501t:1312_1: Dubbhāsitaṃ ariyūpavādasaṅkhātaṃ pharusavācaṃ bhaṇaṃ bhaṇanto bālo duṭṭho puriso yāya kuṭhārīsadisiyā dubbhāsitavācāya attānaṃ chindati,
tika-s0501t:1312_2: sā kuṭhārīsadisī dubbhāsitavācā jātassa purisassa mukhe jāyate jāyati,
tika-s0501t:1312_4: evaṃ sunisitaṃ satthaṃ mukhe na jāyati,
tika-s0501t:1312_5: yathā halāhalaṃ visaṃ mukhe na jāyati,
tika-s0501t:1312_6: dubbhāsitā vācā apāyesu viraddhaṃ puggalaṃ pāteti yathā,
tika-s0501t:1312_7: evaṃ sunisitaṃ satthaṃ apāyesu na pāteti,
tika-s0501t:1312_8: halāhalaṃ visaṃ apāyesu na pātetīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1314_0: “Yo nindiyaṃ pasaṃsati, taṃ vā nindati yo pasaṃsiyo;
tika-s0501t:1315_0: Vicināti mukhena so kaliṃ, kalinā tena sukhaṃ na vindati.
tika-s0501t:1317_0: Sabbassāpi sahāpi attanā, ayameva mahantataro kali;
tika-s0501t:1319_0: “Sataṃ sahassānaṃ nirabbudānaṃ, chattiṃsatī pañca ca abbudāni;
tika-s0501t:1320_0: Yamariyagarahī nirayaṃ upeti, vācaṃ manañca paṇidhāya pāpaka”nti. –
tika-s0501t:1321_1: Yo puggalo nindiyaṃ duccaraṃ dussīlaṃ puggalaṃ pasaṃsati,
tika-s0501t:1321_2: so pasaṃsako puggalo mukhena kaliṃ vicināti upacināti,
tika-s0501t:1321_4: Yo sucārī sīlavā puggalo pasaṃsiyo hoti,
tika-s0501t:1321_5: taṃ vā sucāriṃ vā sīlavantaṃ puggalaṃ yo puggalo nindati,
tika-s0501t:1321_6: so nindanto puggalo mukhena kaliṃ vicināti upacināti,
tika-s0501t:1322_0: Attanā sahāpi sabbassa dhanassa vasenapi akkhesu yo dhanaparājayo bhavati,
tika-s0501t:1322_1: ayaṃ kali ayaṃ dhanaparājayo appamatto hoti.
tika-s0501t:1323_1: Vācañca manañca paṇidhāya ariyagarahī puggalo yaṃ kālaṃ pāpakaṃ nirayaṃ upeti,
tika-s0501t:1323_2: so kālo “sataṃ sahassānaṃ nirabbudānañca chattiṃsa nirabbudāni ca pañca abbudāni ca yasmiṃ kāle gaṇīyantī”ti tena kālena samo hoti,
tika-s0501t:1326_1: Yo puggalo lobhaguṇe anuyutto anu punappunaṃ yutto hoti,
tika-s0501t:1326_2: so puggalo aññe puggale vacasā paribhāsati,
tika-s0501t:1326_3: assaddho kadariyo avadaññū buddhānaṃ ovādaññū na hoti,
tika-s0501t:1327_0: Mukhadugga mukhavisama vibhūta vigatabhūta anariya bhūnahu buddhivināsaka pāpaka dukkaṭakāri purisanta
tika-s0501t:1327_1: purisalāmaka kali alakkhi avajātaputta tvaṃ nerayiko asi.
tika-s0501t:1328_0: Ahitāya rajaṃ attani mā ākirasi mā pakkhipasi.
tika-s0501t:1328_1: Kibbisakāri tvaṃ sante khīṇāsave puggale garahasi,
tika-s0501t:1328_3: caritvā tvaṃ cirarattaṃ racanavirahitaṃ papataṃ narakaṃ nirayaṃ gacchasi kho ekaṃsenāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1329_2: “katamaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ sutta”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ sutta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1329_3: Tatthāti tesu soḷasasu saṃkilesabhāgiyādīsu suttesu katamaṃ suttaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1329_5: chāyāva anapāyinī”ti idaṃ vāsanābhāge puññabhāge visaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1330_2: apāpikā kālaṅkiriyā”ti idaṃ suttampi vāsanābhāge puññabhāge visaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1332_0: Attano sukhamesāno, pecca so labhate sukha”nti. –
tika-s0501t:1333_0: Idaṃ suttampi vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Attho pākaṭo.
tika-s0501t:1334_1: rājā ce hoti dhammiko”ti idaṃ suttampi vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1336_1: sattahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto janapadacārikaṃ caranti.
tika-s0501t:1336_9: avuṭṭhiādiupaddavūpasamanatthañcāti imehi sattahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto janapadacārikaṃ carantīti janapadacaraṇakāraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1338_0: Deve ceva manusse ca, sesena parinibbuto”ti. –
tika-s0501t:1339_0: Idaṃ suttampi vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Sahassaṃ kappakoṭiyoti sahassaṃ attabhāvato koṭiyo.
tika-s0501t:1343_0: Tisso vijjā sacchikatā, tassā saññāya vāsanā”ti. –
tika-s0501t:1344_0: Idaṃ suttampi vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Haritobhāseti haritaobhāse. Alabhiṃhanti ahaṃ alabhiṃ.
tika-s0501t:1345_1: vipāko hoti acintiyo”ti idaṃ suttampi vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1345_2: Aggapuggalo anukampako taṇhānighātako muni sambuddho purebhattaṃ piṇḍāya piṇḍaṃ paṭiggaṇhituṃ kosalaṃ puraṃ pāvisi.
tika-s0501t:1346_0: Yassa purisassa hatthe sabbapupphehi alaṅkato vaṭaṃsako pupphavaṭaṃsakova atthi,
tika-s0501t:1346_1: so ayaṃ puriso rājamaggena kosalapuraṃ pavisantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghapurakkhataṃ devamānusapūjitaṃ sambuddhaṃ addasa,
tika-s0501t:1347_0: Upasaṅkamitvā so ayaṃ pasanno hutvā surabhiṃ vaṇṇavantaṃ manoramaṃ taṃ vaṭaṃsakaṃ sambuddhassa sehi pāṇībhi upanāmesi.
tika-s0501t:1348_0: Tato buddhassa lapanantarā lapanassa vadanassa antarā aggisikhā vaṇṇā sahassaraṃsi okkā pabhā nikkhami,
tika-s0501t:1348_2: evaṃ ānanā sahassaraṃsi nikkhamitvā ādiccabandhuno sīse tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karitvāna parivaṭṭetvā muddhani antaradhāyatha.
tika-s0501t:1349_0: Ānando acchariyaṃ abbhutaṃ lomahaṃsanaṃ idaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā cīvaraṃ ekaṃsaṃ karitvā etaṃ abravi –
tika-s0501t:1350_0: Yassa bhagavato sabbadhammesu ñāṇaṃ sadā pavattati,
tika-s0501t:1350_1: kaṅkhāvitaraṇo muni so bhagavā kaṅkhiṃ vematikaṃ ānandaṃ theraṃ etaṃ abravi. Ānanda,
tika-s0501t:1350_3: so puriso caturāsītikappāni duggatiṃ na gamissati,
tika-s0501t:1350_4: devesu devasobhaggaṃ dibbaṃ rajjaṃ pasāsitvā manujesu raṭṭhe sakalaraṭṭhe manujindo rājā bhavissati.
tika-s0501t:1350_6: dhammataṃ sacchikatvā ca dhutarāgo vaṭaṃsako nāma paccekabuddho bhavissati.
tika-s0501t:1351_0: Tathāgate vā sammāsambuddhe vā paccekasambuddhe vā tassa tathāgatassa sāvake vā citte pasannamhi dakkhiṇā appakā nāma natthi.
tika-s0501t:1352_1: Buddhadhammā buddhaguṇā evaṃ ettakāti acintiyā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t:1352_2: acintiye pasannānaṃ vipāko puññavipāko evaṃ ettakoti acintiyo hotīti etaṃ abravīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1353_3: ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā iti me suta”nti idaṃ suttampi vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1353_5: idha imasmiṃ sāsane ahaṃ ekaccaṃ puggalaṃ evaṃ mama cetasā ekaccassa puggalassa ceto cittaṃ paricca buddhacakkhunā evaṃ pajānāmi,
tika-s0501t:1353_6: yathā yena pakārena ayaṃ puggalo yañca dānādipaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno,
tika-s0501t:1353_7: yañca dassanādimaggaṃ samāruḷho hutvā taṃ paṭipadaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1353_9: imamhi imasmiñca samaye ayaṃ puggalo ce kālaṃ kareyya,
tika-s0501t:1353_10: evaṃ sati ābhataṃ vatthuṃ nikkhipati yathā,
tika-s0501t:1353_11: evaṃ tāya paṭipadāya tena maggena sagge attanikkhitto bhave.
tika-s0501t:1353_14: assa puggalassa cittaṃ hi yasmā pasannaṃ pasāditaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1353_17: loke vā ekacce sattā puggalā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ cetopasādahetu kho pana
tika-s0501t:1353_18: upapajjantīti evaṃ ahaṃ pajānāmīti bhagavā etamatthaṃ avoca.
tika-s0501t:1353_19: Tattha tasmiṃ atthe saṅgahavasena pavattaṃ etaṃ “pasannacittaṃ ñatvāna…pe…
tika-s0501t:1354_1: etādisaṃ katapuññā labhi”nti idaṃ suttampi vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1354_2: Nāri devadhītā suvaṇṇacchadanaṃ suvaṇṇālaṅkārehi chāditaṃ nāvaṃ āruyha tiṭṭhasi,
tika-s0501t:1355_0: Devate kena kammena te tava tādiso vaṇṇo tādiso ānubhāvo tādisī juti bhavati,
tika-s0501t:1355_1: devate te tava ye keci bhogā manasā icchitā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t:1355_2: te bhogā ca kena kammena uppajjanti.
tika-s0501t:1355_3: Devate me pucchitā tvaṃ saṃsa saṃsāhi idaṃ sabbaṃ kissa kammassa ca phalanti sakko pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1356_0: Devarājena pucchitā sā devadhītā attamanā hutvā pañhaṃ puṭṭhā sakkassa byākāsi.
tika-s0501t:1356_1: Devarājā addhānaṃ dīghamaggaṃ paṭipannā ahaṃ yasassino kassapassa bhagavato manoramaṃ thūpaṃ addassaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1356_4: Tasseva kammassa idaṃ sabbaṃ phalaṃ vipāko bhave.
tika-s0501t:1356_5: Katapuññāhaṃ etādisaṃ phalaṃ alabhinti sakkassa byākāsi.
tika-s0501t:1356_6: Iti me sutanti mahāmoggallāno vadatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1357_2: Tattha yāya desanāya dānañca dānaphalañca dassitaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1357_6: Yāya desanāya saggā ca saggesu nibbattāpakañca kammaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1357_8: Yāya desanāya dānasīlabhāvanādivasena dasavidhaṃ puññakammaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1357_10: Yāya desanāya tādisassa puññakammassa vividho ayaṃ vipāko imassa puññassa vipākoti niyametvā dassito,
tika-s0501t:1358_0: Dasabaladharānaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ uddissakatesu sarīradhātuṃ abbhantare ṭhapetvā paṃsūhi katesu thūpesu ye narā pasannā,
tika-s0501t:1358_1: te narā tattha thūpe kāraṃ puññaṃ katvā saggesu uppajjitvā pamodantīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1359_1: Devaputtasarīravaṇṇā devaputtasarīrasadisavaṇṇā subhagasaṇṭhiti sobhaggayuttasaṇṭhānā sabbe janā udakena paṃsuṃ temetvā thūpaṃ vaḍḍhetha,
tika-s0501t:1359_2: so ayaṃ thūpo kassa puggalassa thūpoti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1360_0: Sugatte sundaragatte devate tasmiṃ thūpe pasannā ime devamanujā kāraṃ puññaṃ karontā hutvā jarāmaraṇato pamuccare.
tika-s0501t:1360_1: So ayaṃ thūpo mahesino dasabaladhammadhārino sugatassa thūpoti veditabboti āhāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1361_0: Yāhaṃ yā ahaṃ mahesino thūpaṃ cattāri uppalāni ca mālañca abhiropayiṃ,
tika-s0501t:1361_1: tena mayā kataṃ taṃ puññaṃ uḷāraṃ vata āsi ahosi.
tika-s0501t:1361_2: Tato kappato ajja kappā tiṃsaṃ dharanti satthuno thūpaṃ pūjetvā tattakāni duggatiṃ na jānāmi,
tika-s0501t:1362_0: Ahaṃ bāttiṃsalakkhaṇadharassa bāttiṃsalakkhaṇadharena sampannassa vijitavijayassa lokanāthassa thūpaṃ apūjesiṃ,
tika-s0501t:1362_1: pūjetvā satasahassaṃ kappe āyukappe pamudito āsiṃ.
tika-s0501t:1362_3: tena puññena vinipātaṃ anāgantuna anāgantvā devasobhaggaṃ sampattiṃ ca devarajjāni ca tāni akāriṃ.
tika-s0501t:1363_0: Adantadamakassa sāsane yaṃ cakkhu paññācakkhu paṇihitaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1363_2: taṃ sabbaṃ paññācakkhu vimuttacittaṃ me mayā laddhaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1363_3: ahaṃ vidhutalatāsaṅkhātataṇhā hutvā vimuttacittā phalavimuttacittasampannā amhīti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1364_1: Vimuttacitte phalavimuttacittasampanne akhile pañcacetokhīlarahite anāsave araṇavihārimhi araṇavihārasīle
tika-s0501t:1364_2: asaṅgamānase alaggamānase paccekabuddhasmiṃ sāmākapatthodanamattameva dakkhiṇaṃ adāsiṃ.
tika-s0501t:1365_0: Tasmiṃ paccekabuddhe uttamaṃ dhammaṃ paccekabodhidhammaṃ okappayiṃ “so uttamo dhammo atthī”ti saddahiṃ.
tika-s0501t:1365_1: Evaṃ ariyavihārena vihārīhi paccekabuddhehi me mama saṅgamo kato siyā bhave,
tika-s0501t:1365_2: kudāsupi ca ahaṃ apekkhavā mā bhaveyyanti mānasaṃ tasmiñca dhamme paṇidhesiṃ “iminā paccekabuddhena laddhadhammaṃ
tika-s0501t:1366_0: Tasseva paccekabuddhe katasseva kammassa vipākato ahaṃ dīghāyukesu amamesu “mama pariggaho”ti pariggahābhāvena
tika-s0501t:1366_1: apariggahesu visesagāmīsu ahīnagāmīsu kurūsu uttarakurūsu pāṇīsu sattesu sahassakkhattuṃ upapajjatha
tika-s0501t:1367_0: Tasseva kammassa vipākato vicitramālābharaṇānulepīsu yasassīsu parivāravantesu tidaso devo ahaṃ visiṭṭhakāyūpagato hutvā sahassakkhattuṃ upapajjatha.
tika-s0501t:1368_0: Tasseva kammassa vipākato ahaṃ vimuttacitto akhīlo anāsavo hutvā hitāhitāsīhi kusalākusalavītivattehi antimadehadhāribhi imehi paccekabuddhehi,
tika-s0501t:1368_1: buddhasāvakehi vā me mama samāgamo āsi.
tika-s0501t:1369_1: taṃ samijjhate”ti imaṃ vacanaṃ tathāgato jino paccakkhaṃ katvā avaca kho,
tika-s0501t:1369_2: yathā yathā yena yena pakārena me manasā vicintitaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1369_3: tathā tathā tena tena pakārena samiddhaṃ bhavati.
tika-s0501t:1370_0: Ekatiṃsamhi kappamhi jino anejo anantadassī “sikhī”ti itināmako uppajji.
tika-s0501t:1370_1: Tassāpi bhagavato rājā bhātā sikhiddhe ca sikhī itināmake buddhe ca tassa bhagavato dhamme ca abhippasanno
tika-s0501t:1370_2: lokavināyakamhi parinibbute sati devātidevassa naruttamassa mahesino vipulaṃ mahantaṃ samantato gāvutikaṃ
tika-s0501t:1371_0: Tasmiṃ thūpe baliṃ pūjābaliṃ abhihārī manusso jātisumanaṃ paggayha pahaṭṭho pūjesi.
tika-s0501t:1371_1: Assa manussassa ekaṃ pupphaṃ vātena paharitaṃ hutvā patitaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1371_2: Ahaṃ taṃ patitaṃ ekaṃ pupphaṃ gahetvā tasseva pupphasāmikassa adāsiṃ.
tika-s0501t:1372_0: So manusso pupphasāmiko abhippasannacitto hutvā maṃ “tvameva etaṃ ekaṃ pupphaṃ pūjā”ti adāsi.
tika-s0501t:1372_3: Ahaṃ taṃ ekaṃ pupphaṃ gahetvā buddhaṃ buddhaguṇaṃ punappunaṃ anussaranto yasmiṃ kappe abhiropayiṃ,
tika-s0501t:1372_4: tato kappato ajja kappā tiṃsaṃ ahesuṃ.
tika-s0501t:1372_7: idaṃ phalaṃ thūpapūjāya phalanti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1373_0: Brahmadattassa brahmadattanāmakassa rājino kapilaṃ nāma nagaraṃ suvibhattaṃ bhāgato suṭṭhu vibhattaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1374_0: Pañcālānaṃ tattha puruttame ahaṃ kummāsaṃ vikkiṇiṃ,
tika-s0501t:1374_1: so ahaṃ yasassinaṃ upariṭṭhaṃ upasamīpe ṭhitaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ nāma sambuddhaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ addasiṃ,
tika-s0501t:1374_2: disvā haṭṭho cittaṃ pasādetvā naruttamaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ me gehasmiṃ yaṃ dhuvabhattaṃ vijjatha vijji,
tika-s0501t:1375_0: Yato ca yasmiṃ kāle ca kattiko yassaṃ pannarasīpuṇṇo,
tika-s0501t:1375_2: tato ca tasmiṃ kāle ca ahaṃ navaṃ dussayugaṃ gayha ariṭṭhassa ariṭṭhanāmakassa paccekabuddhassa upanāmesiṃ.
tika-s0501t:1376_0: Naruttamo anukampako kāruṇiko taṇhānighātako muni paccekabuddho pasannacittaṃ maṃ ñatvāna paṭiggaṇhi.
tika-s0501t:1377_0: Ahaṃ kalyāṇaṃ buddhavaṇṇitaṃ kammaṃ karitvāna deve ca manusse ca sandhāvitvā tato cuto bārāṇasiyaṃ nagare
tika-s0501t:1378_0: Tato ca tasmiṃ kāle viññutaṃ patto hutvā devaputtena codito ahaṃ pāsādā oruhitvāna sambuddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamiṃ.
tika-s0501t:1379_0: So sambuddho bhagavā gotamo anukampāya me dhammaṃ adesesi.
tika-s0501t:1379_1: Dukkhaṃ dukkhasaccañca dukkhasamuppādaṃ samudayasaccañca dukkhassa atikkamaṃ nirodhasaccañca ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ
tika-s0501t:1379_2: dukkhūpasamagāminaṃ maggaṃ maggasaccañca iti cattāri saccāni desitāni,
tika-s0501t:1379_3: taduppādakaṃ dhammaṃ muni bhagavā gotamo adesayi.
tika-s0501t:1380_0: Ahaṃ tassa bhagavato gotamassa vacanaṃ sutvā sāsane rato hutvā vihariṃ,
tika-s0501t:1380_1: ahaṃ rattindivaṃ atandito hutvā samathaṃ paṭivijjhiṃ.
tika-s0501t:1381_1: bahiddhā ca ye āsavā maggena samucchinnā āsuṃ,
tika-s0501t:1381_2: sabbe te āsavā me mama vijjiṃsu,
tika-s0501t:1382_1: ayaṃ samussayo jātimaraṇasaṃsāro carimo antimo āsi,
tika-s0501t:1382_2: idāni imassa attabhāvassa anantaraṃ punabbhavo mama natthīti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1382_3: Yaṃ nānāvidhaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ udāharaṇavasena niddhāritaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1382_4: idaṃ nānāvidhaṃ suttaṃ vāsanābhāge puññakoṭṭhāse visaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1383_2: “katamaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ sutta”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ sutta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1383_3: Tattha tesu soḷasasu saṃkilesabhāgiyādīsu suttesu katamaṃ suttaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1384_0: Uddhaṃ brahmaloke adho kāmāvacare bhave sabbadhi sabbesu bhavesu vippamutto arahā “ayaṃ nāma dhammo ahaṃ asmī”ti anānupassī,
tika-s0501t:1384_1: evaṃ vimutto arahā atiṇṇapubbaṃ oghaṃ apunabbhavāya udatāri uttiṇṇoti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1384_2: Idaṃ suttaṃ nibbedhabhāge sekkhadhamme visaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1385_1: sīlavato puggalassa “kinti me mama avippaṭisāro jāyeyya pavatteyyā”ti cetanā na karaṇīyā na kātabbā. Ānanda,
tika-s0501t:1385_3: esā avippaṭisārassa jāyanā pavattanā dhammatā bhavati. Ānanda,
tika-s0501t:1385_4: avippaṭisārinā puggalena “kinti me mama pāmojjaṃ jāyeyya pavatteyyā”ti cetanā na karaṇīyā, ānanda,
tika-s0501t:1385_5: avippaṭisārino puggalassa pāmojjaṃ yaṃ jāyeyya pavatteyya,
tika-s0501t:1386_0: Ātāpino kilesānaṃ ātāpena sammappadhānena samannāgatassa jhāyato jhāyantassa brāhmaṇassa bāhitapāpassa
tika-s0501t:1386_1: khīṇāsavassa dhammā anulomapaccayākārapaṭivedhasādhakā bodhipakkhiyadhammā yadā yasmiṃ kāle have ekantena
tika-s0501t:1386_3: Atha vā dhammā catuariyasaccadhammā pātubhavanti pakāsayanti abhisamayavasena pākaṭā honti.
tika-s0501t:1386_4: Atha vā pātubhavanakāle assa ātāpino jhāyato brāhmaṇassa khīṇāsavassa sabbā kaṅkhā vapayanti apagacchanti nirujjhanti. Kasmā?
tika-s0501t:1386_5: Sahetudhammaṃ avijjādikena hetunā saha pavattaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ sukhena asammissaṃ dukkhakkhandhadhammaṃ yato yasmā pajānāti aññāsi paṭivijjhati,
tika-s0501t:1386_6: tato tasmā vapayanti apagacchanti nirujjhantīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1387_0: Dutiyagāthāyaṃ pana paccayānaṃ khayaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ yato yasmā avedi aññāsi paṭivijjhi,
tika-s0501t:1387_1: tato tasmā sabbāpi kaṅkhā vapayantīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1388_3: te tava akkodho akujjhanaṃ varaṃ uttamaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1388_5: tayā kodhamānamakkhavinayatthaṃ brahmacariyaṃ vussati nūti bhagavā avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1389_0: Āraññaṃ āraññakaṃ paṃsukūlikaṃ aññātuñchena aññātaanabhilakkhitagharapaṭipāṭiyā ṭhatvā uñchena piṇḍapātacaraṇavīriyena
tika-s0501t:1389_1: laddhena missakabhojanena yāpentaṃ nandaṃ kadā kāle ahaṃ passeyyanti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1390_1: kiṃsu katamaṃ chetvā vadhitvā vadhanto kodhapariḷāhena aparidayhamāno hutvā sukhaṃ seti sayati,
tika-s0501t:1390_2: kiṃsu katamaṃ chetvā vadhitvā vadhanto kodhavināsena vinaṭṭhadomanasso hutvā na socati, gotama,
tika-s0501t:1390_3: tvaṃ kissa ekadhammassa vadhaṃ vadhanaṃ rocesīti brāhmaṇo pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1391_1: kodhaṃ kujjhanaṃ chetvā vadhitvā vadhanto kodhapariḷāhena aparidayhamāno hutvā sukhaṃ seti sayati,
tika-s0501t:1391_2: kodhaṃ kujjhanaṃ chetvā vadhitvā vadhanto kodhavināsena vinaṭṭhadomanasso hutvā na socati,
tika-s0501t:1391_3: visamūlassa visasadisassa dukkhassa mūlabhūtassa madhuraggassa madhurasaṅkhātassa sukhapariyosānassa
tika-s0501t:1391_4: kodhassa kujjhanassa vadhaṃ vadhanaṃ ariyā buddhādayo puggalā pasaṃsanti.
tika-s0501t:1391_5: Hi saccaṃ taṃ kodhaṃ kujjhanaṃ chetvā vadhitvā vadhanto kodhavināsena vinaṭṭhadomanasso hutvā seti sayatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1391_6: Madhuraggassāti ca madhuraṃ cetasikasukhaṃ assādaaggaṃ pariyosānaṃ assa kodhassāti madhuraggoti samāso veditabbo.
tika-s0501t:1391_7: Kujjhantassa hi akkositvā paribhāsitvā paharitvā pariyosāne cetasikasukhassādo uppajjatīti.
tika-s0501t:1392_1: hananto dhīro uppatitaṃ kiṃsu katamaṃ hane haneyya.
tika-s0501t:1392_2: Vinodento dhīro jātaṃ kiṃsu katamaṃ vinodaye vinodayeyya.
tika-s0501t:1392_3: Pajahanto dhīro kiṃ ca katamaṃ pajahe pajaheyya.
tika-s0501t:1392_4: Dhīrassa kissa dhammassa abhisamayo sukhoti devatā pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1393_1: hananto dhīro uppatitaṃ kodhaṃ kujjhanaṃ hane haneyya.
tika-s0501t:1393_2: Vinodento dhīro jātaṃ rāgaṃ vinodaye vinodayeyya.
tika-s0501t:1393_4: Saccadhammassa abhisamayo sukhoti bhagavā avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1394_1: Bhagavā sattiyā omaṭṭho uparito yāva heṭṭhā viddho puriso sattippahānāya vīriyaṃ ārabhati viya,
tika-s0501t:1394_2: agginā matthake ḍayhamāno ādittasiro puriso agginibbāpanatthāya vīriyaṃ ārabhati iva,
tika-s0501t:1394_3: evaṃ kāmarāgena ḍayhamāno bhikkhu kāmarāgappahānāya kāmarāgavikkhambhanāya appamatto vāyamamāno sato
tika-s0501t:1394_4: satisampanno hutvā paribbaje vihareyyāti devatā kathesi.
tika-s0501t:1395_0: Bhagavā pana “samucchedappahānāya vīriyaṃ ārabhīyatī”ti dassetuṃ “sattiyā viya omaṭṭho”tiādimāha.
tika-s0501t:1395_2: sattiyā omaṭṭho puriso sattippahānāya vīriyaṃ ārabhati viya,
tika-s0501t:1395_3: agginā matthake ḍayhamāno ādittasiro puriso agginibbāpanatthāya vīriyaṃ ārabhati iva,
tika-s0501t:1395_4: evaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā abhibhūto bhikkhu sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā pahānāya maggena samucchedappahānāya appamatto
tika-s0501t:1395_5: vāyamamāno sato satisampanno hutvā paribbaje vihareyyāti bhagavā avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1396_0: Sabbe nicayā bhogā khayantā khayapariyosānā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t:1396_1: sabbe samussayā dhammā patanantā patanapariyosānā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t:1396_2: sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ maraṇamāgamma sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ addhuvaṃ bhavati,
tika-s0501t:1396_3: iti etaṃ vuttappakāraṃ bhayaṃ bhayahetuṃ maraṇaṃ sammutimaraṇaṃ apekkhamāno paṇḍito sukhāvahāni diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikasukhāvahāni
tika-s0501t:1397_3: sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ maraṇamāgamma sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ addhuvaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1397_4: iti etaṃ vuttappakāraṃ bhayaṃ bhayahetuṃ maraṇaṃ apekkhamāno santipekkho sabbasaṅkhārupasamaṃ nibbānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1397_5: apekkhamāno paṇḍito lokāmisaṃ kāmaguṇaṃ pajahe pajaheyyāti bhagavā avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1398_0: Māvidha yesaṃ munīnaṃ cittaṃ jhānarataṃ jhāne rataṃ hoti,
tika-s0501t:1398_1: te munayo sukhaṃ sayanti na socanti.
tika-s0501t:1398_2: Paññavā maggapaññavā susamāhito āraddhavīriyo pahitatto nibbānaṃ pesitacitto puggalo duttaraṃ oghaṃ saṃsāroghaṃ tarati.
tika-s0501t:1399_0: Kāmasaññāya virato vigatacitto yo khīṇāsavo sabbasaṃyojanātīto arahattamaggena sabbe saṃyojane atīto nandibhavaparikkhīṇo ahosi,
tika-s0501t:1399_1: so khīṇāsavo gambhīre saṃsāraṇṇave na sīdatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1399_2: Nandisaṅkhātā taṇhā ca kāmabhavarūpabhavaarūpabhavā ca nandibhavā,
tika-s0501t:1399_3: nandibhavā parikkhīṇā yassa khīṇāsavassāti nandibhavaparikkhīṇoti samāso veditabbo.
tika-s0501t:1400_0: Arahataṃ arahantānaṃ buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ dhammaṃ sucaritādibhedañca sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyabhedañca
tika-s0501t:1400_1: dhammaṃ yo paṇḍito saddahāno saddahanto hutvā nibbānappattiyā appamatto vicakkhaṇo hutvā sussūsaṃ sussūsanto bhave,
tika-s0501t:1400_2: so paṇḍito paññaṃ lokiyalokuttarapaññaṃ labhate labhati.
tika-s0501t:1401_0: Yo vīriyavā puggalo patirūpadesakārī desakālādīni ahāpetvā lokiyalokuttaradhammapatirūpaṃ adhigamūpāyaṃ karoti,
tika-s0501t:1401_1: dhuravā cetasikavīriyena anikkhittadhuro uṭṭhātā kāyikavīriyavasena uṭṭhānasampanno hoti,
tika-s0501t:1401_2: so vīriyavā puggalo dhanaṃ lokiyalokuttaradhanaṃ vindate adhigacchati.
tika-s0501t:1401_3: Saccena vacīsaccena ca paramatthasaccena ca buddhādiko saccadhamme ṭhito sappuriso kittiṃ pappoti.
tika-s0501t:1401_4: Dadaṃ dadanto yaṃ kiñci icchitaṃ patthitaṃ catusaṅgahavatthuṃ dadanto saṅgahanto sappuriso mittāni ekantamittāni ganthati sampādeti,
tika-s0501t:1401_5: evaṃ catūhi saccadhammadhiticāgehi samannāgato so sappuriso asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ pecca gantvā ekantena sokakāraṇassa abhāvato na socatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1402_1: sabbaganthappahīno tīhi bhavehi vippamutto sato satisampanno tvaṃ, samaṇo,
tika-s0501t:1402_2: aññaṃ devamanussādikaṃ yaṃ anusāsasi yaṃ anusāsanaṃ karosi,
tika-s0501t:1402_3: taṃ anusāsanaṃ sabbaganthappahīnassa tīhi bhavehi vippamuttassa samaṇassa te tava na sādhūti sakkanāmako mārapakkhiko yakkho gāthāya ajjhabhāsi.
tika-s0501t:1403_0: “Sakka sakkanāmaka yakkha anukampitena purisena saddhiṃ yena kenaci vaṇṇena kāraṇena saṃvāso ekasmiṃ ṭhāne sahavāso jāyati,
tika-s0501t:1403_1: taṃ anukampitabbaṃ sahavāsagataṃ purisaṃ sappañño manasā anukampituṃ na arahati anukampituṃyeva arahati.
tika-s0501t:1403_6: tāya anuddayāya mettāya muditāya ca samussāhitena pasannena manasā yo sappañño sappuriso aññaṃ devamanussādikaṃ yaṃ anusāsati yaṃ anusāsanaṃ karoti,
tika-s0501t:1403_7: so sappañño sappuriso tena anusāsanena saṃyutto kāmacchandādīnaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ vasena ananulomasaṃyogena saṃyutto na hotīti bhagavā avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1404_1: rāgo ca doso ca ime dve dhammā kutonidānā,
tika-s0501t:1404_4: arati ca rati ca lomahaṃso ca ime tayo kutojā kuto bhavanti?
tika-s0501t:1404_5: Kumārakā dhaṅkaṃ kākaṃ gahetvā pāde dīghasuttakena bandhitvā suttakoṭiṃ aṅguliyaṃ veṭhetvā osajanti iva,
tika-s0501t:1404_6: evaṃ manovitakkā kuto samuṭṭhāya cittaṃ osajantīti sūcilomayakkho bhagavantaṃ pucchi.
tika-s0501t:1405_0: Rāgo ca doso ca ime dve dhammā itonidānā ito attabhāvato nidānā jāyanti;
tika-s0501t:1405_1: arati ca rati ca lomahaṃso ca ime tayo itojā ito attato bhavanti;
tika-s0501t:1405_2: kumārakā dhaṅkaṃ kākaṃ gahetvā pāde dīghasuttakena bandhitvā suttakoṭiṃ aṅguliyaṃ veṭhetvā osajanti iva,
tika-s0501t:1405_3: evaṃ manovitakkā ito attabhāvato samuṭṭhāya cittaṃ osajanti.
tika-s0501t:1406_0: Nigrodhassa khandhajā pārohā sākhāsu jāyanti iva,
tika-s0501t:1406_1: vane rukkhaṃ nissāya jātā māluvā latā taṃ rukkhaṃ ajjhottharitvā vitatā otatavitatā tiṭṭhati iva, evaṃ, yakkha,
tika-s0501t:1406_2: tvaṃ suṇohi snehajā taṇhāsnehato jātā attasambhūtā attani sambhūtā puna anekappakārā manovitakkā pāpamanovitakkā
tika-s0501t:1406_3: ceva taṃsampayuttakilesā ca kāmesu vatthukāmesu visattā laggā saṃsibbitā ṭhitā.
tika-s0501t:1407_0: Ye paṇḍitā “yaṃ nidānaṃ assa attabhāvassā”ti yatonidānaṃ naṃ kilesagahanaṃ samudayasaccaṃ pajānanti,
tika-s0501t:1407_1: te paṇḍitā attabhāvasaṅkhātassa dukkhasaccassa nidānabhūtaṃ naṃ kilesagahanaṃ samudayasaccaṃ maggasaccena vinodenti.
tika-s0501t:1407_2: Apunabbhavāya apunabhavasaṅkhātāya nirodhasaccatthāya atiṇṇapubbaṃ anamatagge saṃsāre supinenāpi atiṇṇapubbaṃ
tika-s0501t:1407_3: duttaraṃ imaṃ oghaṃ catubbidhaṃ saṃkilesoghaṃ tarantīti bhagavā avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1408_2: samaṇadhammassa karaṇaṃ nāma sudukkaraṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ dukkara”nti eko kulaputto pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ
tika-s0501t:1408_3: katvā ariyabhūmiṃ appatvā kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatto,
tika-s0501t:1408_4: so devaputto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha. Kāmada,
tika-s0501t:1408_5: sīlasamāhitā ṭhitattā ṭhitasabhāvā satta sekkhā puggalā dukkaraṃ vāpi samaṇadhammaṃ karonti.
tika-s0501t:1408_6: Anagāriyupetassa anagāriyaṃ niggehabhāvaṃ upagatassa pabbajitassa tuṭṭhi catupaccayasantoso sukhāvahā hotī”ti bhagavā avoca.
tika-s0501t:1409_2: esā tuṭṭhi dullabhā”ti so devaputto āha. “Kāmada,
tika-s0501t:1409_3: yesaṃ sekkhānaṃ mano divā ca ratto ca bhāvanāya rato cittavūpasame rato,
tika-s0501t:1409_4: te sekkhā dullabhaṃ vāpi tussanaṃ labhantī”ti bhagavā avoca.
tika-s0501t:1410_1: yadidaṃ yaṃ idaṃ cittaṃ bhāvanāya rataṃ,
tika-s0501t:1410_2: taṃ cittaṃ dussamādaha”nti so devaputto āha. “Kāmada,
tika-s0501t:1410_4: te ariyā dussamādahaṃ vāpi cittaṃ samādahanti, kāmada,
tika-s0501t:1410_5: te ariyā maccuno jālaṃ kilesajālaṃ chetvā maggaṃ gacchantī”ti bhagavā avoca.
tika-s0501t:1411_2: so maggo duggamo”ti so devaputto āha. “Kāmada,
tika-s0501t:1411_3: ariyā duggame visame vāpi maggaṃ gacchanti,
tika-s0501t:1411_5: ariyānaṃ so maggo samova bhave, na asamo.
tika-s0501t:1411_6: Hi saccaṃ visame visattakāye ariyā samā bhavantī”ti bhagavā avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1412_2: idaṃ taṃ jetavanaṃ mama pītisañjananaṃ pītiyā sañjananaṃ karaṃ hi karaṃ eva.
tika-s0501t:1413_0: Kammaṃ maggacetanākammañca vijjā maggapaññā ca dhammo samādhi ceva samādhipakkhiko ca dhammo sīlaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1413_3: gottena vā dhanena vā sattā na sujjhanti.
tika-s0501t:1414_0: Tasmā maggeneva sattānaṃ visujjhanato attano atthaṃ sampassaṃ passanto paṇḍito poso yoniso upāyena dhammaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammaṃ vicine vicineyya,
tika-s0501t:1414_1: evaṃ vicinane sati tattha ariyamagge vicinanto puggalo sujjhati.
tika-s0501t:1415_0: Sāriputto sīlena ca upasamena ca pāraṅgato iva,
tika-s0501t:1415_1: evaṃ yopi bhikkhu sīlena ca upasamena ca pāraṅgato,
tika-s0501t:1415_2: so bhikkhu etāva paramo sāriputtasadisova siyāti anāthapiṇḍikanāmo devaputto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āhāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1416_1: anāgataṃ anāgatakkhandhapañcakaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhīhi nappaṭikaṅkhe na pattheyya.
tika-s0501t:1416_2: Yaṃ yasmā atītaṃ pahīnaṃ niruddhaṃ atthaṅgataṃ,
tika-s0501t:1416_3: tasmā atītassa pahīnattā niruddhattā atthaṅgatattā nānvāgameyya.
tika-s0501t:1417_0: Paccuppannaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ vayadhammaṃ yattha yattha santāne vā,
tika-s0501t:1417_3: tattha tattha araññādīsu vā naṃ paccuppannadhammaṃ yāhi aniccānupassanādīhi vipassati,
tika-s0501t:1417_4: tāhi aniccānupassanādīhi nibbānaṃ rāgādīhi asaṃhīraṃ asaṃkuppaṃ bhavati,
tika-s0501t:1417_5: taṃ nibbānaṃ vipassako puggalo vidvā nibbānārammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ appento hutvā anubrūhaye vaḍḍheyya.
tika-s0501t:1418_0: Ātappaṃ saṃkilesānaṃ ātapantaṃ vīriyaṃ ajjeva kiccaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1418_1: suve jīvitaṃ vā maraṇaṃ vā ko jaññā jāneyya,
tika-s0501t:1418_2: “suve vā dānādipuññaṃ jānissāmī”ti cittaṃ anuppādetvā “ajjeva karissāmī”ti evaṃ vīriyaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1418_3: Hi saccaṃ maraṇakāraṇabhāvatāya ahivicchikavisasatthādianekāya senāya vasena mahāsenena tena maccunā
tika-s0501t:1418_4: saddhiṃ mittasanthavākārena vā lañjadānena vā saṅgaraṃ natthīti.
tika-s0501t:1419_0: Evaṃ manasi katvā vihāriṃ viharantaṃ ātāpiṃ ahorattaṃ atanditaṃ analasaṃ uṭṭhāhakaṃ sappurisaṃ “bhaddekaratto”ti
tika-s0501t:1419_1: santo muni ve ekantena ācikkhate ācikkhatiyevāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1420_0: “Cattārimāni bhikkhave”tyādisuttaṃ pāḷito ca aṭṭhakathāto ca pākaṭaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1421_3: “katamaṃ asekkhabhāgiyaṃ sutta”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ asekkhabhāgiyaṃ sutta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1421_4: Tatthāti tesu soḷasasu saṃkilesabhāgiyādīsu suttesu katamaṃ suttaṃ asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1422_0: Yassa uttamapurisassa cittaṃ selūpamaṃ ṭhitaṃ lokadhammavātehi nānukampati,
tika-s0501t:1422_2: so uttamapuriso kopaneyye alābhādike na kuppati,
tika-s0501t:1422_3: tassa uttamapurisassa cittaṃ evaṃ aniccatādinā bhāvitaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1422_4: naṃ bhāvitacittaṃ uttamapurisaṃ vītikkantalokadhammahetukaṃ dukkhaṃ kuto essatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1422_5: Idaṃ suttaṃ asekkhabhāge visaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1424_4: yo brāhmaṇo catumaggañāṇavedehi antaṃ nibbānaṃ gatattā vedantagū bhave,
tika-s0501t:1424_6: Yassa brāhmaṇassa kuhiñci loke ussadā rāgussado dosussado mohussado mānussado diṭṭhussado natthi,
tika-s0501t:1424_7: so brāhmaṇo brahmavādaṃ “ahaṃ brāhmaṇomhī”ti vācaṃ vadeyyāti bhagavā avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1425_0: Ye buddhā pāpake akusale dhamme bāhitvā sadā caranti satā satisampannā khīṇasaṃyojanā,
tika-s0501t:1425_1: te buddhā lokasmiṃ brāhmaṇāti ve ekantena kathīyantīti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1426_0: Yattha nibbāne āpo ca pathavī ca tejo ca vāyo ca na gādhati na patiṭṭhahati,
tika-s0501t:1426_1: tattha nibbāne sukkā gahā ceva tārakā ca na jotanti,
tika-s0501t:1427_0: Yo brāhmaṇo attanā sayaṃ muni monena yadā taṃ nibbānaṃ avedi vindati paṭilabhati paṭivijjhati,
tika-s0501t:1427_1: atha paṭivijjhanakkhaṇe so brāhmaṇo rūpā rūpadhammato ca arūpā arūpadhammato ca sukhadukkhā sukhadukkhato ca pamuccatīti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1428_1: yo brāhmaṇo sakesu sakaattabhāvesu dhammesu upādānakkhandhesu saccesu,
tika-s0501t:1428_3: atha pāragamanakkhaṇe so brāhmaṇo etaṃ ajakalāpakaṃ tayā vuttaṃ etaṃ pisācaṃ kilesapisācañca,
tika-s0501t:1429_0: Yo bhikkhu āyantiṃ āgacchantiṃ purāṇadutiyikaṃ bhariyaṃ vā,
tika-s0501t:1429_1: aññaṃ āgacchantiṃ itthiṃ vā cittena na abhinandati,
tika-s0501t:1429_3: aññaṃ pakkamantiṃ itthiṃ vā cittena na socati,
tika-s0501t:1429_4: saṅgā pañcavidhatopi saṅgato muttaṃ saṅgāmajiṃ taṃ bhikkhuṃ “brāhmaṇa”nti ahaṃ vadāmīti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1430_1: so bahujano nhāyako udakena udakanhānena sucī na hoti.
tika-s0501t:1430_5: so puggalo brāhmaṇo ca hotīti avocāti yojanā;
tika-s0501t:1431_0: Ātāpino jhāyato yassa brāhmaṇassa dhammā saccadhammā yadā have ekantena pātubhavanti,
tika-s0501t:1431_1: tadā dhammānaṃ pātubhavanakkhaṇe so brāhmaṇo mārasenaṃ vidhūpayaṃ vidhūpayanto tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0501t:1432_0: Yo paṃsukūliko bhikkhu sabbāni cattāri yogāni upātivatto sakiñcane loke akiñcano iriyati catubbidhairiyāpathaṃ vatteti.
tika-s0501t:1432_1: Apahānadhammaṃ kenaci maggena appahānasabhāvaṃ appattakāyena appattaṃ tevijjapattaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1432_2: iriyamānaṃ santindriyaṃ taṃ paṃsukūlikaṃ bhikkhuṃ tumhe passatha.
tika-s0501t:1433_0: Ājāniyaṃ purisaājānīyaṃ jātibalanisedhaṃ “ahaṃ jātibrāhmaṇo”ti jātimattakena pavattamānabalanisedhakaṃ
tika-s0501t:1433_1: taṃ paṃsukūlikaṃ bhikkhuṃ sambahulā uḷārā devatā brahmaṃ vimānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā idha sāsane,
tika-s0501t:1434_0: Purisājañña te tava amhākaṃ namo atthu,
tika-s0501t:1434_1: purisuttama te tava amhākaṃ namo atthu,
tika-s0501t:1434_2: yassa te tava nissayaṃ mayaṃ nābhijānāma,
tika-s0501t:1434_3: so tvaṃ kiṃ puggalaṃ nissāya jhāyasīti avocunti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1435_0: Ye bhikkhū kālena kālaṃ dhammassavanavasena cirarattaṃ sametikā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t:1435_2: Nesaṃ sahāyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhamme buddhappavedite dhamme saddhammo sameti.
tika-s0501t:1436_0: Kappinena ariyappavedite dhamme suvinītā te sahāyakā bhikkhū savāhiniṃ māraṃ jetvā antimaṃ dehaṃ attabhāvaṃ dhārentīti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1437_0: Sithilaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabbha sabbadukkhappamocanaṃ idaṃ nibbānaṃ yogāvacarena na adhigantabbaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1437_1: appena appakena thāmasā idaṃ nibbānaṃ na adhigantabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1438_1: yo puriso savāhiniṃ māraṃ jetvā antimaṃ dehaṃ attabhāvaṃ dhāreti,
tika-s0501t:1438_2: so ayaṃ puriso so uttamapurisovāti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1439_1: dubbaṇṇako lūkhacīvaro sadā sato satisampanno khīṇāsavo ca visaṃyutto ca katakicco ca anāsavo ca tevijjo
tika-s0501t:1439_2: ca iddhippatto ca cetopariyāyakovido ca so bhikkhu savāhiniṃ māraṃ jetvā antimaṃ dehaṃ dhāretīti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1440_2: Idaṃ suttaṃ asekkhabhāge visaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1441_3: “katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañca sutta”nti vattabbattā “tattha katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañca sutta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1441_4: Tatthāti tesu soḷasasu saṃkilesabhāgiyādīsu suttesu katamaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañca suttaṃ nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1442_0: Channaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā channaṃ chādentaṃ bhikkhuṃ dukkaṭādivasso ativassati,
tika-s0501t:1442_1: vivaṭaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā vivaṭaṃ desentaṃ ācikkhantaṃ bhikkhuṃ dukkaṭādivasso nātivassati,
tika-s0501t:1442_2: tasmā channassa ativassanato ca vivaṭassa nātivassanato ca channaṃ chāditabbaṃ āpattiṃ vivaretha desetha ārocetha,
tika-s0501t:1442_3: evaṃ vivaraṇe sati taṃ vivarantaṃ bhikkhuṃ dukkaṭādivasso nātivassatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1443_4: evaṃ taṃ nātivassatī’ti ayaṃ saṃkileso ca vāsanā cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1443_8: evaṃ taṃ nātivassatī”ti ettakena ayaṃ saṃkileso ca dassito,
tika-s0501t:1443_11: vassatī”ti suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāge visaye ca vāsanābhāge visaye ca vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañca suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1444_0: “Saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañca suttaṃ ettakamevā”ti vattabbattā “cattārome mahārājā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1444_2: katame puggalā vāsanābhāgiyā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha yo ca puggalo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1444_5: Idaṃ “cattārome”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyesu dvīsu puggalesu ca vāsanābhāgiyesu dvīsu puggalesu
tika-s0501t:1444_6: ca vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañca suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1445_0: Nānāvidhaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañca suttaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1445_2: “katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca suttaṃ nāmā”ti pucchitabbattā tattha katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca
tika-s0501t:1446_0: Ayasaṃ yaṃ bandhanañca dārujaṃ yaṃ bandhanañca pabbajaṃ yaṃ bandhanañca loke atthi,
tika-s0501t:1446_1: taṃ ayasādibandhanaṃ “daḷhaṃ bandhana”nti dhīrā buddhādayo paṇḍitapurisā na āhu.
tika-s0501t:1446_2: Maṇikuṇḍalesu ca puttesu ca dāresu ca yā sārattarattā balavarāgarattā apekkhā loke vijjati,
tika-s0501t:1446_3: taṃ sārattarattaapekkhāsaṅkhātaṃ rāgabandhanaṃ “daḷhaṃ bandhana”nti dhīrā paṇḍitapurisā āhu.
tika-s0501t:1446_4: Iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ sārattarattaapekkhāsaṅkhāto akusaladhammo saṃkileso dassito.
tika-s0501t:1447_1: Dhīrā paṇḍitapurisā etaṃ rāgabandhanaṃ “daḷhaṃ bandhana”nti āhu.
tika-s0501t:1447_2: Etaṃ rāgabandhanaṃ ohārinaṃ heṭṭhā apāyaṃ avaharaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-s0501t:1447_3: sithilaṃ bandhanaṭṭhāne chaviādīni akopetattā sithilaṃ hoti,
tika-s0501t:1447_4: duppamuñcaṃ lobhavasena ekavārampi uppannassa rāgabandhanassa dummocayattā duppamuñcaṃ hoti,
tika-s0501t:1447_5: paṇḍitapurisā etampi vuttappakāraṃ rāgabandhanampi maggena chetvāna anapekkhino hutvā kāmasukhaṃ pahāya paribbajanti.
tika-s0501t:1447_6: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ maggo nibbedho dassito.
tika-s0501t:1447_7: Idaṃ “ayasa”ntiādikaṃ suttaṃ rāgādisaṃkilesabhāge visaye ca vāsanābhāge visaye ca vācakañāpakabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1448_5: etaṃ cetanaṃ etaṃ pakappanaṃ etaṃ anusayanaṃ viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā ārammaṇaṃ paccayo hoti.
tika-s0501t:1448_6: Ārammaṇe paccaye sati tassa abhisaṅkhāra viññāṇassa patiṭṭhā hoti.
tika-s0501t:1448_7: Tasmiṃ abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇe patiṭṭhite viruḷhe sati āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti viññāṇādinibbatti hoti.
tika-s0501t:1448_8: Āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattiyā sati āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ sambhavati.
tika-s0501t:1449_3: atha tathāpi ce anuseti anusayanaṃ bhavati,
tika-s0501t:1449_4: evaṃ sati etaṃ anusayanaṃ viññāṇassa abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ paccayo hoti…pe…
tika-s0501t:1449_6: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ vuttappakāro cetayanādiko akusaladhammo saṃkileso dassito.
tika-s0501t:1450_5: etaṃ acetayanaṃ etaṃ akappanaṃ etaṃ ananusayanaṃ viññāṇassa abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ paccayo na hoti…pe…
tika-s0501t:1450_10: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ ariyamaggo nibbedho dassito.
tika-s0501t:1450_11: Idaṃ “yañca bhikkhave”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāge visaye ca nibbedhabhāge visaye ca vācakañāpakabhāvena
tika-s0501t:1451_1: Nānāvidhaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca suttaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1451_3: “katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca asekkhabhāgiyañca sutta”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca asekkhabhāgiyañca sutta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1452_1: assutavā puthujjano samuddo jalasāgarasamuddo “samuddo samuddo”ti bhāsati.
tika-s0501t:1452_3: Duppūraṇaṭṭhena ca saṃsaraṇaṭṭhena ca duratikkamanaṭṭhena ca samuddoti bhāsati.
tika-s0501t:1452_6: eso jalasāgarasamuddo ariyassa bhagavato vinaye vuttappakāraṭṭhena samuddo na hoti.
tika-s0501t:1452_8: eso jalasāgarasamuddo mahā udakarāsi mahā udakaṇṇavo hoti.
tika-s0501t:1452_13: Pathavito yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā nīlādirūpārammaṇaṃ samosarantampi duppūraṇaṭṭhena ca anamatagge saṃsāre
tika-s0501t:1452_14: saṃsaraṇaṭṭhena ca duratikkamanaṭṭhena ca cakkhumeva samuddo hoti.
tika-s0501t:1452_15: Nīlādirūpāyatanassa appameyyassa appameyyena ūmimayena vegena saṃsaraṇaṭṭhena nīlādirūpameva vego hoti.
tika-s0501t:1452_16: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ cakkhu samuddo rūpamayo vego ca saṃkileso saṃkilesahetu dassito.
tika-s0501t:1453_1: Yasmiṃ arahattaphale ṭhito yo arahā rūpamayaṃ taṃ vegaṃ sahati manāpe rūpe rāgaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1453_3: asamapekkhane mohaṃ anuppādento hutvā upekkhakabhāvena sahati,
tika-s0501t:1453_6: saūmiṃ sāvaṭṭaṃ sagahaṃ sarakkhasaṃ cakkhusamuddaṃ atarīti vuccati,
tika-s0501t:1453_7: tiṇṇo pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇoti vuccati.
tika-s0501t:1453_8: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ arahattaphalabhūto asekkho dassito.
tika-s0501t:1454_0: “Sotaṃ bhikkhave”tiādīsupi iminā nayena yathāsambhavaṃ attho veditabbo.
tika-s0501t:1454_1: Idaṃ “samuddo”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāge visaye ca asekkhabhāge visaye ca vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato
tika-s0501t:1455_2: lokasmiṃ sattānaṃ anayāya anatthāya pāṇīnaṃ byābādhāya ime mayā vuccamānā baḷisā cha bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1455_5: cakkhuviññeyyā cakkhuviññāṇena viññeyyā iṭṭhā kantā kāmanīyā manāpā manavaḍḍhakā piyarūpā piyasabhāvā
tika-s0501t:1455_6: kāmūpasaṃhitā kilesakāmasahitā rajanīyā rūpā nīlādirūpārammaṇā santi,
tika-s0501t:1455_7: taṃ vuttappakāraṃ rūpaṃ bhikkhu ce abhinandati sappītikataṇhāya abhimukho nandati,
tika-s0501t:1455_8: ce abhivadati “aho sukhaṃ aho sukha”nti vadāpentiyā taṇhāyanavasena abhivadati,
tika-s0501t:1455_9: ce ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati gilitvā viya pariniṭṭhapetvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0501t:1455_15: rajanīyā”ti bahuvacananiddeso katopi rūpāyatanarūpārammaṇabhāvena ca cakkhuviññeyyabhāvena ca ekavidhataṃ
tika-s0501t:1455_18: sotaviññeyyā”tiādīsupi iminā nayena yathāsambhavaṃ attho veditabbo.
tika-s0501t:1455_19: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ cakkhuviññeyyādiko chabbidho baḷiso saṃkileso kilesahetu dassito.
tika-s0501t:1457_2: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ arahattaphalabhūto asekkho dassito.
tika-s0501t:1457_3: Idaṃ “chayime”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ vuttanayena saṃkilesabhāgiyañca asekkhabhāgiyañca suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1458_1: Nānāvidhaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca asekkhabhāgiyañca suttaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1458_3: “katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca asekkhabhāgiyañca sutta”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ
tika-s0501t:1459_0: Ayaṃ loko sattaloko santāpajāto ñātibyasanādivasena jātasokasantāpo ceva rāgādivasena jātapariḷāhasantāpo
tika-s0501t:1459_1: ca phassapareto anekehi dukkhasamphassehi abhibhūto rodaṃ rodanto vadati.
tika-s0501t:1459_3: Attanā phuṭṭhaṃ dukkhaṃ abhāvitakāyatāya adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto hutvā “aho dukkhaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1459_4: īdisaṃ dukkhaṃ mayhaṃ sattunopi mā hotū”tiādinā rodanto vilapanto vadati,
tika-s0501t:1459_5: “kasmā evaṃ vadatī”ti vattabbattā “attato yena yena hi maññantī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1459_6: Ete sattā yena yena kāmajjhosādinā pakārena attato dukkhassa paṭikāraṃ maññanti,
tika-s0501t:1459_7: tato pakārato aññathā aññena pakārena taṃ dukkhaṃ tikicchitabbaṃ hi yasmā hoti.
tika-s0501t:1460_1: yena yena vā paravihiṃsādipakārena attano vaḍḍhiṃ maññanti āsīsanti,
tika-s0501t:1460_2: tato pakārato aññathā avaḍḍhi eva hoti.
tika-s0501t:1460_3: Taṃ āsīsitabbaṃ aññathābhāvi avaḍḍhitabhāvi eva hi yasmā hoti,
tika-s0501t:1460_4: tasmā maññitabbassa āsīsitabbassa aññathā bhavanasīlattā rodaṃ rodanto vadati,
tika-s0501t:1460_5: ayaṃ sattaloko rodanto ca hutvā vadati.
tika-s0501t:1460_7: Bhavasatto kāmabhavādīsu satto visatto loko bhavameva kāmabhavādibhavameva abhinandati.
tika-s0501t:1460_11: taṃ jarāmaraṇādidukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato dukkhaṃ dukkhādhiṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:1460_12: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ santāpādiko saṃkileso saṃkilesahetu dassito.
tika-s0501t:1461_2: Bhavavippahānāya kho pana kāmabhavādikassa bhavassa pajahanatthāya eva idaṃ mayā adhigataṃ maggabrahmacariyaṃ vussati.
tika-s0501t:1461_3: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ brahmacariyabhūto maggo nibbedho dassito.
tika-s0501t:1462_2: “katamo aniyyānikamaggo”ti pucchitabbattā “ye hi keci samaṇā vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Hi-
tika-s0501t:1462_4: Ye keci samaṇā vā ye keci brāhmaṇā vā bhavena rūpabhavena bhavassa kāmabhavassa vippamokkhaṃ āhaṃsu,
tika-s0501t:1462_5: bhavena arūpabhavena bhavassa kāmabhavassa ceva rūpabhavassa ca vippamokkhaṃ āhaṃsu,
tika-s0501t:1462_6: sabbe te samaṇā vā sabbe te brāhmaṇā vā bhavasmā vuttappakārabhavato avippamuttā bhavantīti ahaṃ vadāmi.
tika-s0501t:1463_0: “Rūpabhavādinā ye ca kāmabhavādibhavassa vippamokkhaṃ āhaṃsū”ti vattabbattā vibhavena bhavassa nissaraṇaṃ āhaṃsūti dassetuṃ “ye vā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1463_1: Ye vā pana keci samaṇā vā ye vā pana keci brāhmaṇā vā vibhavena ucchedadiṭṭhiyā bhavassa saṃsārabhavassa nissaraṇaṃ āhaṃsu,
tika-s0501t:1463_2: sabbe te samaṇā vā sabbe te brāhmaṇā vā bhavasmā saṃsārabhavato anissaṭāva hontīti ahaṃ vadāmi.
tika-s0501t:1463_3: “Kasmā anissaṭā”ti vattabbattā anissaṭakāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “upadhiṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1463_4: Idaṃ dukkhaṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ upadhiṃ khandhūpadhikilesūpadhiabhisaṅkhārūpadhayo paṭicca hi yasmā sambhoti,
tika-s0501t:1463_6: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ micchādiṭṭhisaṅkhāto saṃkileso dassito.
tika-s0501t:1464_2: Sabbupādānakkhayā ariyamaggato dukkhassa saṃsāradukkhassa sambhavo natthi.
tika-s0501t:1464_3: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ ariyamaggo nibbedho dassito.
tika-s0501t:1465_1: Puthū visuṃ visuṃ avijjāya paretaṃ abhibhūtaṃ bhūtarataṃ bhūtesu itthipurisesu aññamaññarataṃ bhūtaṃ
tika-s0501t:1465_2: khandhapañcakaṃ bhavehi aparimuttaṃ imaṃ lokaṃ mama citta tvaṃ passa.
tika-s0501t:1465_3: Ye keci bhavā ittarakhaṇā vā bhavā,
tika-s0501t:1465_6: asātavanto vā bhavā pañcakkhandhā sabbadhi “uddhaṃ adho tiriya”nti imesu sabbesu sabbatthatāya sabbatthabhāvena ahesuṃ,
tika-s0501t:1465_7: sabbe te vuttappakārā bhavā niccadhuvarahitattā aniccā sampīḷitattā dukkhā vipariṇāmabhāvato vipariṇāmadhammā ahesuṃ.
tika-s0501t:1465_8: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ avijjādiko saṃkileso dassito.
tika-s0501t:1466_2: Evaṃ vuttappakārena etaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya sassa attano maggapaññāya,
tika-s0501t:1466_3: vipassanāpaññāya vā passato passantassa puggalassa bhavataṇhā pahīyati,
tika-s0501t:1466_4: sammappaññāya yathābhūtaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ passanto vibhavaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ nābhinandati na pattheti.
tika-s0501t:1466_5: Tassa puggalassa sabbaso taṇhānaṃ khayā asesavirāganirodho asesavirāgasaṅkhātena maggena nirodho nirujjhanaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbuti hoti.
tika-s0501t:1466_6: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ maggo nibbedho dassito.
tika-s0501t:1467_2: Taṇhādiṭṭhinibbutassa tassa bhikkhuno anupādā kilesābhisaṅkhārānaṃ anuppādanato aggahaṇato punabbhavo na hoti,
tika-s0501t:1467_3: evaṃbhūtena ariyapuggalena pubbe attānaṃ abhibhūto pañcavidho māro vijito ahosi,
tika-s0501t:1467_4: anena ariyapuggalena pañcahi mārehi saṅgāmo vijito, saṅgāme,
tika-s0501t:1467_5: iṭṭhāniṭṭhādīsu vā tādī tādilakkhaṇappatto ariyapuggalo sabbabhavāni upaccagā atikkantova jāto.
tika-s0501t:1467_6: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ asekkho dassito.
tika-s0501t:1467_7: Idaṃ vuttappakāraṃ “ayaṃ loko”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāge visaye ca nibbedhabhāge visaye ca asekkhabhāge
tika-s0501t:1467_8: visaye ca vācakañāpakabhāvena ekadesavasena pavattanato saṃkilesabhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca asekkhabhāgiyañca
tika-s0501t:1468_1: Andhaputhujjano saṃsārasotassa anukūlabhāvena gacchanato anusotagāmī nāma,
tika-s0501t:1468_2: kalyāṇaputhujjano saṃsārasotassa nibbidānupassanādīhi paṭikkūlavasena pavattanato paṭisotagāmī nāma,
tika-s0501t:1469_0: “Tesu catūsu puggalesu katamo puggalo saṃkilesabhāgiyādī”ti vattabbabhāvato “tattha yoya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1470_1: Nānāvidhaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca asekkhabhāgiyañca suttaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1470_3: “katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca sutta”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katama”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1471_2: kaṇhadhammasamannāgatattā vā kaṇho kaṇhābhijātiko hutvā kaṇhaṃ kāḷakaṃ dasavidhaṃ dussīlyadhammaṃ abhijāyati pasavati,
tika-s0501t:1471_4: Vuttappakārena kaṇho kaṇhābhijātiko hutvā sukkaṃ dasavidhaṃ kusaladhammaṃ abhijāyati,
tika-s0501t:1471_6: Kaṇho kaṇhābhijātiko hutvā akaṇhaṃ asukkaṃ akaṇhaasukkavipākaṃ accantadiṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ ārādheti,
tika-s0501t:1472_0: “Tesu katame puggalā saṃkilesabhāgiyā”tiādinā vattabbattā “tattha yo cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1474_1: Nānāvidhaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca suttaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1474_3: “katamaṃ vāsanābhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca sutta”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ vāsanābhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1475_4: “Katamaṃ kattabbaṃ kicca”nti vattabbattā kattabbakiccaṃ dassetuṃ “sukiccaṃ cevā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1475_6: saṃyojanavippahānaṃ vā kattabbattā sukiccaṃ nāmāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1476_0: “Tattha sutte katamena katamo dassito”ti vattabbattā “sukiccaṃceva puññānīti vāsanā,
tika-s0501t:1477_1: Puññāni karitvāna katapuññā puggalā saggā saggato saggaṃyeva vajanti.
tika-s0501t:1478_0: “Tattha sutte katamena katamo dassito”ti vattabbattā “puññāni karitvāna,
tika-s0501t:1480_0: Nānāvidhaṃ vāsanābhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca suttaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1480_3: Tatthāti tesu soḷasasu saṃkilesabhāgiyādīsu suttesu taṇhāsaṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ taṇhāpakkheneva niddisitabbaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1480_8: Yena yena vā pana vatthunā taṇhāpabhedaucchedādivatthunā ajjhositā bhavataṇhādivasena ajjhositā,
tika-s0501t:1480_9: tena tena pakārena taṇhādinā vā taṇhāpabhedaucchedādivatthunā vā taṇhāsaṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1481_0: Taṇhāsaṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ taṇhāpakkheneva niddisitabbanti ācariyena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1481_2: “diṭṭhisaṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ kena pakkhena niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “tattha diṭṭhisaṃkilesabhāgiya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1481_3: Yena yena vā pana vatthunāti diṭṭhippabhedaamarāvikkhepādivatthunā.
tika-s0501t:1482_0: Diṭṭhisaṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ diṭṭhipakkheneva niddisitabbanti ācariyena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1482_2: “duccaritasaṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ kena pakārena niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “tattha duccaritasaṃkilesabhāgiya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1483_2: taṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ soḷasahi saṃkilesabhāgiyādīhi suttehi ekadesaniddhāraṇavasena vibhajitaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1483_4: “kiṃ pana taṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ tehi soḷasahi eva saṃkilesabhāgiyādīhi vibhajitabbaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1483_5: udāhu aññehi suttehipi vibhajitabba”nti vattabbattā aññehi aṭṭhavīsasuttehipi vibhajituṃ “tattha katame aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā?
tika-s0501t:1483_9: kasmā ‘tattha katame aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā’ti vuttā”ti ce?
tika-s0501t:1483_13: Tāni mūlapadāni vibhajituṃ “tattha katame aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1484_0: “Evaṃ soḷasavidhena sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ nānāsuttehi udāharaṇavasena vibhajitvā idāni aṭṭhavīsatividhena sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1484_1: dassentena yasmā ayampi paṭṭhānavibhāgo mūlapadehi saṅgahito,
tika-s0501t:1484_2: na imassāpi tehi asaṅgahito padeso atthi,
tika-s0501t:1484_4: vibhajitabbatañca dassetuṃ ‘tattha katame aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā’ti pucchāya vasena mūlapadāni uddharitvā ‘lokiyaṃ lokuttara’ntiādinā nava tikā,
tika-s0501t:1485_1: Tatthāti tesu soḷasahārapañcakanayaaṭṭhārasamūlapadesu katamāni padāni mūlapadāni hontīti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1485_3: loke vā vidūhi vidito sabhāvotipi lokiyo,
tika-s0501t:1485_4: lokiyo sabhāvadhammo assa visesasuttassa atthīti taṃ visesasuttaṃ lokiyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1485_15: Bhāvanā assa visesasuttassa pāḷiyā atthīti bhāvanā.
tika-s0501t:1485_16: “Dassanañca bhāvanā cā”ti etthāpi esa nayo veditabbo.
tika-s0501t:1485_28: Buddhādīnaṃ guṇe abhitthavati etena suttappadesenāti thavo,
tika-s0501t:1486_0: “Tesu aṭṭhavīsatividhesu lokiyādīsu sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttesu katamaṃ suttaṃ lokiyaṃ sutta”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ lokiya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1486_1: Tatthāti tesu aṭṭhavīsatividhesu lokiyādīsu sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttesu katamaṃ suttaṃ lokiyaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ suttanti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1487_1: dhenuyā thanehi nikkhantaṃ sajjukhīraṃ nikkhantakkhaṇe na muccati na pariṇamati khīrabhāvaṃ pajahitvā dadhibhāvaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
tika-s0501t:1487_2: takkādiambilasamāyogato pacchā khīrabhāvaṃ pajahati dadhibhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti iva,
tika-s0501t:1487_3: evaṃ yena bālena pāpaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0501t:1487_4: taṃ kammaṃ karaṇakkhaṇe tassa bālassa apāyadukkhādinibbattāpanavasena na vipaccati.
tika-s0501t:1487_5: Dutiye pana vā tatiyādimhi vā attabhāve vipaccati.
tika-s0501t:1487_6: Bhasmacchanno chārikāya paṭicchanno pāvako aggi akkantaṃ janaṃ akkamanakkhaṇe na ḍahati.
tika-s0501t:1487_7: Chārikaṃ pana tāpetvā kālantare ḍahati iva,
tika-s0501t:1487_8: evaṃ yena bālena pāpaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0501t:1487_9: taṃ kammaṃ karaṇakkhaṇe taṃ bālaṃ apāyadukkhādinibbattāpanavasena ḍahāpentaṃ hutvā na anveti.
tika-s0501t:1487_10: Dutiye vā tatiyādimhi vā attabhāve apāyadukkhādinibbattāpanavasena ḍahāpentaṃ hutvā ḍahantaṃ taṃ bālaṃ taṃ anvetīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1487_12: pāvako”ti suttaṃ lokiye atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato lokiyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1488_3: kāḷapakkheva candimā”ti suttaṃ lokiye atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato lokiyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1489_4: Idaṃ “aṭṭhime”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ lokiyesu aṭṭhavidhesu atthesu vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato lokiyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1490_2: “katamaṃ suttaṃ lokuttara”nti vattabbattā “tattha katamaṃ lokuttara”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1491_0: Chekena sārathinā sudantā assā samathaṅgatā yathā,
tika-s0501t:1491_1: evaṃ pahīnamānassa pahīnanavavidhamānassa yassa anāsavassa bhikkhuno indriyāni chabbidhāni cakkhundriyādīni samathaṅgatāni.
tika-s0501t:1491_2: Tādino tādilakkhaṇena samannāgatassa anāsavassa tassa bhikkhuno devāpi manussāpi pihayantīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1491_3: Idaṃ “yassindriyānī”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ lokuttare atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato lokuttaraṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1492_1: Idaṃ “pañcimānī”tiādikaṃ suttampi lokuttare atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato lokuttaraṃ nāma. (1)
tika-s0501t:1493_1: kiccaṃ akiccameva cā”tiādikā dve gāthā vuttā.
tika-s0501t:1493_2: Iha gāthāsu “sukiccaṃ ceva puññānī”ti yaṃ gāthāpadañca “puññāni karitvāna,
tika-s0501t:1493_3: saggā saggaṃ vajanti katapuññā”ti yaṃ gāthāpadañca vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1493_4: idaṃ gāthāpadaṃ lokiye atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato lokiyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1495_1: viññāṇe āhāre āhārapaṭibaddhe chandarāge sati nāmarūpassa avakkanti hoti.
tika-s0501t:1495_6: Idaṃ “viññāṇe ce bhikkhave”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ lokiye atthe ca lokuttare atthe ca ekadesavasena vācakañāpakavasena pavattanato lokiyañca lokuttarañca. (2)
tika-s0501t:1496_1: Sattaloke sabbā disā anuparigamma kvaci disāyaṃ cetasā attanā attato piyataraṃ aññaṃ neva ajjhagā,
tika-s0501t:1496_3: evaṃ paresaṃ sattānaṃ puthu visuṃ visuṃ attāva piyo piyataro,
tika-s0501t:1496_4: tasmā attanova piyatarattā attakāmo attano hitakāmo paṇḍito sattaloko attānaṃ upamaṃ katvā paraṃ na hiṃse na hiṃseyyāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1496_5: Idaṃ “sabbā disā”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ sattesu vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1497_0: Ye keci khīṇāsavā puggalā bhūtāva na bhavissanti,
tika-s0501t:1497_1: sabbe te khīṇāsavā puggalā dehaṃ attabhāvaṃ pahāya nibbānaṃ gamissanti.
tika-s0501t:1497_2: Ye ca puthujjanādayo sattā punabbhavesu bhavissanti,
tika-s0501t:1497_3: sabbe te puthujjanādayo sattā dehaṃ attabhāvaṃ pahāya paralokaṃ gamissanti,
tika-s0501t:1497_4: taṃ sabbajāniṃ sabbassa sattassa hāniṃ maraṇaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1497_5: vināsaṃ vā kusalo yo puggalo vijānāti,
tika-s0501t:1497_6: so kusalo puggalo taṃ sabbajāniṃ viditvā ātāpiyo brahmacariyaṃ careyyāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1498_0: Sattahi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ yāvajīvaṃ kusalena puggalena na vijahitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1498_2: Parisuddhasīlasampattiparisuddhadiṭṭhisampattīhi samannāgatattā piyo ca piyāyitabbo ca hoti,
tika-s0501t:1498_6: no akālenā”tiādike pañcadhamme attani upaṭṭhāpetvā sabrahmacārīnaṃ vā sissānaṃ vā vinicchayaullumpanaovādadānabhāve ṭhatvā vattā ca hoti,
tika-s0501t:1498_7: sabrahmacārīhi vā sissādīhi vā vuccamāno suvaco hutvā tesaṃ vacanakkhamo ca hoti,
tika-s0501t:1498_8: saccapaṭiccasamuppādādigambhīraṃ vā aññaṃ gambhīraṃ vā kathaṃ kattā ca hoti,
tika-s0501t:1498_9: dhammavinayādivaseneva dīpanato aṭṭhāne ca na niyojako hoti.
tika-s0501t:1498_10: Imehi sattahi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ yāvajīvaṃ na vijahitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1498_12: Idaṃ “sattahī”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ sugato vatvā athāparaṃ etaṃ gāthāvacanaṃ satthā avoca.
tika-s0501t:1500_0: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, na caṭṭhāne niyojako;
tika-s0501t:1503_0: Loke yaṃ kāmasukhañca yaṃ idaṃ diviyaṃ sukhañca atthi,
tika-s0501t:1503_1: ete kāmasukhadiviyasukhā taṇhākkhayasukhassa soḷasiṃ kalaṃ na agghantīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1504_1: sammāsambuddhadesitaṃ asokaṃ virajaṃ khemaṃ taṃ nibbānaṃ susukhaṃ vatāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1505_0: Tīsu bhavesu sattānaṃ jananato taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ mātarañca,
tika-s0501t:1505_1: pitaraṃ nissāya mānassa uppajjanato mānasaṅkhātaṃ pitarañca,
tika-s0501t:1505_2: raṭṭhe loko raṭṭhissaraṃ rājānaṃ bhajati viya dvinnaṃ sassatucchedadiṭṭhīnaṃ sabbadiṭṭhigatehi bhajanīyattā
tika-s0501t:1505_4: āyasādhako puriso raṭṭhe atthaṃ anucarati iva nandirāgassa dvādasāyatane anucaraṇato nandirāgasaṅkhātena
tika-s0501t:1505_5: anucaraṇena saha pavattanaṭṭhānaṃ dvādasāyatanasaṅkhātaṃ raṭṭhañca khīṇāsavo yo brāhmaṇo hanati,
tika-s0501t:1505_6: so brāhmaṇo hantvā anīgho niddukkho hutvā yātīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1506_1: So catūhi iddhipādehi samannāgato puggalo kāyepi karajakāyepi cittaṃ pādakajjhānacittaṃ samodahati pakkhipati,
tika-s0501t:1506_2: so puggalo dissamānakāyena gantukāmo karajakāyagatikaṃ pādakajjhānacittaṃ adhiṭṭhahati.
tika-s0501t:1506_3: Cittepi pādakajjhānacittepi kāyaṃ karajakāyaṃ samodahati pakkhipati,
tika-s0501t:1506_4: so puggalo sīghaṃ aññaṃ gantukāmo pādakajjhānacittagatikaṃ karajakāyaṃ adhiṭṭhahati.
tika-s0501t:1506_5: Kāye karajakāye sukhasaññañca sukhavihārasaññañca lahusaññañca lahugamanasaññañca okkamitvā aññaṃ gamaneyyaṃ
tika-s0501t:1506_6: icchitaṭṭhānaṃ ekacittakkhaṇeneva ca gantvā upasampajja viharati.
tika-s0501t:1507_1: Yaṃ sabbaññutañāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ lokaṃ uttaritvā abhibhavitvā ṭhitaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1507_4: taṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ sabbakāle jānituṃ āvajjanakāle pavattatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1507_5: Idaṃ “yaṃ ta”ntiādikaṃ ñāṇe atthe vācakañāpakabhāvenapi pavattanato ñāṇaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1508_1: sā nibbānagāminī maggapaññā sabbāhi lokiyāhi paññāhi seṭṭhā pasatthāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1509_1: vo tumhākaṃ santiṃ ahaṃ kittayissāmī”ti bhagavā avoca.
tika-s0501t:1509_2: “Diṭṭhe dhamme dukkhādidhamme vā attabhāve vā sato aniccānupassanādisatisampanno hutvā caraṃ caranto
tika-s0501t:1509_3: yogāvacaro anītihaṃ yaṃ santiṃ yaṃ nibbānaṃ ariyamaggena viditvā loke saṃsāraloke visattikaṃ visappakaṃ
tika-s0501t:1510_0: Dhotako bhagavantaṃ vadati “mahesi mahante sīlakkhandhādī esanasīla, gotama,
tika-s0501t:1510_1: sato ‘sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā’tiādisaraṇasampanno hutvā caraṃ caranto yogāvacaro uttamaṃ yaṃ santiṃ yaṃ
tika-s0501t:1510_2: nibbānaṃ ariyamaggena viditvā loke saṃsāraloke visattikaṃ taṇhaṃ tare tareyyāti tañca vacanaṃ tañca santiṃ
tika-s0501t:1511_1: “Uddhaṃ anāgataṃ upari adho atītaṃ heṭṭhā ca tiriyañcāpi majjhe paccuppannaṃ parito ca loke saṃsāraloke
tika-s0501t:1511_2: etaṃ taṇhaṃ bhavābhavāya khuddakabhavamahantabhavatthāya saṅgo laggoti viditvā vicaranto tvaṃ taṇhaṃ
tika-s0501t:1511_3: mākāsi mā akāsī”ti bhagavā dhotakaṃ avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1511_4: Idaṃ “kittayissāmī”tiādikaṃ ñeyye visaye atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato ñeyyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1512_2: catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ ariyabhāvakarānaṃ saccānaṃ ananubodhā abujjhanena appaṭivedhā appaṭivijjhanena
tika-s0501t:1512_3: evaṃ iminā kāraṇena mamañceva tumhākañca dīghamaddhānaṃ idaṃ sandhāvitaṃ sandhāvanaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1512_6: ajja tayidaṃ taṃ idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ mayā anubuddhaṃ paṭividdhaṃ…pe…
tika-s0501t:1512_7: tayidaṃ taṃ idaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ mayā anubuddhaṃ paṭividdhaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1512_12: sugato idaṃ “catunna”ntiādikaṃ vatvā athāparaṃ etaṃ “catunna”ntiādigāthāvacanaṃ satthā avocāti yojetvā gāthāyañca tatheva yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t:1513_1: viññāṇaṃ anicca”nti idaṃ suttaṃ ñeyye rūpādidhamme vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato ñeyyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1514_0: Evaṃ “rūpaṃ anicca”ntiādinā pakārena jānaṃ jānanto evaṃ “rūpaṃ anicca”ntiādinā pakārena passaṃ passanto
tika-s0501t:1514_1: ariyasāvako ariyassa bhagavato sāvako “idaṃ rūpaṃ anicca”nti rūpaṃ passati,
tika-s0501t:1514_6: Iti idaṃ suttaṃ rūpādipassane ñāṇe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato ñāṇaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1515_0: So “rūpaṃ anicca”ntiādinā pakārena passanto ariyasāvako rūpena rūparāgena parimuccati…pe…
tika-s0501t:1515_1: viññāṇamhā viññāṇarāgamhā parimuccatīti dukkhasmā parimuccatīti ahaṃ vadāmīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1515_2: Idaṃ “so parimuccatī”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ ñāṇe ca ñeyye ca vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato ñāṇañca ñeyyañca hoti.
tika-s0501t:1516_0: Sabbe pañcakkhandhā paccayehi saṅkharitattā saṅkhārā ādiantavantabhāvato,
tika-s0501t:1516_3: Idaṃ “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti suttappadesavacanaṃ vuttanayena ñeyyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1516_4: Yadā vipassanākaraṇakāle paññāya vipassanāpaññāya passati aniccatādikaṃ passati.
tika-s0501t:1516_5: Idaṃ “yadā paññāya passatī”ti suttappadesavacanaṃ ñāṇaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1516_6: Atha passanakkhaṇe dukkhe pañcakkhandhe vipassako nibbindati,
tika-s0501t:1516_7: nibbindanto puggalo dukkhādijānanādivasena cattāri saccāni paṭivijjhati,
tika-s0501t:1517_1: Samaṇā bāhirakasamaṇā brāhmaṇā jātibrāhmaṇā aniccena rūpena,
tika-s0501t:1517_3: vipariṇāmadhammena rūpena “ahaṃ parehi seyyo uttamo asmī”ti vā samanupassanti,
tika-s0501t:1517_4: “ahaṃ parena sadiso samāno asmī”ti vā samanupassanti,
tika-s0501t:1517_5: “ahaṃ parato hīno lāmako asmī”ti vā samanupassanti,
tika-s0501t:1517_6: yathābhūtassa adassanā aññatra vajjetvā aññaṃ kiṃ nāma kāraṇaṃ siyā,
tika-s0501t:1517_7: yathābhūtaṃ adassanato tāva samanupassanassa aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthi,
tika-s0501t:1517_9: “Aniccāya vedanāyā”tiādīsupi iminā vuttanayena vuttanayānusārena yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t:1517_10: Idaṃ “ye hi kecī”tiādikaṃ suttappadesavacanaṃ ñeyyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1517_11: “Ye ca kho kecī”tiādiko sukkapakkho pana vuttavipariyāyena veditabbo.
tika-s0501t:1517_12: Idaṃ “ye ca kho”tiādikaṃ suttappadesavacanaṃ ñāṇaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1517_13: Idaṃ “ye hi kecī”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ ñāṇe ca ñeyye ca atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato ñāṇañca ñeyyañca hoti. (6)
tika-s0501t:1518_0: Nānāvidhaṃ ñāṇañca ñeyyañca sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1518_3: Tatthāti tesu lokiyādīsu aṭṭhavīsatividhesu sāsanapaṭṭhānesu suttesu katamaṃ suttaṃ dassanaṃ nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1519_1: Gambhīrapaññena sabbaññubuddhena sudesitāni saṅkhepavitthārādīhi tehi tehi nayehi suṭṭhu desitāni ariyasaccāni
tika-s0501t:1519_3: te bhāvitabhāvanā ariyapuggalā devarajjacakkavattirajjādipamādaṭṭhānaṃ āgamma bhusaṃ pamattā kiñcāpi honti,
tika-s0501t:1519_4: tathāpi te bhāvitabhāvanā ariyapuggalā sotāpattimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena aṭṭhamabhavādīsu
tika-s0501t:1519_5: uppajjanārahānaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ niruddhattā aṭṭhamakkhattuvasena aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ na ādiyantīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1519_6: Idaṃ “ye ariyasaccānī”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ dassane paṭhamamaggañāṇe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato dassanaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1520_0: Nagaradvārabāhathirakaraṇatthaṃ ummārabbhantare pathaviyaṃ aṭṭhahatthadasahatthappamāṇaṃ āvāṭaṃ khaṇitvā
tika-s0501t:1520_1: tasmiṃ āvāṭe ussāpitattā pathavissito pathavinissito antopathavinissito indakhīlo sāradārumayo thambho
tika-s0501t:1520_2: catubbhi catūhi disāhi āgatehi vātehi mahāvātehi asampakampiyo sampakampituṃ asakkuṇeyyo siyā yathā,
tika-s0501t:1520_4: taṃ sappurisaṃ sabbatitthiyavādavātehi asampakampiyattā tathūpamaṃ ahaṃ vadāmīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1521_1: catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato ariyasāvako ariyassa bhagavato sammāsambuddhassa sāvako ācikkhituṃ
tika-s0501t:1521_2: ākaṅkhamāno hutvā attanāva sayameva attānaṃ byākareyya “bho,
tika-s0501t:1521_3: mama atta ahaṃ idāni khīṇanirayo amhi,
tika-s0501t:1523_0: Idha sāsane yassa ariyasāvakassa ajjhattaṃ kāmabhave nibbattāpakānaṃ orambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ pajahanavasena
tika-s0501t:1523_1: ca bahiddhā rūpārūpabhavesu nibbattāpakānaṃ uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ pajahanavasena ca indriyāni saddhindriyādīni
tika-s0501t:1523_2: indriyāni subhāvitāni ariyamaggabhāvanāvasena suṭṭhu bhāvitāni bhavanti,
tika-s0501t:1523_3: bhāvito bhāvitamaggo sa danto so ariyasāvako imaṃ lokañca paraṃ lokañca nibbijjha nibbijjhitvā paṭivijjhitvā kālaṃ maraṇakāle,
tika-s0501t:1523_5: Ayaṃ “yassindriyānī”tiādikā pāḷi bhāvanāya vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato bhāvanā nāma.
tika-s0501t:1525_0: Devaputta chindanto puggalo pañca orambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni heṭṭhā maggattayena chinde chindeyya,
tika-s0501t:1525_1: pajahanto puggalo pañca uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni arahattamaggena jahe pajaheyya,
tika-s0501t:1525_2: bhāvayanto puggalo pañca saddhindriyādīni ca uttari bhāvaye bhāveyya.
tika-s0501t:1525_5: “Pañca chinde pañca jahe”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ dassanaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1525_8: Idaṃ “pañcā”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ dassanañca bhāvanā ca hoti.
tika-s0501t:1527_2: buddhāna sāsana”nti idaṃ suttaṃ sammāsambuddhassa vacanabhāvato sakavacanaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1528_1: bālassa bālalakkhaṇāni bālaupalakkhaṇakāraṇāni bālanimittāni “ayaṃ bālo”ti gahaṇakāraṇāni bālāpadānāni
tika-s0501t:1528_2: bālassa apadānāni porāṇāni viruḷhāni kammāni yehi bālalakkhaṇādīhi bālaṃ “bālo”ti pare paṇḍitā sañjānanti,
tika-s0501t:1528_6: bālo duccintitacintī ca duccintitaṃ abhijjhābyāpādamicchādassanaṃ cintī ca hoti,
tika-s0501t:1528_7: dubbhāsitabhāsī dubbhāsitaṃ musāvādādiṃ bhāsī ca hoti.
tika-s0501t:1528_8: dukkaṭakammakārī ca dukkaṭaṃ pāṇātipātādikammaṃ kārī ca hoti.
tika-s0501t:1528_11: bālāpadānāni iminā mayā vuttāni tīṇi kho bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1528_13: Idaṃ “tīṇimāni bhikkhave”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ sammāsambuddhassa vacanabhāvato sakavacanaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1529_1: Pātaṃ vuṭṭhaṃ udakaṃ ābhuso lābhi gaṇhātīti pātālo,
tika-s0501t:1529_2: pātālena samo pātālasamo ninno na vijjati.
tika-s0501t:1529_5: Idaṃ “pathavīsamo”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ parassa devassa vacanabhāvato paravacanaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:1530_5: atha kho asurindo vepacitti imaṃ vuccamānaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi “te paṭisedhako no ce assa no ce bhaveyya,
tika-s0501t:1530_7: tasmā dhīro paṇḍito bhusena daṇḍena bālaṃ nisedhaye”ti.
tika-s0501t:1531_5: atha kho asurindo vepacitti devānaṃ indaṃ sakkaṃ etaṃ vacanaṃ avoca “devānaminda,
tika-s0501t:1531_6: tvaṃ gāthaṃ bhaṇa bhaṇāhī”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ avoca.
tika-s0501t:1531_8: atha kho devānamindo sakko imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi “bālassa paṭisedhanaṃ paraṃ paccatthikaṃ saṅkupitaṃ ñatvā sato satimā yo paṇḍito kodhato upasammati,
tika-s0501t:1531_9: tassa paṇḍitassa etadeva upasamaṃ varanti ahaṃ maññe”ti.
tika-s0501t:1532_5: atha kho devānamindo sakko asurindaṃ vepacittiṃ etaṃ vacanaṃ avoca “vepacitti,
tika-s0501t:1532_6: tvaṃ gāthaṃ bhaṇāhī”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ avoca.
tika-s0501t:1532_8: atha kho asurindo vepacitti imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi “vāsava yadā titikkhati,
tika-s0501t:1532_9: tadā naṃ titikkhantaṃ puggalaṃ bālo “ayaṃ me bhayā titikkhatī”ti maññati,
tika-s0501t:1532_11: Vāsava gogaṇo palāyinaṃ gavaṃ ajjhottharati iva,
tika-s0501t:1532_12: evaṃ dummedho khamantaṃ bhiyyo ajjhāruhati ajjhottharati.
tika-s0501t:1533_4: Jāyamāne ca goyuddhe paṭhamaṃ dveyeva goṇā yujjhanti,
tika-s0501t:1533_5: gogaṇo pana yāva eko goṇo na palāyati,
tika-s0501t:1533_8: tadā sabbo goṇo taṃ palāyinaṃ gavaṃ bhiyyo ajjhottharatīti goyuddhasabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0501t:1534_2: taṃ khamantaṃ puggalaṃ “ayaṃ me bhayā titikkhatī”ti kāmaṃ maññatu vā,
tika-s0501t:1534_6: Khantyā khantito bhiyyo sadattho nāma na vijjati.
tika-s0501t:1535_0: Yo balavā santo dubbalassa have titikkhatīti tassa balavantassa taṃ titikkhanaṃ paramaṃ khantinti sappurisā āhu,
tika-s0501t:1536_3: tassa dhammaguttassa tassa balassa paṭivattā paṭippharitvā vattā na vijjati.
tika-s0501t:1537_1: yo puggalo kuddhaṃ paṭhamaṃ kujjhantassa paṭikujjhati,
tika-s0501t:1537_2: so paṭikujjhanto puggalo tena paṭikujjhanena tassa paṭhamaṃ kujjhantassa pāpapuggalassa pāpapuggalato pāpiyo eva pāpataro hīnataro eva bhave.
tika-s0501t:1538_1: yo sappuriso sato satimā paraṃ saṅkupitaṃ ñatvā paṭhamaṃ kujjhantassa appaṭikujjhantova bhave,
tika-s0501t:1538_2: so sappuriso dujjayaṃ saṅgāmaṃ jeti nāma,
tika-s0501t:1538_3: attano ca parassa ca ubhinnaṃ atthaṃ carati nāma.
tika-s0501t:1539_0: Attano ca parassa ca tikicchantānaṃ ubhinnaṃ kodho upasammati,
tika-s0501t:1539_3: te janā khamantaṃ sappurisaṃ “ayaṃ bālo”ti maññanti,
tika-s0501t:1539_4: tesaṃ akovidānaṃ janānaṃ taṃ maññanaṃ nipphalanti.
tika-s0501t:1540_4: Idaṃ “bhiyyo bālā”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ sakkavepacittīnaṃ vacanabhāvato paravacanaṃ nāma. (9)
tika-s0501t:1541_2: āyatiṃ pattabbaṃ adhigataṃ yañca kāmūpakaraṇaṃ atthi,
tika-s0501t:1541_3: etaṃ ubhayaṃ rajānukiṇṇaṃ rāgarajādikiṇṇaṃ iti āturassa āturānaṃyeva puggalānaṃ santike anusikkhato anusikkhantassa sikkhāsārā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-s0501t:1541_4: sīlaṃ vataṃ jīvitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ ime sikkhāsārā hutvā upaṭṭhahantīti ye upaṭṭhānasārā puggalā sārato gahetvā ṭhitā.
tika-s0501t:1541_9: Tesaṃ upaṭṭhānasārānaṃ puggalānaṃ ayaṃ vādo eko paṭhamo anto lāmako.
tika-s0501t:1541_10: Ye ca puggalā “kāmesu doso natthī”ti evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino hutvā ṭhitā,
tika-s0501t:1541_11: tesaṃ puggalānaṃ ayaṃ vādo eko dutiyo anto lāmako.
tika-s0501t:1541_12: Iccete ubho antā antavādā puggalā kaṭasivaḍḍhanā kaṭasiyo diṭṭhiṃ vaḍḍhenti.
tika-s0501t:1541_13: Ete ubho ante attakilamathānuyoge kāmasukhallikānuyoge eke puggalā anabhiññāya olīyanti,
tika-s0501t:1541_15: Idaṃ “yañca patta”ntiādikaṃ vacanaṃ paresaṃ puggalānaṃ vacanabhāvato paravacanaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1542_0: Ye ca sammādiṭṭhipuggalā te ubho ante attakilamathānuyogakāmasukhallikānuyoge abhiññāya tatra ca ante na ahesuṃ.
tika-s0501t:1542_1: Tena ca abhijānanena te ubho ante na amaññiṃsu,
tika-s0501t:1542_2: tesaṃ sammādiṭṭhipuggalānaṃ vaṭṭaṃ tividhaṃ vaṭṭaṃ paññāpanāya natthi.
tika-s0501t:1542_3: Iti evaṃ idaṃ “ye cā”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ bhagavato vacanabhāvato sakavacanaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1542_5: paññāpanāyā”ti ayaṃ udāno vuttanayena sakavacanañca paravacanañca hoti.
tika-s0501t:1543_0: Pasenadi nāma kosalo kosalissaro rājā bhagavantaṃ etaṃ “idha mayhaṃ…pe…
tika-s0501t:1543_1: tesaṃ piyo attā”ti vacanaṃ avoca. Bhante,
tika-s0501t:1543_2: idha rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa mayhaṃ mama cetaso cittassa evaṃ parivitakko udapādi,
tika-s0501t:1543_3: kesaṃ sattānaṃ attā piyo nu kho,
tika-s0501t:1543_4: kesaṃ sattānaṃ attā appiyo nu kho iti etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ udapādi. Bhante,
tika-s0501t:1543_6: ye ca keci sattā kāyena duccaritaṃ caranti kho…pe…
tika-s0501t:1543_9: Te duccaritaṃ carantā sattā “no attā piyo”ti evaṃ kiñcāpi vadeyyuṃ,
tika-s0501t:1543_10: atha kho tesaṃ duccaritaṃ carantānaṃ sattānaṃ attā appiyova.
tika-s0501t:1543_12: Appiyo appiyassa anatthāya yaṃ duccaritaṃ kareyya,
tika-s0501t:1543_13: taṃ duccaritaṃ te duccaritaṃ carantā sattā attanāva. sayameva.
tika-s0501t:1543_15: tasmā tesaṃ duccaritaṃ carantānaṃ sattānaṃ attā appiyovāti etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ ahosi.
tika-s0501t:1544_1: ye ca keci sattā kāyena sucaritaṃ caranti kho…pe…
tika-s0501t:1544_3: tesaṃ sucaritaṃ carantānaṃ sattānaṃ attā piyo kho,
tika-s0501t:1544_4: te sucaritaṃ carantā sattā “no attā appiyo”ti evaṃ kiñcāpi vadeyyuṃ,
tika-s0501t:1544_5: atha kho tesaṃ sucaritaṃ carantānaṃ sattānaṃ attā piyova.
tika-s0501t:1544_7: Piyo piyassa atthāya yaṃ sucaritaṃ careyya,
tika-s0501t:1544_8: taṃ sucaritaṃ te sucaritaṃ carantā sattā attanāva sayameva attano atthāya hi yasmā karonti,
tika-s0501t:1544_9: tasmā tesaṃ sucaritaṃ carantānaṃ sattānaṃ attā piyovāti etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ ahosi.
tika-s0501t:1545_0: “Evametaṃ mahārājā”ti vacanaṃ paṭhamaṃ vatvā “ye hi kecī”tiādike bhagavato vuttavacanepi yojanā tatheva kātabbā.
tika-s0501t:1546_0: Gāthāsu pana yo paṇḍito attānaṃ “piya”nti ce jaññā,
tika-s0501t:1546_1: evaṃ sati so paṇḍito naṃ attānaṃ pāpena kammena na saṃyuje na saṃyojeyya,
tika-s0501t:1546_2: taṃ vacanaṃ hi saccaṃ piyaṃ attānaṃ sulabhaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0501t:1547_0: Antakena maccunā adhipannassa mānusaṃ bhavaṃ jahato pajahantassa tassa maraṇamukhe ṭhitassa sattassa kiṃ sakaṃ hoti,
tika-s0501t:1547_1: maraṇamukhe ṭhito so satto kiñca ādāya paralokaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0501t:1547_3: evaṃ assa paralokagatassa sattassa kiñca anugaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:1548_2: Idha loke yo macco yaṃ puññañca yaṃ pāpañca ubho kamme kurute karoti,
tika-s0501t:1548_3: tassa paralokagatassa maccassa taṃ puññapāpadvayaṃ sakaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:1548_4: Paralokaṃ gato macco taṃva puññapāpadvayaṃ ādāya paralokaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0501t:1548_6: evaṃ assa paralokagatassa maccassa taṃva puññapāpadvayaṃ anugaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:1549_0: Tasmā paṇḍito samparāyikaṃ samparāye phalanibbattāpakaṃ kalyāṇaṃ nicayaṃ nicayanto hutvā kareyya.
tika-s0501t:1549_3: Idaṃ “rājā pasenadī”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ kosalarañño vacanabhāvato paravacanaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:1549_5: evametaṃ mahārājā”tiādikā anugīti bhagavato vacanabhāvato sakavacanaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:1549_6: Idaṃ dvayaṃ vacanaṃ sakavacanañca paravacanañca hoti. (10)
tika-s0501t:1550_6: ime kusalākusalā dhammā evaṃ kusalākusalabhāvena gahitā anavajjasāvajjabhāvena vā gahitā sukhavipākadukkhavipākabhāvena vā gahitā,
tika-s0501t:1550_7: idaṃ iṭṭhavipākaṃ idaṃ aniṭṭhavipākaṃ phalaṃ nibbattayaiti evaṃgahitānaṃ tesaṃ kusalākusaladhammānaṃ ayaṃ vuḍḍhi attho,
tika-s0501t:1550_9: Iti idaṃ “pañhe pucchite”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ vissajjanīye atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato vissajjanīyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1551_0: “Uḷāro buddho bhagavā”ti iminā padena buddhauḷārataṃ ekaṃseneva ekakoṭṭhāseneva niddise.
tika-s0501t:1551_1: “Svākkhāto dhammo”ti iminā padena dhammasvākkhātataṃ ekaṃseneva ekakoṭṭhāseneva niddise.
tika-s0501t:1551_2: “Suppaṭipanno saṅgho”ti iminā padena saṅghasuppaṭipattiṃ ekaṃseneva ekakoṭṭhāseneva niddise “sabbe saṅkhārā
tika-s0501t:1551_3: aniccā”ti iminā padena saṅkhārāniccataṃ ekaṃseneva niddise.
tika-s0501t:1551_4: “Sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā”ti iminā padena saṅkhāradukkhataṃ ekaṃseneva niddise.
tika-s0501t:1551_5: “Sabbe dhammā anattā”ti iminā padena dhammānattataṃ ekaṃseneva niddise.
tika-s0501t:1551_6: “Sabbe saṅkhārā anattā”ti avatvā “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti vuttena iminā padena saṅkhārehi aññaṃ yaṃ vā
tika-s0501t:1551_8: taṃ maggaphalanirodhasamāpattidhammajātampi evaṃjātiyaṃ evaṃ ekaṃsabyākaraṇīyanti maggaphalanirodhasamāpattidhammajātassāpi
tika-s0501t:1551_10: Idaṃ “uḷāro”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ vissajjanīye buddhauḷāratādike vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato vissajjanīyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1552_0: Naradammasārathi ākaṅkhato te bhagavato manasā sabbaññutaññāṇasahitādimanasā vicintitaṃ ñeyyadhammaṃ devā manussā sabbe pāṇino na jaññā na jāneyyuṃ.
tika-s0501t:1552_1: Santaṃ araṇaṃ samādhiṃ nisevato te bhagavato manasā vicintitā kasiṇāpi sabbe pāṇino na jaññā na jāneyyuṃ.
tika-s0501t:1552_2: Kasiṇāpi vā kasiṇārammaṇāya paññāyapi na jaññā na jāneyyuṃ.
tika-s0501t:1552_5: Atha vā “yaṃ ākaṅkhati yaṃ ākaṅkhanaṃ karoti,
tika-s0501t:1552_6: taṃ ākaṅkhanaṃ kiṃ katama”nti pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ aññesaṃ avisayattā avissajjanīyaṃ hotīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1552_7: Idaṃ “ākaṅkhato”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ avissajjanīye visaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato avissajjanīyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1553_5: bhagavā iriyāyaṃ kāyavacīsamācāre kāyavacīsamācārahetu ettako etaparimāṇo,
tika-s0501t:1553_9: bhagavā iddhiyaṃ iddhividhahetu ettako etaparimāṇoti avissajjanīyoti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1553_10: Idaṃ “ettako”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ avissajjanīye visaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato avissajjanīyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1554_1: arahato sammāsambuddhassa tathāgatassa loke uppādā uppādahetu tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ uppādo sambhavati,
tika-s0501t:1554_3: ekassa buddharatanassa dharamānakkhaṇena hi aññassa buddharatanassa anuppajjanato āyatinti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1554_6: “Tāni tīṇi ratanāni guṇato kiṃpamāṇānī”ti pucchite sati tāni tīṇi ratanāni guṇato etaparimāṇānīti na vissajjitabbānīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1554_7: Idaṃ “tathāgatassā”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ avissajjanīye visaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato avissajjanīyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1555_3: avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ pubbā koṭi na paññāyati taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1555_9: sakiṃ manusse sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ sattānaṃ pubbā koṭi na paññāyati na dissati na upalabbhatīti.
tika-s0501t:1555_10: “Sā pubbā koṭi katamā”ti kenaci kataṃ pucchanaṃ avissajjanīyaṃ saṃsārassa pubbakoṭiyā abhāvato avissajjanīyaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:1555_13: “Na paññāyatī”ti desanā attano ceva sāvakānañca ñāṇavekallena kātabbā siyāti codanaṃ manasi katvā “duvidhā
tika-s0501t:1555_18: katamā parūpanāyikā desanā”ti pucchitabbattā niyametvā dassetuṃ “na paññāyatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1555_19: “Na paññāyatī”ti desanā sāvakānaṃ netabbānaṃ vasena desitattā parūpanāyikā desanā nāma,
tika-s0501t:1555_20: “natthi buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ avijānanā”ti desanā attano netabbassa vasena desitattā attūpanāyikā desanā nāma.
tika-s0501t:1555_21: “Natthi buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ avijānanā”ti vuttattā pubbāya koṭiyā abhāvato eva na paññāyatīti viññāyati,
tika-s0501t:1555_22: bhagavato ñāṇassa paññāpanaṃ kātuṃ asamatthattā na paññāyatīti na viññāyati tena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “natthi
tika-s0501t:1555_23: buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ avijānanāti etena purimāya koṭiyā abhāvato eva na paññāyati,
tika-s0501t:1555_24: na tattha ñāṇassa paṭighātoti dassetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1556_0: “Kathaṃ pana buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ avijānanāya natthibhāvovijānitabbo”ti vattabbattā avijānanāya natthibhāvaṃ
tika-s0501t:1556_4: taṃ aññesaṃ appameyyampi bhagavato na appameyyanti bhagavato sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇataṃ dassetuṃ ‘yathā
tika-s0501t:1556_6: Bhagavā kokālikaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha “kīva dīghaṃ nu kho, bhante,
tika-s0501t:1556_7: padume niraye āyuppamāṇa”nti pañhaṃ pucchitvā nisinnaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ yathā yena pakārena “seyyathāpi…pe…
tika-s0501t:1556_9: Tato tena pakārena avijānanāya natthibhāvo vijānitabboti attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0501t:1557_2: kokāliko vīsatikhāriko kosalako tilavāho rāsiṃ katvā ṭhapito,
tika-s0501t:1557_3: tato tilato puriso vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena ekamekaṃ tilaṃ uddhareyya,
tika-s0501t:1557_4: so vīsatikhāriko kosalako tilavāho iminā uddharānupakkamena khippataraṃ parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ seyyathāpi gaccheyya,
tika-s0501t:1557_5: eko abbudo nirayo parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ na tveva gaccheyya.
tika-s0501t:1557_6: Vīsati abbudā nirayā tattake kāle parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ seyyathāpi gaccheyyuṃ,
tika-s0501t:1557_7: evameva eko nirabbudo nirayo tattake kāle parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ na tveva gaccheyya.
tika-s0501t:1557_9: Sāriputtamoggallānesu cittaṃ āghātetvā padumaṃ nirayaṃ kokāliko bhikkhu upapanno kho, bhikkhu,
tika-s0501t:1557_10: tvaṃ evaṃ sallakkhehīti bhagavā āhāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1557_11: Bhagavā “ayaṃ appameyyo ayaṃ asaṅkhyeyyo”ti vā na kiñci āha.
tika-s0501t:1557_13: tasmiṃ asaṅkhyeyye katamo asaṅkhyeyyo”ti kenaci kataṃ pucchanaṃ buddhavisayattā avissajjanīyaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1559_0: “Kathaṃ kena pakārena jino”ti upakena kataṃ pucchanaṃ “kilesappahānapakārena jino”ti vissajjanīyattā vissajjanīyaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1559_1: “Kena pakārena jino”ti upakena kataṃ pucchanaṃ “pāpakānaṃ dhammānaṃ jitattā jino”ti vissajjanīyattā vissajjanīyaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1559_2: “Katamo jino”ti kataṃ pucchanaṃ “rūpādiko jino”ti vā “rūpādikaṃ muñcitvā añño jino”ti vā vissajjetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā avissajjanīyaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1559_6: katamo mohakkhayo”ti kataṃ pucchanaṃ “nibbānaṃ āsavakkhayo”ti vā “arahattamaggo āsavakkhayo”ti vā “arahattaphalaṃ
tika-s0501t:1559_7: rāgakkhayo”ti vā iti evamādinā vissajjanīyattā vissajjanīyaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1559_11: kittako mohakkhayo”ti kataṃ pucchanaṃ “ettako etaparimāṇo āsavakkhayo”ti evamādinā avissajjanīyattā avissajjanīyaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1559_12: Idaṃ vuttappakāraṃ suttaṃ vuttanayena vissajjanīyañca avissajjanīyañca hoti. (12)
tika-s0501t:1560_0: “Tathāgato satto atthī”ti pucchanaṃ “pañcakkhandhe upādāya paññāpetabbo sattabhūto atthī”ti vissajjanīyattā vissajjanīyaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1560_1: “Atthi rūpa”nti kataṃ pucchanaṃ rūpassa vissajjamānattā “āmantā”ti vissajjanīyattā vissajjanīyaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1560_2: “rūpaṃ tathāgato”ti kataṃ pucchanaṃ tathābhāvato alabbhanato avissajjanīyattā avissajjanīyaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1560_4: Idaṃ vuttappakāraṃ suttaṃ vuttanayena vissajjanīyañca avissajjanīyañca hoti.
tika-s0501t:1561_1: yathākammūpage satte pajānātī”ti kataṃ pucchanaṃ “passati bhagavā”ti vā…pe…
tika-s0501t:1561_4: katamo tathāgato”ti kataṃ pucchanaṃ paramatthato alabbhanato avissajjanīyattā avissajjanīyaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1562_0: “Atthi tathāgato”ti kataṃ pucchanaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena vissajjanīyaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1562_1: “Atthi tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti kataṃ pucchanaṃ “atthi tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vissajjamāne sati ca idhaloko eva paralokoti āpajjati,
tika-s0501t:1562_2: “natthi tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vissajjamāne sati ca idhalokato añño paralokoti āpajjati,
tika-s0501t:1562_4: Idaṃ vuttappakāraṃ suttaṃ vissajjanīye visaye ca avissajjanīye visaye ca vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato vissajjanīyañca avissajjanīyañca hoti.
tika-s0501t:1563_3: “katamaṃ suttaṃ kamma”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ kamma”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1564_1: chāyāva anapāyinī”ti idaṃ suttaṃ puññakammapāpakammadvaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato kammaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1565_2: (Anuṭṭhānagilānaṃ) anuṭṭhānagilānassa pīṭhasamāruḷhaṃ pīṭhasamāruḷhassa bālaṃ bālassa vā mañcasamāruḷhaṃ
tika-s0501t:1565_3: mañcasamāruḷhassa bālaṃ bālassa vā chamāyaṃ bhūmiyaṃ semānaṃ semānassa sayantassa bālaṃ bālassa vā kāyena
tika-s0501t:1565_4: duccaritāni vācāya duccaritāni manasā duccaritāni pāpakāni yāni kammāni pubbe pubbakāle vā atīte anekakappakoṭisatasahasse
tika-s0501t:1565_6: tāni pāpakāni kammāni tamhi pīṭhasamāruḷhādisamaye olambanti viya upaṭṭhahanti ajjholambanti viya upaṭṭhahanti abhippalambanti viya upaṭṭhahanti.
tika-s0501t:1565_8: mahataṃ mahantānaṃ pabbatakūṭānaṃ chāyā sāyanhasamayaṃ pathaviyaṃ seyyathāpi olambanti ajjholambanti abhippalambanti yathā,
