tika-s0501t:1565_13: tatra tasmiṃ upaṭṭhānākāre upaṭṭhānākārahetu bālassa katapāpassa evaṃ parivitakko hoti “me mayā kalyāṇaṃ akataṃ vata,
tika-s0501t:1565_19: bho agilāna sappurisa akatakalyāṇānaṃ akatakusalānaṃ akatabhīruttāṇānaṃ katapāpānaṃ kataluddānaṃ katakibbisānaṃ yāvatā gati duggati atthi,
tika-s0501t:1565_20: taṃ gatiṃ ahaṃ pecca gacchāmī”ti evaṃ parivitakko hoti.
tika-s0501t:1565_21: Evaṃ vitakkento so bālo socati kilamati paridevati,
tika-s0501t:1566_0: Pabbatakūṭānaṃ chāyā nāma sūriyuggamanakālepi pathaviyā olambantīpi chāyā hāyanavasena olambanti.
tika-s0501t:1566_2: tatheva kammānipi tasmiṃ kāle vaḍḍhanavasena upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-s0501t:1566_5: Idaṃ “puna capara”ntiādikaṃ suttadvayaṃ kusalakammaakusalakammesu vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato kammaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1567_2: “katamo vipāko”ti pucchitabbattā tattha katamo vipāko”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1567_3: Tattha tesu aṭṭhavīsatividhesu lokiyādīsu sāsanapaṭṭhānesu katamo vipākoti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1567_6: te manussattasaddhāpaṭilābhādayo vo tumhākaṃ lābhā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1567_8: taṃ catupārisuddhisīlādisampādanaṃ vo tumhākaṃ suladdhaṃ bhavati.
tika-s0501t:1567_10: yo buddhuppādo navamo khaṇo tumhehi laddho,
tika-s0501t:1567_11: so buddhuppādo navamo khaṇo vo tumhākaṃ brahmacariyavāsāya paṭiladdho bhavati.
tika-s0501t:1568_2: tattha tesu diṭṭhesu chaphassāyatanikesu nāma nirayesu yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ cakkhunā passati,
tika-s0501t:1569_16: bhikkhave”tiādiko pāṭho vipāke vācakañāpakabhāveneva pavattanato vipāko nāma.
tika-s0501t:1570_0: Mārisā niraye paccamānānaṃ amhākaṃ sabbaso nimujjanaummujjanavasena saṭṭhivassasahassāni paripuṇṇāni,
tika-s0501t:1570_1: nirayassa anto pariyosānaṃ kadā kasmiṃ kāle bhavissati.
tika-s0501t:1571_2: Nirayassa anto pariyosānaṃ amhākaṃ na paṭidissati. Mārisā,
tika-s0501t:1571_3: yadā tumhe ca ahañca seṭṭhiputtā jātā,
tika-s0501t:1571_4: tadā tuyhaṃ tumhākañca mayhaṃ mama ca pāpaṃ hi yasmā pakataṃ pakārehi kataṃ,
tika-s0501t:1571_5: tasmā nirayassa anto pariyosānaṃ amhākaṃ na dissatīti ayaṃ pāṭho vipāke vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato vipāko nāma. (13)
tika-s0501t:1572_1: Adhammacārī naro kusaladhammesu pamatto hi yasmā hoti,
tika-s0501t:1572_2: tasmā so adhammacārī pamatto naro yahiṃ yahiṃ yaṃ yaṃ duggatiṃ gacchati,
tika-s0501t:1572_3: taṃ taṃ gacchantaṃ adhammacāriṃ naṃ naraṃ attanā carito so dhammova hanati.
tika-s0501t:1572_5: Sayaṃ attanā gahito kaṇhasappo gaṇhantaṃ janaṃ hanati yathā,
tika-s0501t:1572_6: evaṃ attanā carito adhammo adhammacāriṃ naṃ hanati.
tika-s0501t:1572_7: “Na hi dhammo adhammo cā”tiādigāthāya attho pākaṭo.
tika-s0501t:1572_8: Idaṃ suttadvayaṃ kamme ca vipāke ca vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato kammañca vipāko ca hoti.
tika-s0501t:1573_4: etaṃ “puññānī”ti adhivacanaṃ iṭṭhassa kantassa piyassa manāpassa sukhassa sukhavipākajanakassa kammassa adhivacanaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:1573_6: ahaṃ dīgharattaṃ katānaṃ puññānaṃ dīgharattaṃ paccanubhūtaṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ abhijānāmi kho.
tika-s0501t:1573_8: pubbe satta vassāni mettacittaṃ mettāya sahitaṃ dutiyajjhānacittaṃ bhāvetvā satta saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe imaṃ lokaṃ manussalokaṃ puna na āgamāsiṃ.
tika-s0501t:1573_16: tatra brahmavimāne tatra upapajjamāne upapajjamānahetu ahaṃ brahmā homi,
tika-s0501t:1573_19: aññadatthu ekaṃsena daso ahaṃ vasavattī homi.
tika-s0501t:1574_1: ahaṃ devānamindo sakko chattiṃsakkhattuṃ ahosiṃ kho,
tika-s0501t:1574_2: dhammiko dhammarājā cāturanto vijitāvī janapadatthāvariyappatto cakkaratanādisattaratanasamannāgato cakkavattirājā anekasatakkhattuṃ ahosiṃ,
tika-s0501t:1575_1: tassa cakkavattirājabhūtassa mayhaṃ etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ ahosi “yena phalena yena vipākena ahaṃ etarahi evaṃmahiddhiko evaṃmahānubhāvo amhi,
tika-s0501t:1575_2: taṃ idaṃ phalaṃ kissa kammassa phalaṃ nu kho,
tika-s0501t:1575_3: so ayaṃ vipāko kissa kammassa vipāko nu kho”ti etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ ahosi.
tika-s0501t:1575_5: tassa vitakkentassa mayhaṃ etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ ahosi “yena phalena yena vipākena ahaṃ etarahi evaṃmahiddhiko evaṃmahānubhāvo amhi,
tika-s0501t:1575_6: me pavattaṃ taṃ idaṃ phalaṃ tiṇṇaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ kho,
tika-s0501t:1575_7: so ayaṃ vipāko tiṇṇaṃ kammānaṃ vipāko kho,
tika-s0501t:1575_8: seyyathidaṃ katamesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko?
tika-s0501t:1575_9: Dānassa damassa saṃyamassāti tiṇṇaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko”ti etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ ahosīti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1576_7: Tappaccayo taṃkammapaccayo paccayuppannabhūto paccanubhūto yo vipāko atthi,
tika-s0501t:1576_9: ayaṃ vipāko taṃvācakañāpako pāṭhopi vipāko nāma.
tika-s0501t:1577_0: Todeyyaputtassa subhassa māṇavassa yaṃ suttaṃ bhagavatā desitaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1577_1: tattha sutte vuttā ye pāṇātipātādayo dhammā appāyukadīghāyukatāya saṃvattanti,
tika-s0501t:1577_14: Idaṃ subhasuttaṃ kusalākusalakamme ceva vipāke ca vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato kammañca vipāko ca hoti. (14)
tika-s0501t:1578_5: so puggalo isippaveditaṃ maggaṃ ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ ārādhaye ārādhayeyyāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1578_6: Idaṃ “vācānurakkhī”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ kusale vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato kusalaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1579_0: Yassa puggalassa kāyena dukkaṭaṃ duggatisaṃvattaniyakammaṃ natthi,
tika-s0501t:1579_3: tīhi ṭhānehi uppajjanaṭṭhānehi saṃvutaṃ taṃ puggalaṃ “brāhmaṇa”nti ahaṃ vadāmīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1580_4: kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā vijjā pubbaṅgamā hoti,
tika-s0501t:1581_0: Māluvā sālaṃ rukkhaṃ onataṃ bhūmiyaṃ patanaṃ karoti iva,
tika-s0501t:1581_1: tathā yassa janassa accantaṃ dvīsu tīsu bhavesu dussīlyaṃ atthi,
tika-s0501t:1581_2: so jano attānaṃ onataṃ apāyesu pākaṭaṃ karoti.
tika-s0501t:1581_5: tathā īdiso dussīlo naṃ attānaṃ anatthaṃ karotīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1582_0: Asmamayaṃ asmasaṅkhātaṃ pāsāṇamaṇimayaṃ vajiraṃ vajirassa uṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ pāsāṇamaṇiṃ abhimatthati vidhaṃseti iva,
tika-s0501t:1582_1: tathā attanā hi sayameva kataṃ attajaṃ attasambhavaṃ pāpaṃ dummedhaṃ pāpaṃ karontaṃ janaṃ abhimatthatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1583_0: Devate kusalehi vivajjitā akusalā dasa kammapathe niseviya katvā garahā gārayhā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t:1584_0: “Tīṇimāni, bhikkhave…pe… akusalamūlānī”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ vuttanayena akusalaṃ. (15)
tika-s0501t:1585_1: taṃ bījaṃ tādisaṃ phalaṃ harate iva,
tika-s0501t:1585_2: tathā kalyāṇakārī paṇḍito kalyāṇaṃ phalaṃ harate,
tika-s0501t:1585_3: pāpakārī bālo ca pāpakaṃ phalaṃ harateti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1585_4: Tattha “yādisa”ntiādike sutte “kalyāṇakārī kalyāṇa”nti yaṃ vacanaṃ āha,
tika-s0501t:1585_8: Idaṃ dvivacanaṃ vuttanayena kusalañca akusalañca hoti.
tika-s0501t:1586_0: Kalyāṇakārī sappurisā subhena kammena suggatiṃ vajanti gacchanti,
tika-s0501t:1586_1: pāpakārī kāpurisā asubhena kammunā apāyabhūmiṃ vajanti gacchanti,
tika-s0501t:1586_2: kammassa abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇasahagatakammassa khayā khayanato vimuttacetasā samucchedavimuttipaṭippassaddhivimutticittā te sappurisā asubhe nibbanti.
tika-s0501t:1586_5: tathā te sappurisā kammassa khayā anavasesakhayanato nibbantīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1586_8: idaṃ “subhena…pe…suggati”nti vacanaṃ kusale vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato kusalaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1586_11: kammunā”ti vacanaṃ akusale vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato akusalaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1586_12: Idaṃ “subhenā”tiādikaṃ gāthāvacanaṃ vuttanayena kusalañca akusalañca hoti. (16)
tika-s0501t:1587_2: munī care”ti idaṃ gāthāvacanaṃ anuññāte caraṇe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato anuññātaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1588_0: Bhamaro nāma puppharasapivanagahaṇavasena caraṇako madhukarādiko bhamaro.
tika-s0501t:1588_1: So puppharasaṃ gaṇhanto mandavego hutvā pupphañca vaṇṇañca gandhañca avināsetvā yāvadatthaṃ puppharasaṃ
tika-s0501t:1588_2: pivitvā madhukaraṇatthāya ca puppharasaṃ gahetvā madhukaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ paleti.
tika-s0501t:1588_4: Evameva piṇḍāya gāmaṃ pavisanto muni pasādajanakaṃ ālokanavilokanagamanatiṭṭhanādikaṃ janetvā pītisomanassasahitaṃ
tika-s0501t:1588_5: pasādaṃ janetvā saddhādeyyaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ yāpanamattaṃ paṭiggahetvā gāmato nikkhamitvā udakaphāsukaṭṭhāne
tika-s0501t:1588_8: piṇḍapātaṃ paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjitvā bhamaro vane madhuṃ karoti viya,
tika-s0501t:1588_9: kammaṭṭhānānurūpaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisitvā jhānamaggaphalanibbattanatthāya samaṇadhammakaraṇatthāya gāme care careyyāti adhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-s0501t:1589_5: bhikkhūnaṃ tīṇi karaṇīyānī”ti idaṃ suttaṃ bhagavatā anuññāte ācāre atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato anuññātaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1589_6: Tasmiṃ sutte yo bhikkhu sīlaṃ pāti rakkhati,
tika-s0501t:1589_7: iti rakkhaṇato so bhikkhu pāti nāma.
tika-s0501t:1589_8: Yaṃ sīlaṃ taṃ pātiṃ bhikkhuṃ apāyādidukkhato moceti,
tika-s0501t:1589_9: iti mocanato taṃ sīlaṃ pātimokkhaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1589_11: iti saṃvaraṇakaraṇato taṃ sīlaṃ saṃvaraṃ nāma,
tika-s0501t:1589_13: pātimokkhasaṃvarena saṃvuto samannāgato hutvā saṃvuṇanato catuiriyāpathesu cārako hoti,
tika-s0501t:1589_16: Vārittacāraṃ vajjetvā cārittasīlaṃ ādāya caraṇaṃ ācāro,
tika-s0501t:1590_3: Idaṃ “dasā”tiādikaṃ suttampi anuññāte dasavidhe paccavekkhitabbe dhamme vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato anuññātaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1590_5: karaṇīyānī”ti idaṃ suttampi anuññāte tividhe sucarite vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato anuññātaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1591_2: “katamaṃ suttaṃ paṭikkhitta”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ paṭikkhitta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1596_0: Natthi paññāsamā ābhā, vuṭṭhi ve paramā sarā”ti. –
tika-s0501t:1597_1: Ettha etasmiṃ gāthādvaye yaṃ “natthi puttasamaṃ pema”ntiādikaṃ purimakaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t:1597_2: Idaṃ “natthi puttasamaṃ pema”ntiādikaṃ devaputtavacanaṃ bhagavatā paṭikkhittattā,
tika-s0501t:1597_3: paṭikkhitte atthe pavattanato ca paṭikkhittaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1598_0: Dubbhikkhakāle vā kantāre vā mātāpitaro puttadhītaro ghātetvāpi attānameva posenti,
tika-s0501t:1598_3: gomahiṃsādīnipi dhaññagahaṇatthāya dhaññassāmikānaṃ datvā dhaññameva gaṇhanti,
tika-s0501t:1598_6: paññā pana dasasahassilokadhātumpi ekapajjotaṃ ekobhāsaṃ kātuṃ samatthā,
tika-s0501t:1598_10: so ca deve avuṭṭhe sati khayanasabhāvo bhaveyya,
tika-s0501t:1598_11: vuṭṭhi pana koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesupi yāva ābhassarā brahmalokāpi pūrā bhavati,
tika-s0501t:1599_1: Idaṃ “tīṇimānī”tiādikaṃ suttampi paṭikkhitte duccarite vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato paṭikkhittaṃ nāma. (17)
tika-s0501t:1600_3: “katamaṃ anuññātañca paṭikkhittañcā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ anuññātañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1601_2: Idha loke anekā yā janatā bhītā,
tika-s0501t:1601_4: Yo ca maggo anekāyatano iti pavutto,
tika-s0501t:1601_5: so ca maggo kiṃsu katamo bhave.
tika-s0501t:1601_6: Kismiṃ dhamme ṭhito jano paralokaṃ na bhāye na bhāyeyyāti pucchatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1602_2: kāyena pāpāni akubbamāno ca bhave, ayaṃ eko.
tika-s0501t:1602_3: Bahvannapānaṃ gharaṃ āvasanto ca bhave, ayaṃ eko.
tika-s0501t:1602_4: Saddho saddhāsampanno cittamudubhāvena mudu ca bhave, ayaṃ eko.
tika-s0501t:1602_5: Vadaññū yācakānaṃ yācanavasena vuttavacanaññū hutvā saṃvibhāgī ca bhave, ayaṃ eko.
tika-s0501t:1602_6: Iti etesu catūsu dhammesu ṭhito jano dhammesu ṭhito hutvā paralokaṃ na bhāye na bhāyeyyāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1603_1: katamaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ nāmā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha yaṃ āhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1603_2: Tattha tasmiṃ “kiṃsūdhā”tiādipañhāya vissajjane “vācaṃ manañcā”tiādivacane “vācaṃ manañca paṇidhāya sammā”ti yaṃ vacanaṃ bhagavā āha,
tika-s0501t:1603_4: sammā”ti vacanaṃ anuññāte vacanīyādike atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato anuññātaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1603_7: māno”ti vacanaṃ pāpakubbena paṭikkhitte vuttanayena pavattanato paṭikkhittaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1603_11: na bhāye”ti vacanaṃ vuttanayena anuññātaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t:1603_12: Idaṃ “vāca”ntiādikaṃ vacanaṃ vuttanayadvayena anuññātañca paṭikkhittañca hoti.
tika-s0501t:1606_0: “Kiñca vaḍḍhanahāyanaṃ āgamma kāyasamācārādikaṃ sevitabbāsevitabbabhedena vutta”nti vattabbabhāvato “kiñcetaṃ paṭiccā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1607_3: “katamo suttaviseso thavo”ti pucchitabbattā tathā pucchitvā ayaṃ suttaviseso thavo nāmāti viññāpetuṃ “tattha katamo thavo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1607_4: Tattha tatthāti tesu aṭṭhavīsatividhesu lokiyādīsu sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttesu katamo suttaviseso thavo nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t:1608_0: Maggānaṃ jaṅghamaggadiṭṭhimaggādīnaṃ aṭṭhaṅgiko sammādiṭṭhimaggaṅgādiaṭṭhaṅgiko maggo seṭṭho uttamo.
tika-s0501t:1608_3: Dhammānaṃ sabbasaṅkhatasappaccayadhammānaṃ virāgo asaṅkhatanibbānasaṅkhāto virāgo dhammo seṭṭho uttamo.
tika-s0501t:1608_4: Dvipadānaṃ sabbadevamanussādīnaṃ dvipadānaṃ cakkhumā pañcavidhacakkhumā bhagavā seṭṭho uttamoti yojanā.
tika-s0501t:1608_5: Ayaṃ “maggānaṭṭhaṅgiko”tiādisuttaviseso thave atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato thavo nāma.
tika-s0501t:1609_9: nevasaññīnāsaññino bhavagge nibbattasattā vā yāvatā yattakā sattā saṃvijjanti,
tika-s0501t:1609_10: tesaṃ tattakānaṃ apadādīnaṃ sattānaṃ yadidaṃ yo ayaṃ arahaṃ sammāsambuddho tathāgato uppanno,
tika-s0501t:1609_11: so ayaṃ arahaṃ sammāsambuddho tathāgato aggaṃ aggoti akkhāyati,
tika-s0501t:1610_1: asaṅkhatānaṃ paccayehi asaṅkharitānaṃ paṇṇattimattabhūtānaṃ dhammānaṃ vā yāvatā yattakā paṇṇattī voharīyanti,
tika-s0501t:1610_2: tattakehi paṇṇattīhi paññapetabbānaṃ tesaṃ saṅkhatāsaṅkhatānaṃ dhammānaṃ yadidaṃ yo ayaṃ madanimmadano…pe…
tika-s0501t:1610_5: so ayaṃ madanimmadanādiko dhammo aggaṃ aggoti akkhāyati…pe…
tika-s0501t:1611_3: tattakehi paṇṇattīhi paññapetabbānaṃ tesaṃ saṅghagaṇādīnaṃ yāni imāni cattāri puggalāni purisayugāni,
tika-s0501t:1611_6: so ayaṃ catupurisayugādiko tathāgatasāvakasaṅgho aggaṃ aggoti akkhāyati…pe…
tika-s0501t:1612_2: narasīhassa satthuno gaṇo ca iti tīṇi satthudhammagaṇaratanāni aggāni,
tika-s0501t:1612_3: tāni tīṇi satthudhammagaṇaratanāni visissare guṇavasena visissanti.
tika-s0501t:1613_0: Samaṇapadumasañcayo sare ruhamānaṃ padumaṃ sobhanaṃ iva sāsane sobhanasamaṇapadumasamūho gaṇo ca,
tika-s0501t:1613_2: vidūnaṃ sakkato naravaradamako naravarānaṃ brahmadevamanussarājarājamahāmaccādīnaṃ damako anudamako cakkhumā
tika-s0501t:1613_3: sambuddho ca iti tīṇi gaṇadhammabuddharatanāni lokassa uttari bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1614_2: sabbo dhammo ca ariyo gaṇavaro ca iti yāni tīṇi buddhadhammagaṇaratanāni aggāni,
tika-s0501t:1615_0: Saccanāmo avitathasaccadesanato saccanāmo khemo sabbābhibhū sabbe manussadevādike anabhibhavamānopi guṇātirekavasena
tika-s0501t:1615_1: abhibhavamāno viya pavattanato sabbābhibhū jino ca,
tika-s0501t:1615_3: tassa saccadhammassa uttari uttamo añño dhammo natthi,
tika-s0501t:1615_4: viññūnaṃ niccaṃ pūjito pūjāraho ariyasaṅgho ca iti tīṇi lokassa uttari uttamāni bhavanti.
tika-s0501t:1616_1: Jātikhayantadassī hitānukampī bhagavā ekāyanaṃ maggaṃ pajānāti.
tika-s0501t:1616_3: tena maggena kiṃ taratī”ti vattabbabhāvato “etena maggenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1616_5: etena maggena pubbe atītamaddhānaṃ buddhādayo ariyā oghaṃ saṃsāroghaṃ tariṃsu,
tika-s0501t:1616_9: visuddhipekkhā visuddhiṃ apekkhamānā sattā devamanussaseṭṭhaṃ tādisaṃ yathāvuttaguṇaṃ taṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ namassanti,
tika-s0501t:1616_11: ratanattayaguṇe ca vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato thavo nāma.
tika-s0501t:1616_12: Iccetaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttavisesadassako saṃvaṇṇanāvisesopi sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ nāmāti veditabbo.
tika-s0501t:1617_3: “tesu saṃkilesabhāgiyādīsu sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttavisesesu katamaṃ suttavisesaṃ katamena suttavisesena saṃsanditvā
tika-s0501t:1617_6: “evaṃ duvidhampi sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ nānāsuttapadāni udāharantena vibhajitvā idāni saṃkilesabhāgiyādīhi saṃsanditvā
tika-s0501t:1618_0: Tattha tatthāti tesu soḷasavidhesu saṃkilesabhāgiyādīsu sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttavisesesu ceva aṭṭhavīsatividhesu
tika-s0501t:1618_1: lokiyādīsu sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttavisesesu ca akusalapakkhe pavattaṃ lokiyaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyasuttena
tika-s0501t:1618_3: kusalapakkhe pavattaṃ lokiyaṃ suttaṃ vāsanābhāgiyasuttena samānatthabhāvena saṃsandati,
tika-s0501t:1618_4: tasmā lokiyaṃ suttaṃ ekavidhampi saṃkilesabhāgiyena ca vāsanābhāgiyena ca dvīhi suttehi niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1618_5: Dassanapakkhe pavattaṃ lokuttaraṃ suttaṃ dassanabhāgiyena samānatthabhāvena saṃsandati,
tika-s0501t:1618_6: bhāvanāpakkhe pavattaṃ lokuttaraṃ suttaṃ bhāvanābhāgiyena samānatthabhāvena saṃsandati,
tika-s0501t:1618_7: asekkhapakkhe pavattaṃ lokuttaraṃ suttaṃ asekkhabhāgiyena samānatthabhāvena saṃsandati,
tika-s0501t:1618_8: tasmā lokuttarampi suttaṃ dassanabhāgiyena ca bhāvanābhāgiyena ca asekkhabhāgiyena ca tīhi suttehi niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1619_0: Amhākācariya tumhehi amhākācariyehi nayadassanavasena suttavisesasaṃsandanaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1619_2: “kimatthāya saṃkilesabhāgiyādibhedena vibhajitvā bhagavatā vutta”nti vattabbattā “vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ
tika-s0501t:1620_1: taṃ sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ kittakehi suttehi vibhajitvā niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “lokuttaraṃ suttaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1620_3: “Te chabbīsati puggalā katihi suttehi samanvesitabbā”ti vattabbattā “te tīhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1620_6: asekkhabhāgiyena sattādhiṭṭhānena cāti tīhi suttehi te chabbīsati puggalā samanvesitabbā.
tika-s0501t:1621_0: “Katamehi katamehi katamaṃ katamaṃ suttaṃ niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “tattha dassanabhāgiya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1621_1: Tattha tatthāti tesu tīsu dassanabhāgiyādīsu suttesu.
tika-s0501t:1621_3: Sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ dassanabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ ekabījinā puggalena ca niddisitabbaṃ…pe…
tika-s0501t:1621_5: iti imehi pañcahi puggalehi sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ dassanabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1622_0: Saddhānusārī pana yo vipassanākkhaṇe saddhaṃ dhuraṃ katvā sotāpattimaggaṃ nibbatteti,
tika-s0501t:1622_3: iti saddhāya samāpattiyā anussaraṇato sotāpattimaggaṭṭho puggalo saddhānusārī nāma.
tika-s0501t:1622_4: So puggalo sotāpattiphalakkhaṇe saddhāya vimuttattā saddhāvimutto hutvā ekabījikolaṃkolasattakkhattuparamo bhavati.
tika-s0501t:1622_5: Yo pana puggalo vipassanākkhaṇe paññaṃ dhuraṃ katvā sotāpattimaggaṃ nibbatteti,
tika-s0501t:1622_8: iti dhammena paññāya samāpattiyā anussaraṇato dhammānusārī nāma.
tika-s0501t:1622_9: So puggalo phalakkhaṇe diṭṭhiyā paññāya nirodhaṃ pattattā diṭṭhipatto hutvā ekabīji…pe…
tika-s0501t:1622_14: sampiṇḍite pana pañcahi ariyapuggalehi sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ dassanabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1623_0: Imesaṃ ekabījiādīnaṃ puggalānaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānekadesatthattā ceva dassanabhāgiyatthattā ca sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ
tika-s0501t:1623_1: dassanabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ ettakehi puggalehi niddisitabbanti niyametvā ācariyena vibhattaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1623_3: “sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ dassanabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ kittakehi puggalehi niddisitabba”nti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t:1624_0: “Bhāvanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ dvādasahi puggalehi niddisitabbaṃ sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannena,
tika-s0501t:1624_11: kāyasakkhinā cāti bhāvanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ imehi dvādasahi puggalehi niddisitabba”nti –
tika-s0501t:1625_8: avihādīsu pañcasu suddhāvāsesu āyuvemajjhaṃ anatikkamitvā arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyanasabhāvena antarāparinibbāyīnāmakena anāgāminā,
tika-s0501t:1625_9: āyuvemajjhaṃ atikkamitvā arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyanasabhāvena upahaccaparinibbāyīnāmakena anāgāminā,
tika-s0501t:1625_10: asaṅkhārena appayogena arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyanasabhāvena asaṅkhāraparinibbāyīnāmakena anāgāminā,
tika-s0501t:1625_11: sasaṅkhārena sappayogena arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyanasabhāvena sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyīnāmakena anāgāminā,
tika-s0501t:1625_12: avihādīhi uddhaṃ atappādīsu upapattisotena arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyanasabhāvena uddhaṃsotanāmakena anāgāminā,
tika-s0501t:1625_13: akaniṭṭhaṃ gantvā arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyanasabhāvena akaniṭṭhagāmīnāmakena anāgāminā,
tika-s0501t:1625_15: diṭṭhiyā paññāya nirodhaṃ pattattā diṭṭhippattanāmakena anāgāminā cāti imehi ekādasahi ajhānalābhīpuggalehi ca,
tika-s0501t:1625_16: kāyena nāmakāye phuṭṭhānaṃ arūpajhānānaṃ anantaraṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikaroti,
tika-s0501t:1625_17: iti sacchikaraṇato kāyasakkhīnāmakena jhānalābhinā cāti dvādasahi puggalehi niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1626_0: Imesaṃ vuttappakārānaṃ puggalānaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānekadesatthattā ceva bhāvanābhāgiyatthattā ca sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ
tika-s0501t:1626_1: bhāvanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ ettakehi puggalehi niddisitabbanti niyametvā ācariyena vibhattaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1626_3: “kittakehi puggalehi sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā –
tika-s0501t:1627_8: sammāsambuddhehi cāti asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ imehi navahi puggalehi niddisitabba”nti –
tika-s0501t:1628_1: Tattha sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ niddisitabbanti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1628_2: Saddhāya kilesehi vimuttattā arahattaphalakkhaṇe saddhāvimutto arahā,
tika-s0501t:1628_12: Ubhato rūpakāyanāmakāyato ubhatobhāgato vimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto arahā,
tika-s0501t:1629_3: Imesu tīsu samasīsīsu yo arahā catūsu iriyāpathesu ekekasmiṃ iriyāpathe arahattaṃ patvā aññaṃ iriyāpathaṃ
tika-s0501t:1629_6: Yo arahā yasmiṃ roge uppanne arahattaṃ patvā tato rogato anuṭṭhahitvā tasmiṃ rogeyeva parinibbāyati,
tika-s0501t:1629_8: Yo arahā paccavekkhaṇavīthiyānantaraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā tato maraṇāsannajavanavīthiyānantarameva parinibbāyati,
tika-s0501t:1629_10: Vārasamatāti ca paccavekkhaṇavīthi maggavithyānuvattakattā paccavekkhaṇavīthianantaraṃ pavattamānāyapi
tika-s0501t:1630_0: Saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti etthapi paccavekkhaṇavīthiyānantaraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā bhavaṅgato
tika-s0501t:1630_3: Bhagavato sabbaññutaññāṇampi paccavekkhaṇavīthiyānantaraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā bhavaṅgato vuṭṭhāya pavattavīthiyā paṭhamaṃ pavattatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1630_6: sabbehi sammāsambuddhehi cāti imehi navahi puggalehi sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1631_0: Imesaṃ puggalānaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānekadesatthattā ceva asekkhabhāgiyatthattā ca evaṃ iminā “lokuttaraṃ suttaṃ
tika-s0501t:1631_1: sattādhiṭṭhāna”ntiādinā pakārena vuttehi imehi chabbīsatiyā puggalehi ariyehi dassanabhāgiyavāsanābhāgiyaasekkhabhāgiyasuttānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1631_2: vasena lokuttaraṃ suttaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ suttaṃ niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1632_0: Imesaṃ chabbīsatiyā puggalānaṃ sakalalokuttarasuttatthattā ceva sattādhiṭṭhānekadesasuttatthattā ca lokuttaraṃ sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ suttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1632_1: Ettakehi puggalehi niddisitabbanti ācariyena niyametvā vibhattaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1632_3: “lokiyaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ suttaṃ kittakehi puggalehi niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “lokiyaṃ suttaṃ
tika-s0501t:1632_5: “Te ekūnavīsati lokiyā puggalā katamehi dhammehi niddiṭṭhā samanvesitabbā”ti vattabbattā “te caritehī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1632_6: Te ekūnavīsati lokiyā puggalā caritehi caritavisesehi niddiṭṭhā samanvesitabbāti.
tika-s0501t:1632_11: Iti niddiṭṭhehi imehi ekūnavīsatiyā puggalehi lokiyasattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ suttaṃ niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1633_0: Lokiyaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ suttaṃ ettakehi puggalehi niddisitabbanti ācariyena niyametvā vibhattaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1633_2: “vāsanābhāgiyaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ suttaṃ katamehi puggalehi niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “vāsanābhāgiya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1633_5: “Kittakā sīlavantapuggalā”ti vattabbattā “te sīlavanto pañca puggalā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1633_8: pakatisīlavanto ca samādānasīlavanto ca cittappasādavanto ca samathavanto ca vipassanāvanto cāti pañca puggalā,
tika-s0501t:1633_9: pakatisīladhammo ca samādānasīladhammo ca cittappasādadhammo ca samathadhammo ca vipassanādhammo cāti pañca dhammāti imehi pañcahi puggalehi,
tika-s0501t:1633_10: imehi pañcahi dhammehi vāsanābhāgiyaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānekadesadhammādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ suttaṃ yathākkamaṃ niddisitabbanti.
tika-s0501t:1634_0: Lokuttaraṃ sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ suttaṃ dassanabhāgiyavāsanābhāgiyaasekkhabhāgiyasuttehi niddisitabbanti ācariyena niyametvā vibhattaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1634_2: “lokuttaraṃ dhammādhiṭṭhānaṃ suttaṃ kittakehi suttehi niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “lokuttaraṃ suttaṃ dhammādhiṭṭhānaṃ…pe…
tika-s0501t:1635_0: “Lokiyañca lokuttarañca sattādhiṭṭhānañca dhammādhiṭṭhānañca kittakehi niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “lokiyañca…pe…
tika-s0501t:1636_2: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sutte ñāṇaṃ ñāṇapariyāyena paññādinā niddisitabbanti.
tika-s0501t:1637_2: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sutte ñeyyaṃ ñeyyapariyāyena niddisitabbanti.
tika-s0501t:1638_0: “Ñāṇañca ñeyyañca kittakena niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “ñāṇañca ñeyyañca tadubhayenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1638_2: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sutte ñāṇañeyyā ñāṇañeyyapariyāyena niddisitabbanti.
tika-s0501t:1639_4: Tadubhayaṃ dassanañca bhāvanā ca sutte yathā niddiṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1640_0: “Sakavacanaṃ paravacana”ntiādīsupi evameva visuṃ visuṃ ca ekato ca sutte yathā niddiṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1640_1: tathā upadhārayitvā labbhamānato niddisitabbanti yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t:1641_2: Taṇhāsaṅkhāto samudayo vā kilesasaṅkhāto samudayo vā akusalasaṅkhāto samudayo vā saṃkilesabhāgiyena suttena samānatthabhāvena niddisitabbo.
tika-s0501t:1641_3: Lokiyakusalahetusaṅkhāto samudayo vā lokiyakusalasaṅkhāto samudayo vā vāsanābhāgiyena suttena samānatthabhāvena niddisitabbo.
tika-s0501t:1642_0: Kammañca vipāko ca yathārahaṃ labbhamānasuttena niddisitabboti sāmaññavasena vibhatto,
tika-s0501t:1642_2: Tatthāti tesu aṭṭhavīsatiyā sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttesu kusalaṃ catūhi suttehi samānatthabhāvena niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1642_10: “Kusalañca akusalañca katamena niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “kusalañca akusalañca tadubhayena niddisitabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1642_12: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sutte āgatena tadubhayena niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1643_3: Yaṃ anuññātaṃ yāsu yāsu bhūmīsu dissati,
tika-s0501t:1643_4: taṃ anuññātaṃ tāsu tāsu bhūmīsu āgatena samānena kappiyānulomena niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1644_0: Anuññātaṃ iminā niddisitabbanti ācariyena niyametvā vibhattaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1644_2: Bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṃ bhagavatā paṭikkhittakāraṇena sutte āgatena vatthunā kāraṇaphalabhāvena niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1644_3: Yaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ yāsu yāsu bhūmīsu dissati,
tika-s0501t:1644_4: taṃ pana paṭikkhittaṃ tāsu tāsu bhūmīsu āgatena pākaṭena akappiyānulomena niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1645_0: “Anuññātañca paṭikkhittañca katamena niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “anuññātañca paṭikkhittañca tadubhayena niddisitabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1645_1: Yasmiṃ yasmiṃ sutte anuññātañca paṭikkhittañca āgataṃ,
tika-s0501t:1645_2: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sutte āgatena tadubhayena niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1646_1: Yasmiṃ yasmiṃ sutte yā yā pasaṃsā āgatā,
tika-s0501t:1646_2: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sutte āgatāya tāya tāya pasaṃsāya thavo niddisitabbo.
tika-s0501t:1646_4: so thavo katividhena niddisitabbo”ti vattabbattā “so pañcavidhenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1646_5: Bhagavato thavo ca dhammassa thavo ca ariyasaṅghassa thavo ca ariyadhammānaṃ sikkhāya thavo ca lokiyaguṇasampattiyā thavo cāti pañcavidhena veditabbo.
tika-s0501t:1646_6: Iti evaṃ vuttappakārena pañcavidhena thavo niddisitabbo.
tika-s0501t:1647_0: Amhākācariya amhākācariyena aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā sāsanapaṭṭhāne daṭṭhabbāti vuttā,
tika-s0501t:1647_2: Sāsanapaṭṭhāne indriyabhūmi saddhindriyādiindriyabhūmi yehi navahi padehi niddisitabbā,
tika-s0501t:1647_3: sāsanapaṭṭhāne kilesabhūmi yehi navahi padehi niddisitabbā,
tika-s0501t:1647_4: evaṃ iminā pakārena etāni mūlapadāni nava padāni kusalapadāni,
tika-s0501t:1647_5: nava padāni akusalapadānīti aṭṭhārasa mūlapadāni honti.
tika-s0501t:1647_7: “kena kāraṇena aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā sāsanapaṭṭhāne daṭṭhabbāti viññāyatī”ti vattabbattā “tathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1647_8: Tathā hīti tato eva aṭṭhārasamūlapadānaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhāne daṭṭhabbattā “aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā kuhiṃ daṭṭhabbā?
tika-s0501t:1647_11: “Kena mūlapadānaṃ navakusalapadanavaakusalapadabhāvena aṭṭhārasabhāvo viññāyatī”ti vattabbattā “tenāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1648_0: “Navahi ca padehi kusalā, navahi ca yujjanti akusalapakkhā;
tika-s0501t:1649_0: Ete kho mūlapadā, bhavanti aṭṭhārasa padānī”ti. –
tika-s0501t:1650_2: padānī”ti vacanena mūlapadānaṃ navakusalapadanavaakusalapadabhāvena aṭṭhārasabhāvo viññāyatīti.
tika-s0501t:1651_0: “Yaṃ yaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyādisoḷasavidhaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānañceva yaṃ yaṃ lokiyādiaṭṭhavīsatividhaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānañca ācariyena niddhāritaṃ,
tika-s0501t:1651_2: aññaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ niddhāretvā yuttaṃ yujjitabbaṃ natthī”ti vattabbattā “niyuttaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1651_3: Yathāniddhāritasāsanapaṭṭhānato yaṃ yaṃ aññaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ niddhāritaṃ atthi,
tika-s0501t:1651_4: taṃ taṃ aññaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ niyuttaṃ yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yuttaṃ yujjitabbanti attho gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t:1652_6: mūlasaṅgītiyaṃ saṅgāyantehi therāsabhehi yā netti saṅgītā,
tika-s0501t:1652_8: niyuttaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhāna”nti ettāvatā vacanakkamena samattā paripuṇṇāva hoti.
tika-s0501t:1653_0: Iti samattāya āyasmatā mahākaccānena bhāsitāya bhagavatā anumoditāya mūlasaṅgītiyaṃ saṅgāyantehi therāsabhehi
tika-s0501t:1653_1: saṅgītāya nettiyā atthavaṇṇanā saddhammapālanāmena mahādhammarājagurunā mahātherena racitā jinaputtānaṃ
tika-s0501t:1653_2: hitakarā nettivibhāvanā chabbīsādhikanavasate sakkarāje sāvaṇamāse sukkapakkhe navamadivase sūriyuggamanasamaye samattā.
tika-s0501t:1660_0: Dvisahassaṃ yadā pattaṃ, nimmalaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ subhaṃ.
tika-s0501t:1667_0: Yattakaṃ sāsanaṃ ṭhitaṃ, tattakaṃ racitaṃ mayā;
tika-s0501t:1669_0: Iti taṃ racayantena, puññaṃ adhigataṃ mayā;
tika-s0501t:1672_0: Sabbe rajjasukhe ṭhatvā, carantu caritaṃ sukhī.
tika-s0501t:1673_0: Devo kāle suvassatu, sabbo raṭṭhajano sukhī;
